name: A O
description: A O is an infamous New World pirate and captain of the A O Pirates. He and his crew were subordinates to Whitebeard.

Statistics.Affiliations: A O Pirates; Subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates

name: Abdullah
description: Abdullah is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner Jeet. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Absalom
description: Absalom of the Graveyard was the leader of the Zombie Soldiers and Zombie Generals of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. He was one of the Mysterious Four of the Thriller Bark Pirates and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.

Occupations: Soldier Zombie and General Zombie Leader
Statistics.Epithet: Absalom of the Graveyard (墓場のアブサロム, Hakaba no Abusaromu?)

name: Acilia
description: Acilia is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who participated in a tournament for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Adele
description: Adele is a mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Café.

name: Aggie 68
description: Aggie 68 is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Agotogi
description: Agotogi was the leader of a gang of bandits who tried to kidnap Vivi about 11 years before the princess's return to Arabasta.

name: Agsilly
description: Agsilly is a large man with tanned skin. He wears a black bicorne hat, with what seems to be a white bird on it. He also wears a grey coat, a light colored shirt, and pants that tuck into his tiny shoes.

name: Agyo
description: Agyo is a fighting lion (闘獅子, Tōjishi?) and a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Ahho Desunen IX
description: Ahho Desunen IX is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the father of Ahho Zurako.

name: Ahho Zurako
description: Ahho Zurako is a noble from the Goa Kingdom and the daughter of Ahho Desunen IX.

name: Ahiru
description: Ahiru is the deputy commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Belo Betty.

name: Aisa
description: Aisa is a young Shandia girl who used to sneak onto the Upper Yard frequently to collect Vearth. She is Isa's daughter. After the timeskip, she works in the Wagomuland theme park and sells Cloud Balloons.

name: Akehende
description: Akehende is a Marine Rear Admiral.

name: Akudai Kanzaburo
description: Akudai Kanzaburo is an arms dealer who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.

name: Akumai
description: Akumai was a Billions agent who followed Mr. 2 Bon Kurei everywhere before he was captured by Hina when Mr. 2 and his crew sacrificed themselves to save the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Aladine
description: Aladine is a goatsbeard brotula merman. He was originally a Ryugu Kingdom soldier who was then enslaved, but then became a pirate as the doctor and later first mate of the Sun Pirates. He is the husband of Charlotte Praline, serving as the bond between the Sun Pirates and the Charlotte Family.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Doctor; First Mate; Soldier (former); Slave (former)

name: Albion
description: Albion is a pale man with a large, ovular head that is wrapped in bandages, like most of his body, from his forehead to his scalp, with his face only occupying the lowest part of his head. He has a long black ponytail on the back of his head, growing out from under the bandages, and wears a captain's coat. Around his neck is what appears to be a shirt collar with two buttons that have "A" on them, along with a red and maroon striped tie around his neck. He also has a dark yellow sash around his waist.

Statistics.Affiliations: Fake Straw Hat Crew (Former); His own crew
Statistics.Epithet: "Gashed Albion" (深手のアルビオン, Fukade no Arubion?)

name: Alice
description: Alice is the current secretary of the Galley-La Company in Water 7.

Statistics.Debut: Chapter 487 (cover); Episode 381 (newspaper); One Piece Film: Red

name: Ally
description: Ally is a little girl who was being held captive in the Biscuit Room, on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Alpacaman
description: Alpacaman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mines of the Udon Region of Wano Country.

name: Alpha
description: Alpha is a member of the CP8 branch of Cipher Pol. She is the younger sister of CP0 agent Kalifa and the youngest daughter of Laskey.

name: Alvida
description: "Iron Mace" Alvida is the former captain of the Alvida Pirates and the first antagonist encountered by Luffy on his journey after going to sea. Due to her actions, she can be regarded as the secondary antagonist of the Romance Dawn Arc and the tertiary antagonist of the Loguetown Arc.

Statistics.Affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy's Delivery, Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Buggy Pirates (Acting Captain, temporarily); Alvida Pirates (formerly)
Statistics.Epithet: "Iron Mace" (金棒, Kanabō?, English versions: "Iron Club")

Devil Fruit.Meaning: Smooth, fat in cells, young and slippery

name: Amadob
description: Amadob is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

name: Amazon
description: Amazon was the elderly gatekeeper of Skypiea and informer at the entrance to Skypiea known as Heaven's Gate. She let people in even if they could not pay her extol toll, but purposely failed to tell those who did not pay about the consequences for entering the city.

name: An Zengaiina
description: Zengaiina is a man with fair skin, short light brown hair, tiny black eye irises, hollow sunken black eye baggages, and a stitch patterned scar on the upper right side of his forehead. He wears the standard white prisoner outfit with black horizontal stripes, trousers, and white shoes.

name: And
description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, "he" is actually three men—Bas, And, and Kerville—who are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.

Statistics.Epithet: "Three-Headed Baskerville" (3つ首のバスカビル, Mitsu-Kubi no Basukabiru?)

name: Andre
description: Andre is a New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard. He is the twin brother of the Marine officer Candre.

name: Anjo
description: Anjo is a pirate admirer. He witnessed Gol D. Roger's execution. He has a tattoo of a plain Jolly Roger on his right arm.

name: Ankoro
description: Ankoro is a gigantic anglerfish formerly under the command of captain Vander Decken IX, residing in the Underworld of the Sea, seven thousand meters underneath the ocean surface. Wadatsumi seems to regard Ankoro as a pet, as apparently Ankoro was told "not to eat ships" before.

name: Antonio
description: Antonio is the owner of "Antonio's Graman" in Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Aphelandra
description: Aphelandra is an extremely tall yet slender woman. Her facial features are childlike, with wide dark brown eyes and long orange-brown hair falling evenly past her shoulders.

name: Aramaki
description: Aramaki, better known by his alias Ryokugyu, is an Admiral in the Marines. He was appointed to the rank during the two-year timeskip (next to Fujitora) to fill the two Admiral vacancies caused by Kuzan's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion.

Statistics.Alias: Ryokugyu (緑牛, Ryokugyū?, literally meaning "Green Bull")

name: Aremo Ganmi
description: She is a young woman with short hair (purple in the colored manga, and other colors throughout the anime), and grey eyes. She wears a pink, floral patterned dress and a red rose in her hair. In both of her appearances so far, she has always had her hands covering most of her face except for her eyes.

name: Arlong
description: Arlong the Saw is a sawshark fish-man. He was the captain of the all fish-man crew (excluding Nami), the Arlong Pirates, a former member of the Sun Pirates, and the older half-brother of Madam Shyarly. He is also a major inspirational figure for the New Fish-Man Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Arlong Pirates; Sun Pirates (former); Impel Down (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Captain; Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Arlong the Saw" (ノコギリのアーロン, Nokogiri no Āron?) (English versions: "Saw-Tooth Arlong")

name: Arrow
description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.

Statistics.Official English Name: Kicking Claw Force; Elite Alabastian Royal Guards
Statistics.Japanese VA: Katsuya Fujiwara (Arrow), Takahiro Suzuki (Hyota), Takurou Takasaki (Brahm), Unknown (Barrel)

name: Arthur
description: Arthur is a man with a curly brown beard that wears a light purple turban over his hair. He wears a blue vest over a brown garment that bears a kanji character (this is "長" in the manga, but appears to be "角" in his concept art.) At the bottom of his brown garment, there appear to be some sort of circular ornaments or designs. He also seems to have fairly sharp claws.

name: Aruyutayan V
description: Aruyutayan V was the king of Lvneel Kingdom roughly 400 years ago when Mont Blanc Noland discovered Shandora.

Statistics.Funi English VA: Douglass Burks (Episode 189); Andy Mullins (Episode of Skypiea)

name: Asahija
description: Asahija is a Marine Chief Petty Officer whose shadow was once stolen by Gecko Moria.

name: Asashichi
description: Asashichi is a fair-skinned man of average height and build. He has a large mouth, sharp jawline, a pink nose, and stubble on his chin. He also has pink hair tied in a topknot with long sideburns.

name: Ashura Doji
description: Ashura Doji was a former bandit, a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. After Oden's death, he returned to being a criminal under the name Shutenmaru, assuming leadership of the Mt. Atama Thieves. He initially severed his ties with the Kozuki Family in the present but rejoined after witnessing Yasuie's death.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mt. Atama Thieves; Kozuki Family; Nine Red Scabbards
Statistics.Occupations: Bandit; Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Yakuza Boss (former); Samurai
Statistics.Epithet: Strongest Monster of Kuri (九里最強の怪物, Kuri Saikyō no Kaibutsu?, VIZ Media: Strongest Monster in Kuri)

name: Aswa
description: Aswa is Koza's mother and Toto's wife.

name: Atagoyama
description: Atagoyama is a sumo wrestler in Wano Country's Bakura Town.

name: Atlas
description: Atlas, also designated as Punk-05 (PUNK-05（パンク ファイブ）, Panku-Faibu?), was one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "violence".

name: Atmos
description: "Water Buffalo" Atmos is the former 13th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Water Buffalo" (水牛, Suigyū?)

name: Attach
description: Attach, commonly nicknamed Attachan, is a photojournalist employed by "Big News" Morgans for the World Economy News Paper. Having previously headed the Marines' Photography Department, he supplied images of many prominent outlaws—including most of the Straw Hat Pirates—for the Marines' wanted posters, but was eventually dismissed for his frequent blunders.

Statistics.Affiliations: World Economy News Paper; Marines Photography Department (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Flaming Attachan" (炎のアタっちゃん, Honō no Atatchan?)

name: Avalo Pizarro
description: Avalo Pizarro, also known as the "Corrupt King", was one of the criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious, he had to effectively be erased from history. Prior to his life of crime, he was once a king of a North Blue kingdom that overthrew him for his despotic ways. He has since been freed by Marshall D. Teach and has become a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Fourth Ship); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former); King (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Corrupt King" (悪政王, Akusei-Ō?)

name: Ayesé Mar
description: Ayesé Mar is an okaki artisan from the western part of South Blue.

Statistics.Japanese Name: エーエスエ・ムアール

name: Azuki
description: Azuki is an old woman who lives in Ebisu Town.

name: Babanuki
description: Babanuki is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as the warden of the Prisoner Mine in Udon, a region of Wano Country. After the prison takeover, Babanuki was tamed by Tama.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi; Warden of the Prisoner Mine

name: Babe
description: "Catcher-Killing" Babe, better known by his alias Mr. 4, is a former officer agent of the Baroque Works and partner of Miss Merry Christmas. He is also Lassoo's owner.

Statistics.Alias: "Mr. 4" (Mr. 4（ミスター・フォー）, Misutā Fō?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Catcher-Killing" Babe (キャッチャー殺しのベーブ, Kyatchā-Goroshi no Bēbu?)

name: Baby 5
description: Baby 5 is a pirate and the wife of Sai, the Happo Navy's 13th leader. She is a former servant and assassin of the Donquixote Pirates, serving as an officer in the Pica Army. Her real name has not been revealed, as "Baby 5" is a codename given to her upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Happo Navy; Chinjao Family; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Donquixote Pirates (defected)
Statistics.Residence: Kuen Village (former); Spider Miles (former); Dressrosa (former); Kano Country

name: Bacura
description: Bacura is a black panther owned by the Kuja Pirates under Boa Hancock.

name: Baggaley
description: Baggaley has long black hair and a rather rectangular head. He has a tattoo covering a majority of his cheek and he wears a green hat on his head. He wears a large green cloak showing off a bit of his chest.

name: Bakezo
description: Bakezo is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.

name: Ban Dedessinée
description: Dedessinée is a woman with short silver-blue hair, blue eyes and purple lipstick. She wears a white headscarf and a crimson outfit. When she was preparing for the Levely, she also wore sunglasses.

name: Banchi
description: Banchi is a giant "all-terrain" turtle used by Baroque Works—particularly Miss All-Sunday—for transportation. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".

name: Banchina
description: Banchina was Usopp's mother and Yasopp's wife. She died of a sickness when Usopp was still young.

name: Bankuro
description: Bankuro was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Banshee
description: Banshee is a mermaid and was the only female member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Banzaburo
description: Banzaburo was a samurai of Wano Country who worked as a servant to the Kozuki Family until their fall 20 years ago.

Statistics.Occupations: Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Food taster

name: Bao
description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ギョロ, ニン, バオ
Statistics.Japanese VA: Kimiko Saitō (Gyoro); Eiji Takemoto (Nin); Yuuta Kasuya (Bao)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Trina Nishimura (Gyoro); Mariela Ortiz (Nin); Ryan Reynolds (Bao)

name: Bao Huang
description: Bao Huang is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the crew's surveillance division, the "Marys". She appears to have the duty of keeping and presenting daily schedules for the crew and their captain Kaidou.

name: Bariete
description: Bariete is a monkey mink who is a member of the Recon Squad (偵察隊, Teisatsu-tai?), and the one in charge of guarding the gates of the Mokomo Dukedom.

name: Barrel
description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.

Statistics.Official English Name: Kicking Claw Force; Elite Alabastian Royal Guards
Statistics.Japanese VA: Katsuya Fujiwara (Arrow), Takahiro Suzuki (Hyota), Takurou Takasaki (Brahm), Unknown (Barrel)

name: Barry
description: Barry is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Bartholomew Kuma
description: Bartholomew Kuma is a former Warlord of the Sea, the former king of the Sorbet Kingdom, and an officer and founding member of the Revolutionary Army with a bounty of 296,000,000. As a pirate, Kuma sailed the seas as a single-person pirate crew. He is also the adoptive father of Jewelry Bonney, daughter of his late friend and fellow revolutionary Ginny. Kuma is a member of the near-extinct special race known as the Buccaneers, inherited from his late father Clapp.

Statistics.Japanese Name: バーソロミュー・くま
Statistics.Occupations: Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army; Slave (former); Warlord of the Sea (former); King of Sorbet Kingdom (former); Pastor (former)
Statistics.Residence: Sorbet Kingdom (former); Baltigo (former); Egghead (former, temporary); Mary Geoise (former); Sabaody Archipelago (former, temporary)
Statistics.Alias: PX-0 (PX-0, Pīekkusu Zero?) "Kumachi" (くまちー, Kuma-chī?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Tyrant" (暴君, Bōkun?)

name: Bartolomeo
description: Bartolomeo the Cannibal is a Super Rookie, the captain of the Barto Club and the captain of the second ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi at the Corrida Colosseum, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and pledged his loyalty towards him after winning the B Block.

Statistics.Affiliations: Barto Club; his own Mafia Family (former); Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Second Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Pirate Captain; Mafia Leader (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Bartolomeo the Cannibal" (人食いのバルトロメオ, Hitokui no Barutoromeo?, Viz: "Man-Eater Bartolomeo")

name: Bas
description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, "he" is actually three men—Bas, And, and Kerville—who are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.

Statistics.Epithet: "Three-Headed Baskerville" (3つ首のバスカビル, Mitsu-Kubi no Basukabiru?)

name: Basil Hawkins
description: Basil Hawkins is an infamous pirate from North Blue known as the "Magician" and the captain of the Hawkins Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". His previous known bounty amounted to 249,000,000, but after the timeskip, it was raised to 320,000,000. After encountering Kaidou, he joined the Beasts Pirates and became one of the crew's Shinuchi.

Statistics.Epithet: "Magician" (魔術師, Majutsushi?)

name: Basilisk
description: The Basilisk is the second-in-command of Impel Down's Level 2: Beast Hell, under the Sphinx.

name: Bastille
description: "Shark Cutter" Bastille is a Marine Vice Admiral who took part in the Summit War of Marineford. He later appeared in Dressrosa under the command of Admiral Fujitora.

Statistics.Epithet: "Shark Cutter" (鮫切り, Same-kiri?, Viz: Shark Slicer)

name: Batchee
description: Batchee is a fly that Fullbody put in his soup to try to humiliate Sanji.

name: Batman
description: Batman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Baxcon
description: Baxcon is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom Scouting Unit; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Beak Remark
description: Beak Remark is a fishmonger and fisherman who runs on a store on Grove 42 of Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Beer VI
description: Beer VI is the king of the Roshwan Kingdom.

name: Bekori
description: Bekori is the former king of the Sorbet Kingdom.

name: Belo Betty
description: Belo Betty is the current commander of the East Army in the Revolutionary Army following the death of the previous commander, Ginny.

Statistics.Occupations: East Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army

name: Belladonna
description: Belladonna is one of the Kuja of Amazon Lily, and the doctor of the island.

name: Bellamy
description: Bellamy the Hyena is the former captain of the Bellamy Pirates, and a former member of the Donquixote Pirates. After the Dressrosa Arc, he retired from piracy and became a dyer.

Epithet: "Bellamy the Hyena" (ハイエナのベラミー, Haiena no Beramī?);
"Deadly Bullet of Dressrosa" (ドレスローザの凶弾, Doresurōza no kyōdan?);
"The Big-Time Rookie" (大型ルーキー, Ōgata Rūkī?)

name: Bellett
description: Bellett was the prince of an unnamed kingdom who became a pirate and was consequently imprisoned in Impel Down, and whose gender was unwillingly inverted.

name: Bell-mère
description: Bell-mère was a former Marine and the adoptive mother of Nami and Nojiko, introduced in a flashback during the Arlong Park Arc. She raised the two girls for approximately nine years until she was murdered by Arlong.

name: Benn Beckman
description: Benn Beckman is the first mate of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Bentham
description: Bentham of the Wild, alias Mr. 2 Bon Kurei, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works and an okama. He was a major antagonist during the Arabasta Arc, and (along with his fellow Officer Agents) one of the central characters in Miss Goldenweek's "Operation: Meet Baroque Works".

Statistics.Occupations: Queen of Newkama Land; Officer Agent (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison
Statistics.Alias: "Mr. 2 Bon Kurei" (Mr. 2（ミスター・ツー）・ボン・クレー, Misutā Tsū Bon Kurē?, Official Translation: Mr. 2 Bon Clay)
Statistics.Epithet: "Bentham of the Wild" (荒野のベンサム, Kōya no Bensamu?)

name: Bepo
description: Bepo is a polar bear mink and the navigator of the Heart Pirates. He is the younger brother of the late Nox Pirate Zepo.

name: Bian
description: Bian is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who serves as the leader of the Pink Bee Squad and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Leader of Pink Bee Squad; Pirate

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi

name: Big Pan
description: Due to his actions, he is a major antagonist during the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: Big Pan "the Wotan" (ウォータンのビッグパン, Wōtan no Biggu Pan?)

name: Billy
description: Billy the Orca Killer is the captain of the Yes Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: The Orca Killer (鯱殺し, Shachi Goroshi?)

name: Bimine
description: Bimine is a portly man with wavy, neck-length, light-colored hair and a mustache. He wears a light-colored suit with a dark undershirt, a bow-tie, and a tall dark hat with his name on it.

name: Bingo
description: Bingo is a former priest and cooper who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital before losing all his money and being exiled.

name: Bishamon
description: Bishamon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)

name: Biyo
description: Biyo is a child who was held captive on Punk Hazard by Caesar Clown. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Bizarre
description: Bizarre is an infamous New World pirate captain who was allied with Whitebeard.

name: Bjorn
description: The Giant Warrior Pirates is a pirate crew made up of giants from Elbaf lead by Dorry and Brogy. Before them, the crew's captains were Jarul and Jorul. They disbanded 102 years ago when Dorry and Brogy began their duel, but reunited once they returned to Elbaf. They are major allies of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

Official English Name: Giant Pirate Warrior Band / Pirate Giants / Giant Pirate Crew (VIZ, former);

name: Black Maria
description: Black Maria is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. She owns her own brothel on Onigashima near Kaidou's castle.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli

name: Blackback
description: Blackback, also known by his initials BB, is a gorilla mink and a Guardian of the Whale Forest.

name: Blamenco
description: Blamenco is the former 6th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Blenheim
description: Blenheim is the former 9th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Blondie
description: Blondie is an infamous New World pirate who was allied with Whitebeard.

name: Blue Fan
description: Blue Fan is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Blue Gilly
description: Blue Gilly is a martial artist from the Longleg Tribe. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he became part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet when he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Bluegrass
description: Bluegrass is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the siege of Egghead.

name: Bluejam
description: Bluejam was the captain of the Bluejam Pirates, and an infamous pirate of the East Blue. He was one of the main antagonists of the Post-War Arc.

name: Blueno
description: Blueno is an agent of CP0.

name: Blumarine
description: Blumarine was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Boa Hancock
description: "Pirate Empress" Boa Hancock is the current captain of the Kuja Pirates and was the only female Warlord of the Sea before the organization's disbandment. She is the current empress of Amazon Lily, also known as the "Snake Princess". As the current empress she precedes former empresses; Tritoma, Shakuyaku, and Gloriosa. She rules over the Kuja tribe with her two younger sisters, Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Empress of Amazon Lily; Warlord of the Sea (former); Slave (former)
Epithet: "Snake Princess" (蛇姫, Hebihime?);
"Pirate Empress" (海賊女帝, Kaizoku Jotei?)

name: Boa Marigold
description: Boa Marigold is the younger sister of Boa Hancock, the ruler of Amazon Lily. She is also one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates and the younger sister of Boa Sandersonia. She and her sisters are referred to by the Kuja as the Gorgon Sisters.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ボア・マリーゴールド

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
English Name: Snake-Snake Fruit King Cobra Model (VIZ Media);

name: Boa Sandersonia
description: Boa Sandersonia is the younger sister of Boa Hancock, the ruler of Amazon Lily. She is also one of the second-in commands of the Kuja Pirates and the older sister of Boa Marigold. She and her sisters are referred to by the Kuja as the Gorgon Sisters.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ボア・サンダーソニア

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda

name: Bobbin
description: "Sweeper" Bobbin is a bishop-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Sweeper" (始末屋, Shimatsu-ya?, Viz: "the Disposer")

name: Bobby Funk
description: Bobby Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Kelly Funk's younger brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Bobomba
description: Bobomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. He is the younger brother of Bomba.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Straw Hat Grand Fleet (Tontatta Pirates)

name: Bogard
description: Bogard is a tall man, roughly half a head higher than Monkey D. Garp who is just a bit shorter than Kuzan. He has a short hair. He wears a marine coat, which is draped over his shoulders. He wears a matching beige suit and hat, with the hat covering his eyes in a shadow.

name: Bomba
description: Bomba is a member of the Marines G-5 Branch Unit 01. He is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi.

name: Bomba
description: Bomba is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom. He is one of the two vice chiefs of the Tontatta Kingdom along with Rampo, under Gancho and Leo, and serves under Leo in the Tontatta Pirates. He is the elder brother of Bobomba.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Bongo
description: Bongo is a former lumber dealer who currently lives in Ebisu Town in Wano Country. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.

name: Bonk Punch
description: Bonk Punch is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Boo
description: Boo has long orange hair, put back in two ponytails, one in the back to the right and one over the left side of his face. He has shadowy eyes, and is missing a few front teeth.

Statistics.Affiliations: Happo Navy; Chinjao Family; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: First Mate of the Happo Navy; Martial Artist (Viz: Fighter)

name: Boodle
description: Boodle is the mayor of Orange Town. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Orange Town Arc.

name: Boogie
description: Boogie is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Borsalino
description: Borsalino, more commonly known by his alias Kizaru, is an Admiral in the Marines. After Kuzan resigned from the Marines and Sakazuki was promoted to Fleet Admiral, Kizaru is now the only remaining Admiral from the previous trio.

Statistics.Alias: Kizaru (黄猿, Kizaru?, literally meaning "Yellow Monkey")

name: Bourbon Jr.
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Braham
description: Braham is one of the Shandia warriors who fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.

name: Brahm
description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.

Statistics.Official English Name: Kicking Claw Force; Elite Alabastian Royal Guards
Statistics.Japanese VA: Katsuya Fujiwara (Arrow), Takahiro Suzuki (Hyota), Takurou Takasaki (Brahm), Unknown (Barrel)

name: Brannew
description: Commodore Brannew is a Marine officer stationed at Marine Headquarters who assigns bounties to criminals. He was first introduced as a lieutenant commander during the Loguetown Arc, but was promoted to commodore during the timeskip.

Statistics.Official English Name: Brandnew (FUNimation and Crunchyroll Simulcast; Formerly Viz); Brannew (Current Viz Manga)

name: Brew
description: Brew is a tall man with long flowing black hair and beard. His hair is adjusted with two arrow-like horns pointing out, and a third arrow pointing down on his forehead. His long beard is divided into five separate parts along his square jaw. He wears a light-blue bandanna, a shirt with a cloth on his collar, a pirate sash with pants, and a dark-blue pirate coat with epaulets. Overall, Brew has a bull-like appearance, matching that of his jolly roger.

name: Briscola
description: Briscola is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

name: Brocca
description: Brocca is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

name: Brogy
description: Brogy the Red Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Dorry. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden and Egghead Arcs.

Statistics.Epithet: Brogy the Red Ogre (赤鬼のブロギー, Aka-Oni no Burogī?)

name: Brontosaurus
description: Brontosaurus was a dinosaur who lived on Little Garden.

name: Brook
description: "Soul King" Brook is the musician of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of their two swordsmen, and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the ninth member of the crew and the eighth to join, doing so at the end of the Thriller Bark Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Musician; Swordsman; Senior Officer; Pirate Captain (former); Battle Convoy leader (former); World-Famous Rock Star (former)
Alias: "Hone-kichi" (ホネ吉（キチ）, Honekichi?, English versions: Bonekichi);
"The Starving Skeleton" (がしゃどくろ, Gashadokuro?)
Epithet: "Humming Brook" (鼻歌のブルック, Hanauta no Burukku?);
"Soul King" (ソウルキング, Souru Kingu?)

name: Bubblegum
description: Bubblegum is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Buche
description: Buche is a member of the WCI 31, serving as the head chef of the first kitchen.

name: Buchi
description: Buchi is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Sham, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (ニャーバン・兄弟（ブラザーズ）, Nyāban Burazāzu?).

Statistics.Epithet: "Nyaban Brothers" (ニャーバン兄弟（ブラザーズ）,  Nyāban Burazāzu?) (English versions: "Meowban Brothers")

name: Buckingham Stussy
description: Miss Buckingham Stussy, currently going by Miss Buckin, is a former member of both the Rocks Pirates and the illegal science institute MADS. She is the self-proclaimed lover of the deceased Emperor Edward Newgate and the mother of Edward Weevil, a former Warlord of the Sea.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミス・バッキンガム・ステューシー
Statistics.Alias: Miss Buckin (ミス・バッキン, Misu Bakkin?)

name: Buffalo
description: Buffalo is a combatant and an assassin of the Donquixote Pirates and an officer of the Pica Army. His real name is yet to be revealed, as "Buffalo" is a codename given to him upon joining the Donquixote Pirates.

name: Buggy
description: Buggy the Star Clown is the captain of the Buggy Pirates and co-leader of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. Formerly an apprentice of the Roger Pirates alongside Shanks, he was one of the earliest enemies of Monkey D. Luffy and the Straw Hat Pirates, whose actions eventually entangled him in the Summit War of Marineford. Inadvertently, the war grew his reputation enough to become one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, whereupon he founded the pirate mercenary organization Buggy's Delivery. After the Warlord system was abolished, he recreated it as the Cross Guild in partnership with fellow ex-Warlords Dracule Mihawk and Crocodile. He is currently recognized as the Guild's public leader, and on its power one of the Four Emperors.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Emperor; Figurehead President of Cross Guild; Chairman of Buggy's Delivery; (former); Warlord of the Sea; (former); Apprentice; (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Epithet: "Buggy the Clown" (道化のバギー, Dōke no Bagī?)
"Buggy the Star Clown" (千両道化のバギー, Senryō Dōke no Bagī?, English versions: Buggy the Genius Jester)

name: Buhichuck
description: Buhichuck was the boss of the "Surprise Zombies" in the dining room.

name: Building Snake
description: Building Snake is one of the Senior Officers and the navigator of the Red Hair Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ビルディング・スネイク

name: Bulldog
description: Bulldog is the king of the Sorbet Kingdom. He held the throne one generation before Bekori’s reign, and reclaimed his position after Bekori's successor Bartholomew Kuma became a fugitive.

name: Bunbuku
description: Bunbuku is a teapot owned by Tenguyama Hitetsu that was given life by "eating" the Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki

name: Bungo
description: Bungo is an arsonist in Wano Country who currently lives in Ebisu Town. He formerly lived in the Flower Capital, but was exiled after being swindled by Komurasaki.

name: Bunny Joe
description: Bunny Joe is a member of the Revolutionary Army and the leader of the group that rescued people of Tequila Wolf from slavery along with Nico Robin.

name: Bushon
description: Bushon is one of the Sea Train organizers in Water 7, along with Stevie.

name: Busshiri
description: Busshiri was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Byron
description: Byron is one of the slaves who was sold at the Human Auctioning House and was the first in the queue for sale. He is a pirate and musician.

name: Cabaji
description: Cabaji the Acrobat is the Buggy Pirates chief of staff, and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. He is an acrobat swordsman. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild.

Statistics.Affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy and Alvida Alliance, Buggy Pirates
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Chief of Staff; Acrobat; Swordsman
Statistics.Epithet: "Cabaji the Acrobat" (曲芸のカバジ, Kyokugi no Kabaji?)

name: Caesar Clown
description: Caesar Clown, who was referred to as "Master" by his subordinates, is a scientist, the leading expert on chemical weapons of mass destruction, and one of the co-founders of NEO MADS.

Statistics.Affiliations: Germa Kingdom; NEO MADS; Fire Tank Pirates (former); Donquixote Pirates (former); Marines and World Government (former); MADS (former)
Alias: "'Gangster' Gastino" (“ギャングスター”ガスティーノ, Gyangusutā Gasutīno?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Master" (M（マスター）, Masutā?)

name: Caimanlady
description: Caimanlady is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, being part of the surveillance division called the "Marys".

name: Camie
description: Camie is a kissing gourami mermaid that first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. She first appeared in the main series after being spat out of a large sea boar that was saved by Hatchan, along with her starfish pet and master, Pappag. While dreaming of becoming a designer, she worked on Hatchan's Takoyaki 8 when she first met the Straw Hat Pirates. After the timeskip, she is a waitress at the Mermaid Cafe on Fish-Man Island.

name: Camel
description: Camel is Kuzan's super penguin.

name: Cancer
description: Cancer is a Marine vice admiral.

name: Candre
description: He is a tall man with a long squared face and a black afro. Like his twin brother, he also has thick lips. He wears a white shirt, a dark-color tie and jacket. Over them, he also wears a Marine high-ranking officer coat.

Statistics.Debut: Chapter 557; Episode 466; One Piece Film: Z

name: Cands
description: Cands is a man with an abnormally long neck, and wears a giraffe styled hood around his neck. He wears a black coat with the sleeves rolled up, and light colored pants with boots. He also has a light colored long sleeved shirt under his coat, with the sleeves rolled up above the elbows. He was seen carrying a spear, and wearing a tricorne in the manga. In his original sketch, he wore a normal cap instead of a tricorne. He strongly resembles a giraffe.

name: Candy
description: Candy is the captain of the Candy Pirates.

name: Capone Bege
description: Capone "Gang" Bege is a mafia don-turned-pirate and the captain of the Fire Tank Pirates. He is also one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". He and his crew came from West Blue, where Bege was one of the heads of the Five Families of the West. During the timeskip, he became a subordinate of Charlotte Linlin and married Charlotte Chiffon. The two have a son named Capone Pez. While working under the Big Mom Pirates, he held a position of a rook-ranked combatant.

Statistics.Affiliations: Fire Tank Pirates; Big Mom Pirates (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Gang" (ギャング, Gyangu?)

name: Capone Pez
description: Capone "Gang" Pez is the infant son of Capone Bege and Charlotte Chiffon, as well as the grandson of Charlotte Linlin and Pound.

Statistics.Epithet: "Gang" (ギャング, Gyangu?)

name: Capote
description: Due to his actions, he is a major antagonist during the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

name: Caribou
description: "Wet-Haired Caribou" is an infamous rookie pirate who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Straw Hat Pirates' reunion. He has earned a bounty of 210,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookie pirates with bounties over 100,000,000. A fierce admirer of Marshall D. Teach, Caribou dreams of becoming part of the Blackbeard Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Caribou Pirates; Fake Straw Hat Crew (former, temporary)
Statistics.Epithet: "Wet-Haired Caribou" (濡れ髪のカリブー, Nuregami no Karibū?)

name: Carmel
description: Mother Carmel was a child trafficker dealing in orphans, that operated in the Underworld several decades ago, under the code name of "Mountain Witch". Running an orphanage known as the "Sheep's House", her seemingly benevolent nature caused her to be known as the "Holy Mother".

Statistics.Occupations: Child Trafficker; Caretaker of Sheep's House
Alias: Mother Carmel (マザー・カルメル, Mazā Karumeru?);
"Sister Carmel" (シスター・カルメル, Shisutā Karumeru?);
Statistics.Epithet: "Holy Mother" (聖母, Seibo?)

name: Carne
description: Carne is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head charcutier.

name: Carrot
description: Carrot is a rabbit mink of the Mokomo Dukedom, the current ruler of the dukedom, and a former member of the Kingsbirds and Inuarashi Musketeer Squad. She was trained by Pedro, whose will she carries on.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom, Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
Statistics.Occupations: Musketeer; Kingsbird (former); Ruler of Mokomo Dukedom

name: Catacombo
description: Catacombo is a middle aged man with black hair. He has a mustache and a stubbly beard. He also has a small scar by his right eye. He sports a Marine coat and hat, over a beige double breasted coat. Under that, is a navy blue shirt with a purple tie.

name: Catarina Devon
description: Catarina Devon, known as the "Crescent Moon Hunter", was the most dangerous female pirate ever to be imprisoned in Impel Down within the entire age of pirates. She was freed by Marshall D. Teach and recruited to the Blackbeard Pirates, where she joined the Ten Titanic Captains as captain of the sixth ship.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Sixth Ship); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Crescent Moon Hunter" (若月狩り, Mikazuki-gari?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune
Devil Fruit.English Name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Nine Tailed Fox

name: Cavendish
description: Cavendish of the White Horse, also known as the "Pirate Prince", is a famous Super Rookie and the captain of the Beautiful Pirates. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Cavendish decided to pledge his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became the captain of the first ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beautiful Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Bourgeois Kingdom
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the First Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Captain; Prince of the Bourgeois Kingdom (former)
Epithet: "Cavendish of the White Horse" (白馬のキャベンディッシュ, Hakuba no Kyabendisshu?, Viz: "White Knight Cavendish");
"Pirate Prince" (海賊貴公子, Kaizoku Kikōshi?, Viz: "Pirate Noble"; FUNimation: "Pirate Nobleman")

name: CB Gallant
description: CB Gallant was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Cerberus
description: Cerberus was a wild zombie who served under Gecko Moria.

name: Cezar
description: Cezar is the recently-crowned king of Ilisia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Chabo
description: Chabo is a young boy from Gosa Village. He works for Nojiko on her mikan farm.

name: Chadros Higelyges
description: Chadros Higelyges, better known as Brownbeard, is a former New World pirate. After Whitebeard's death he went off and took control of Foodvalten, one of the New World islands formerly under Whitebeard's protection.

Statistics.Japanese Name: チャドロス・ヒゲリゲス
Statistics.Affiliations: Caesar Clown (defected), Centaur Patrol Unit (defected); Brownbeard Pirates (disbanded)
Statistics.Occupations: Leader of the Centaur Patrol Unit (former); Pirate; Captain  (former)
Epithet: "Brownbeard" (茶ひげ, Chahige?);
"Boss" (as Centaur Patrol Unit Leader)

name: Chaka
description: Chaka the Jackal is one of two head guards in the Arabasta kingdom who serves under Igaram, alongside Pell. Chaka was the acting captain of the royal guard in Igaram's absence.

Statistics.Epithet: "Chaka the Jackal" (ジャッカルのチャカ, Jakkaru no Chaka?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal
Devil Fruit.English Name: Dog-Dog Fruit, Model: Jackal (Funimation); Mutt Mutt Fruit: Jackal Mode (Viz); Mutt-Mutt Fruit: Jackal Strike (4Kids)

name: Chao
description: Chao is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; SMILE Factory (former)Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Chap
description: Chap is the king of Deul Kingdom (ドイル王国, Doiru Ōkoku?) in the North Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Chappe
description: "Rope-Tugging" Chappe is an ex-prisoner who was a henchman for Caesar Clown. He was first seen fighting against the Marines of G-5 on Punk Hazard.

Statistics.Epithet: "Rope-Tugging" Chappe (縄引きのチャッペ, Nawahiki no Chappe?)

name: Charlos
description: Saint Charlos is a World Noble, the son of Saint Rosward, and the older brother of Saint Shalria.

name: Charlotte Akimeg
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Allmeg
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Amande
description: Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist in the Whole Cake Island Arc.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・アマンド
Statistics.Epithet: "Demon Lady" (鬼夫人, Kifujin?, Viz: "Mad Moiselle")

name: Charlotte Anana
description: Charlotte Anana is the 39th daughter of the Charlotte Family, as well as the 85th and youngest overall child, and is a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・アナナ

name: Charlotte Angel
description: Charlotte Angel is the seventh daughter and 17th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet sister of Cracker and Custard. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・エンゼル

name: Charlotte Anglais
description: Charlotte Anglais is the 42nd son and 78th child of the Charlotte Family and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・アングレ

name: Charlotte Basans
description: Charlotte Basans is the 23rd son and 39th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Saint-Marc. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・バサンズ

name: Charlotte Basskarte
description: Charlotte Basskarte is the 13th son and 22nd child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Nusstorte and Dosmarche. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・バスカルテ

name: Charlotte Bavarois
description: Charlotte Bavarois is the 26th son and 45th child of the Charlotte Family, as well as an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He is the younger twin brother of Snack.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ババロア

name: Charlotte Brownie
description: Charlotte Brownie is the 32nd son and 58th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He joined Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ブラウニー

name: Charlotte Broyé
description: Charlotte Broyé is the ninth daughter and 20th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Brûlée. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Meringue (メレンゲ大臣, Merenge Daijin?), governing over Milenge Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ブロワイエ

name: Charlotte Brûlée
description: Charlotte Brûlée is the eighth daughter and 19th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin sister of Broyé. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ブリュレ

name: Charlotte Cabaletta
description: Charlotte Cabaletta is the eighth son and the 13th child of the Charlotte Family and the fourth quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カバレッタ

name: Charlotte Cadenza
description: Charlotte Cadenza is the seventh son and the twelfth child of the Charlotte Family and the third quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cabaletta, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カデンツァ

name: Charlotte Chiboust
description: Charlotte Chiboust is the 30th son and 51st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Mix (ミックス大臣, Mikkusu Daijin?), governing over Sanshoku Island. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Luffy on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・シブースト

name: Charlotte Chiffon
description: Charlotte Chiffon is the 22nd daughter and the 52nd child of the Charlotte Family and Totto Land's former Minister of Puff (ふんわり大臣, Funwari Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Fluff") having governed over Funwari Island until her defection. She is Capone Bege's wife and the mother of Capone Pez, as well as a member of Bege's Fire Tank Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・シフォン

name: Charlotte Cinnamon
description: Charlotte Cinnamon is the 16th daughter and 37th child of the Charlotte Family, the younger triplet sister of Smoothie and Citron, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・シナモン

name: Charlotte Citron
description: Charlotte Citron is the 15th daughter and 36th child of the Charlotte Family, the middle triplet sister of Smoothie and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Eggs (エッグ大臣, Eggu Daijin?), governing over Kimi Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・シトロン

name: Charlotte Compo
description: Charlotte Compo is the 17th son and 28th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Laurin. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Pie (パイ大臣, Pai Daijin?), governing over Piepie Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・コンポ

name: Charlotte Compote
description: Charlotte Compote is the eldest daughter and second child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fruits (フルーツ大臣, Furūtsu Daijin?), governing over Fruits Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・コンポート

name: Charlotte Cornstarch
description: Charlotte Cornstarch is the 11th daughter and 27th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet sister of Moscato and Mash. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Love (愛情大臣, Aijō Daijin?), governing over Loving Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・コンスターチ

name: Charlotte Counter
description: Charlotte Counter is the sixth son and the 11th child of the Charlotte Family and the second quintuplet brother of Opera, Cadenza, Cabaletta, and Gala. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カウンター

name: Charlotte Cracker
description: "Thousand Arms" Charlotte Cracker is the tenth son and 15th child of the Charlotte Family and the oldest triplet brother of Custard and Angel. He is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Biscuits (ビスケット大臣, Bisuketto Daijin?), governing Biscuits Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・クラッカー
Epithet: "Thousand Arms Cracker" (千手のクラッカー, Senju no Kurakkā?)
"Biscuit Knight" (ビスケットの騎士, Bisuketto no Kishi?)

name: Charlotte Custard
description: Charlotte Custard is the sixth daughter and 16th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet sister of Cracker and Angel. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カスタード

name: Charlotte Dacquoise
description: Charlotte Dacquoise is the 24th son and 41st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Jam (ジャム大臣, Jamu Daijin?), governing over Jam Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ダクワーズ

name: Charlotte Daifuku
description: Charlotte Daifuku is the third son and fourth child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Katakuri and Oven. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Beans (豆大臣, Mame Daijin?), governing over Poripori Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ダイフク

name: Charlotte De-Chat
description: Charlotte De-Chat is the 44th son and the 81st child of the Charlotte Family. He is a hybrid between a human and a fish-man.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ドシャ

name: Charlotte Dolce
description: Dolce and Dragée are young identical-looking boys who have a round body shape and wear formal pink shirts with striped pants. They are usually seen hanging on to balloons.

Japanese Name: シャーロット・ドルチェ
シャーロット・ドラジェ
Statistics.Official English Name: Charlotte Dolce and Dragée (Viz);Charlotte Dolce and Dragee (WT100)

name: Charlotte Dosmarche
description: Charlotte Dosmarche is the 14th son and 23rd child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet brother of Nusstorte and Basskarte. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tea (お茶大臣, Ocha Daijin?), governing over Black Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ドスマルシェ

name: Charlotte Dragée
description: Dolce and Dragée are young identical-looking boys who have a round body shape and wear formal pink shirts with striped pants. They are usually seen hanging on to balloons.

Japanese Name: シャーロット・ドルチェ
シャーロット・ドラジェ
Statistics.Official English Name: Charlotte Dolce and Dragée (Viz);Charlotte Dolce and Dragee (WT100)

name: Charlotte Effilée
description: Charlotte Effilée is the fifth daughter and ninth child of the Charlotte Family, the youngest quadruplet sister of Mondée, Amande, and Hachée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・エフィレ

name: Charlotte Flampe
description: Charlotte Flampe is the 36th daughter  and 77th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates, serving as the Captain of the Special Attack Unit (特攻隊長, Tokkō-taichō?, Viz: "Kamikaze Captain"). She is also Totto Land's Minister of Honey (はちみつ大臣, Hachimitsu Daijin?), governing over Rokumitsu Island, and the President of the Katakuri Fan Club (カタクリファンクラブ会長, Katakuri Fan Kurabu Kaichō?).

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・フランペ
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Officer; Minister of Honey; Special Attack Unit Captain; Katakuri Fan Club President

name: Charlotte Fuyumeg
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Gala
description: Charlotte Gala is the ninth son and the 14th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest quintuplet brother of Opera, Counter, Cadenza, and Cabaletta.

name: Charlotte Galette
description: Charlotte Galette is the 18th daughter and the 42nd child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin sister of Poire. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Butter (バター大臣, Batā Daijin?), governing over Margarine Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ガレット

name: Charlotte Hachée
description: Charlotte Hachée is the fourth daughter and eighth child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister to Mondée, Amande, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・アッシュ

name: Charlotte Harumeg
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte High-Fat
description: Charlotte High-Fat is the 20th son and 33rd child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Tablet. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ハイファット

name: Charlotte Joconde
description: Charlotte Joconde is the 27th daughter and 59th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was also a member of Charlotte Oven's army to intercept the Straw Hat Pirates on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ジョコンド

name: Charlotte Joscarpone
description: Charlotte Joscarpone is the 29th daughter and 63rd child of the Charlotte Family, the younger twin sister of Charlotte Mascarpone, and a Snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ジョスカルポーネ

name: Charlotte Kanten
description: Charlotte Kanten is the 27th son and 48th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Kato and Montb. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Agar (寒天大臣, Kanten Daijin?), governing over Jelly Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カンテン

name: Charlotte Katakuri
description: Charlotte Katakuri is the second son and third child of the Charlotte Family and the elder triplet brother of Daifuku and Oven. He is also one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Flour (粉大臣, Kona Daijin?), governing over Komugi Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カタクリ

name: Charlotte Kato
description: Charlotte Kato is the 28th son and 49th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet brother of Kanten and Montb. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Seeds (シード大臣, Shīdo Daijin?), governing over Tanega Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・カトウ

name: Charlotte Laurin
description: Charlotte Laurin is the 18th son and 29th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of Compo. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ラウリン

name: Charlotte Linlin
description: Charlotte Linlin, better known as "Big Mom", is the captain of the Big Mom Pirates and was formerly one of the Four Emperors ruling over the New World, as the only female member of that group. She is the matriarch of the very large Charlotte Family, whose many children make up the infrastructure of her crew. She is also the creator of the unique race of creatures known as Homies, who mainly inhabit all of Totto Land, and happily serve her. Big Mom possesses three special homies, Napoleon, Prometheus, and Zeus, but unhappy with Zeus' continued failures, Big Mom decided to disown and replace him with a new Homie named Hera.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・リンリン
Statistics.Affiliations: Big Mom Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Four Emperors (former); Charlotte Family
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Emperor (former); Queen of Totto Land
Epithet: "Big Mom" (ビッグ・マム, Biggu Mamu?) (Funimation subs (formerly): Big Mam)
"Evil Spirit" (悪神, Akujin?)

name: Charlotte Lola
description: Charlotte Lola is the captain of the Rolling Pirates and the 23rd daughter and 53rd child of the Charlotte Family. Her mother is the former Emperor Charlotte Linlin and her father is Linlin's 25th husband, Pound. She is the younger twin sister of Chiffon and Gotti's wife.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ローラ
Statistics.Affiliations: Rolling Pirates; Charlotte Family; Thriller Bark Victim's Association (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Marriage Proposal Lola" (求婚のローラ, Kyūkon no Rōra?)

name: Charlotte Maple
description: Charlotte Maple is the 26th daughter and 57th child of the Charlotte Family, the youngest quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Myukuru, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・メープル

name: Charlotte Marble
description: Charlotte Marble is the 24th daughter and 55th child of the Charlotte Family, the second quadruplet sister of Mobile, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・マーブル

name: Charlotte Marnier
description: Charlotte Marnier is the 13th daughter and 32nd child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin sister of Mozart. She also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Yeast (酵母大臣, Kōbo Daijin?), governing over Kibo Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・マルニエ

name: Charlotte Mascarpone
description: Charlotte Mascarpone is the 34th son and 62nd child of the Charlotte Family, the older twin brother of Joscarpone, and a Snakeneck-human hybrid. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tableware (食器大臣, Shokki Daijin?), governing over Cutlery Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・マスカルポーネ

name: Charlotte Mash
description: Charlotte Mash is the tenth daughter and 26th child of the Charlotte Family and the middle triplet sister of Moscato and Cornstarch. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・マッシュ

name: Charlotte Melise
description: Charlotte Melise is the 17th daughter and 40th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・メリゼ

name: Charlotte Mobile
description: Charlotte Mobile is the 31st son and 54th child of the Charlotte Family, the elder quadruplet brother of Marble, Myukuru, and Maple, and a Longarm-human hybrid. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Tasting (味見大臣, Ajimi Daijin?), governing over Futoru Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モービル

name: Charlotte Mondée
description: Charlotte Mondée is the second daughter and sixth child of the Charlotte Family, the eldest quadruplet sister of Amande, Hachée, and Effilée, and a snakeneck-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モンデ

name: Charlotte Mont-d'Or
description: "Scribe" Charlotte Mont-d'Or is the 19th son and 30th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Cheese (チーズ大臣, Chīzu Daijin?), governing over Cheese Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モンドール
Statistics.Epithet: "Scribe" (書司, Shoshi?, Viz: "Book-Keeper")

name: Charlotte Montb
description: Charlotte Montb is the 29th son and 50th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest triplet brother of Kanten and Kato. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モンブ

name: Charlotte Moscato
description: Charlotte Moscato is the 16th son and 25th child of the Charlotte Family and the eldest triplet brother of Mash and Cornstarch. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Gelato (ジェラート大臣, Jerāto Daijin?), governing over Ice Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モスカート

name: Charlotte Mozart
description: Charlotte Mozart is the 12th daughter and 31st child of the Charlotte Family and the elder twin sister of Marnier. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・モーツアルト

name: Charlotte Myukuru
description: Charlotte Myukuru is the 25th daughter and 56th child of the Charlotte Family, the third quadruplet sister of Mobile, Marble, and Maple, and a longarm-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ミュークル

name: Charlotte Newgo
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Newichi
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Newji
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Newsan
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Newshi
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Noisette
description: Charlotte Noisette is the 15th son and 24th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Finance (大蔵大臣, Ōkura Daijin?), governing over Kinko Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ノアゼット

name: Charlotte Normande
description: Charlotte Normande is the 38th daughter and the 82nd child of the Charlotte Family. She is a hybrid between a human and a dwarf.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ノルマンド

name: Charlotte Nougat
description: Charlotte Nougat is the 41st son and 75th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ヌガー

name: Charlotte Nusstorte
description: Nusstorte is a large man with a massive head compared to the rest of his body. He has a very thick mustache and wears a pair of sunglasses. He also wears a purple commodore jacket with gold and green epaulettes and a large indigo bicorne with a face that has an identical mustache. In comparison, his head and bicorne together are nearly the same height as the rest of his body. He is also seen with a brown tobacco pipe and carries his sword behind his back.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ヌストルテ

name: Charlotte Nutmeg
description: The Charlotte Decuplets are the 36-40th sons and 30-34th daughters of the Charlotte Family, making up the 65-74th children in the family, and are all officers of the Big Mom Pirates. They are the largest group of Big Mom's children born in a single birth.

name: Charlotte Opera
description: Charlotte Opera is the fifth son and the tenth child of the Charlotte Family and is the eldest quintuplet brother of Counter, Cadenza, Cabaletta, and Gala. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and served as Totto Land's Minister of Whipped Cream (生クリーム大臣, Nama Kurīmu Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Cream"), governing over Noko Island. His current status is unknown after having his lifespan removed by a rampaging Big Mom.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・オペラ
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Officer; Minister of Whipped Cream

name: Charlotte Oven
description: Charlotte Oven is the fourth son and fifth child of the Charlotte Family and the younger triplet brother of Katakuri and Daifuku. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Browned Food (こんがり大臣, Kongari Daijin?, Viz: "Minister of Baking"), governing over Yakigashi Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・オーブン
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Officer; Minister of Browned Food

name: Charlotte Panna
description: Charlotte Panna is the 28th daughter and 61st child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. She was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・パンナ

name: Charlotte Perospero
description: Charlotte Perospero is the eldest child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Candy (キャンディ大臣, Kyandi Daijin?), governing over Candy Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ペロスペロー

name: Charlotte Poire
description: Charlotte Poire is the 19th daughter and the 43rd child of the Charlotte Family, the younger twin sister of Galette, and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ポワール

name: Charlotte Praline
description: Charlotte Praline is a half-human and half-hammerhead shark mermaid, the 21st daughter and 47th child of the Charlotte Family, and the younger twin sister of Prim. She was also Totto Land's former Minister of Design (デザイン大臣, Dezain Daijin?), having governed over Unique Island until her defection.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・プラリネ

name: Charlotte Prim
description: Charlotte Prim is the 20th daughter and 46th child of the Charlotte Family, the older twin sister of Praline, and an octopus mermaid-human hybrid. She is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・プリム

name: Charlotte Pudding
description: Charlotte Pudding is the 35th daughter and the 76th child of the Charlotte Family, an officer of the Big Mom Pirates, and a hybrid between a human and a member of the Three-Eye Tribe. She also works as a chocolatier and the owner of cafe "Caramel" on Cacao Island, as the candidate for the vacant position of Minister of Chocolate (チョコレート大臣, Chokorēto Daijin?). She was once Sanji's arranged fiancée, per the political agreement between their families. She is currently held captive by the Blackbeard Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・プリン

name: Charlotte Raisin
description: Charlotte Raisin is the 33rd son and 60th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Big Mom's enraged army sent to fight Monkey D. Luffy, and later joined Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Luffy on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・レザン

name: Charlotte Saint-Marc
description: Charlotte Saint-Marc is the 22nd son and the 38th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Essence (エッセンス大臣, Essensu Daijin?), governing over Flavor Island. He is the older twin brother of Basans.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・サンマルク

name: Charlotte Smoothie
description: Charlotte Smoothie is the 14th daughter and 35th child of the Charlotte Family, the older triplet sister of Citron and Cinnamon, and a longleg-human hybrid. She serves as one of the Three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates and as Totto Land's Minister of Juice (ジュース大臣, Jūsu Daijin?), governing over 100% Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・スムージー

name: Charlotte Snack
description: Charlotte Snack is the 25th son and 44th child of the Charlotte Family and the older twin brother of Bavarois. He is also an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Fries (フライ大臣, Furai Daijin?), governing over Potato Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・スナック
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Officer; Minister of Fries; Sweet Commander (former)

name: Charlotte Tablet
description: Charlotte Tablet is the 21st son and 34th child of the Charlotte Family and the younger twin brother of High-Fat. He also is an officer of the Big Mom Pirates and serves as Totto Land's Minister of Toppings (トッピング大臣, Toppingu Daijin?), governing over Topping Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・タブレット

name: Charlotte Wafers
description: Charlotte Wafers is the 37th daughter and the 79th child of the Charlotte Family.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ウエハース

name: Charlotte Wiro
description: Charlotte Wiro is the 43rd son and the 80th child of the Charlotte Family. He is a Human-Snakeneck hybrid.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ウィロ

name: Charlotte Yuen
description: Charlotte Yuen is the 35th son and 64th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He was a member of Charlotte Oven's army to ambush Monkey D. Luffy on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ユーエン

name: Charlotte Zuccotto
description: Charlotte Zuccotto is the 11th son and the 18th child of the Charlotte Family and an officer of the Big Mom Pirates. He also serves as Totto Land's Minister of Alcohol (酒大臣, Sake Daijin?), governing over Liqueur Island.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シャーロット・ズコット

name: Chess
description: Chess is a former minister of defense serving under Wapol. After the attack of Blackbeard, he became a pirate alongside his king, until their subsequent return to Drum Island.

name: Chesskippa
description: Chesskippa the Hanger-on is a pirate captain from Robin's past.

Statistics.Epithet: "Chesskippa the Hanger-on" (スネかじりのチェスキッパ, Sunekajiri no Chesukippa?)

name: Chessmarimo
description: Chessmarimo is a fusion of Chess and Kuromarimo, created by Wapol's Baku Baku Factory.

name: Chew
description: Chew is a smelt-whiting fish-man and an officer of the Arlong Pirates. He is also a former member of the Sun Pirates. He is one of the major antagonists of the Arlong Park Arc.

name: Chichilisia
description: Chichilisia is the leader of the Niho Navy and the father of Uholisia.

name: Chicken
description: Chicken is the wife of Gyoru and a fishmonger of Foosha Village.

name: Chicory
description: Chicory is small and has a fluffy tail, a pointy nose, and long flowing, bright-colored hair. She wears a bright-colored dress with light and dark stripes on the bottom and a large bright-colored hat with a flower on the left side. She also wears a pair of dark-colored high heels.

name: Chimney
description: Chimney is the granddaughter of Sea Train conductor Kokoro, her only mermaid grandparent, making Chimney 1/4 mermaid. She is the owner of a rabbit named Gonbe (whom Chimney thinks is a cat).

Statistics.Occupations: Sunday stationmaster of the Shift Station

name: Chinjao
description: Chinjao, formerly known as "Don Chinjao" and "Chinjao the Drill", is a former pirate, the leader of the Chinjao Family, and the retired 12th leader of the Happo Navy. He also joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Chinjao Family; Happo Navy; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: 12th Leader of the Happo Navy; Pirate (former)
Epithet: Don Chinjao (首領（ドン）・チンジャオ, Don Chinjao?);
"Chinjao the Drill" (錐のチンジャオ, Kiri no Chinjao?)

name: Chihaya
description: Chihaya is a young girl with round glasses, a slight double chin, and bright blond hair tied in twintails with red hair ties. She wears a dark blue kimono with black wave patterns.

name: Chiya
description: Chiya was the Shandia Pantri that lived over 400 years ago, who died of Tree Fever.

name: Cho
description: Moonflower O-Cho is a yakuza boss of the Ringo region of Wano Country. She was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

Statistics.Epithet: "Moonflower O-Cho" (夕顔のお蝶, Yūgao no O-Chō?, VIZ: "Ocho the Bottle Gourd")

name: Chocho
description: O-Chocho is a woman who lives in Okobore Town in Wano Country.

Statistics.Residence: Wano Country (Okobore Town; formerly Bakura Town)

name: Choco Police
description: Choco Police is a police officer in charge of watching over Chocolat Town on Cacao Island.

Statistics.Residence: Chocolat Town, Cacao Island, Totto Land

name: Chocolat
description: Chocolat is a potbellied woman who bears little resemblance with the real Nami. She has a wide face (similar to Sandersonia) and short hair with a bun near top of her head (possibly because in the wanted poster Nami was tying up her hair for the picture). She wears a polka-dotted top (similar to Nami's bikini top in the poster) and a lavender skirt, bearing a rather portly, pot bellied midriff, contrasting Nami's slender figure.

name: Choi
description: Choi is an average sized man, with tanned skin and a black hat. His hat has a red feather on it, and he wears a black coat draped over his shoulders. His shirt is a light brown, with dark brown vertical stripes. He sports green pants, that show off his ankles and he wears brown normal shoes.

name: Chome
description: Chome is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)

name: Chouchou
description: Chouchou is a dog from Orange Town, famed for his unceasing vigil over the pet-food shop founded by his deceased owner. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".

name: Chuchun
description: Chuchun is a Super Sparrow ridden by Itomimizu. He and Itomimizu witnessed all the Davy Back Fight games between the Foxy Pirates and the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Chuji
description: Chuji is the pet rat of the geisha Some.

name: Clapp
description: Clapp was the father of Bartholomew Kuma and a member of the Buccaneers race.

name: Clione
description: Clione is a member of the Heart Pirates.

name: Clover
description: Claíomh D. Clover, commonly known as Professor Clover (クローバー博士, Kurōbā-hakase?), was the director of the Ohara Library, and a leading authority on archaeology. He was a professor and archaeologist who studied Poneglyphs with his fellow colleagues in the Tree of Knowledge. During his younger years, he was also an infamous explorer known for getting repeatedly caught by the Marines.

Statistics.Japanese Name: クラウ・D（ディー）・クローバー
Statistics.Occupations: Professor and archaeologist of the Tree of Knowledge; Explorer (former)

name: Coburn
description: Coburn was the leader of the Shandia tribe from 400 years ago.

name: Cocoa
description: Unlike the real Robin, Cocoa is a very short and plain woman. She has a similar hairstyle to Robin's (before the timeskip). Her nose is flat, similar to Robin's, but wider between the eyes, and longer. Cocoa wears a plain dark purple dress, carries a purse and bright red high heels. Fake Luffy has asserted her to be the closest in appearance to her duplicate out of the crew; in spite of this, Cocoa has virtually no resemblance to Robin.

name: Cocox
description: Cocox is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon. He is classified as a Type B creature, "Small Friendly".

Statistics.Affiliations: Animals of the Island of Rare Animals

name: Colscon
