description: Colscon is a chubby man, with curly brown hair and a thin black mustache. His clothes are similar to that of a mafia boss, with a black coat, a yellow tie, and a moss green button up shirt with vertical lines on it. He also sports a dark brown hat with a feather on it.

name: Columbus
description: Columbus is a short, young-looking girl with long orange curly hair. She wears a red typical sailor's buttoned jacket with a white bowtie, and a brown belt that goes across her chest. She also wears dark red boots and a vertically red and white striped bicorne hat with turquoise beads and a skull on its front.

Statistics.Affiliations: Yonta Maria Grand Fleet; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Comil
description: Vice Admiral Comil is the commander of Marine Base G-2. He first appeared in Portgas D. Ace's cover story, and later took part in the Summit War of Marineford.

name: Compo
description: Compo is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Concelot
description: Concelot is a fox mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad  Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)

name: Conis
description: Conis is a citizen of Skypiea who befriended Monkey D. Luffy and his crew after their arrival. She is Pagaya's daughter and owner of a cloud fox named Su.

name: Conney
description: Conney is the queen dowager of the Sorbet Kingdom as the mother of King Bulldog.

name: Corgi
description: Corgi is a World Government official who took part in the mission to acquire the blueprints of Pluton and escort the prisoners Nico Robin and Cutty Flam to Enies Lobby. He acted as the leader of the forces in the Sea Train, answering directly to the CP9 agents.

name: Coribou
description: "Blood-Splatterer" Coribou is a captain of the Caribou Pirates, along with his big brother Caribou.

Statistics.Affiliations: Caribou Pirates; Fake Straw Hat Crew (former, temporary)
Statistics.Epithet: "Blood-Splatterer" Coribou (返り血のコリブー, Kaerichi no Koribū?)

name: Cornelia
description: Cornelia is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Cosette
description: Cosette is the head chef employed in the Germa Kingdom's royal household.

name: Cosmo
description: Sergeant Cosmo is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. Sergeant Cosmo was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.

name: Cosmos
description: Cosmos is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Cotton
description: Cotton is a normal-sized dwarf with light-colored skin, a pointed nose, large eyes, and a large, white tail. She has white hair (lilac in the anime) that covers her right eye. She wears a white hat that covers most of her head, white gloves, a blue jacket with yellow buttons on it, striped legging-like pants, and black boots.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom Scouting Unit; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Straw Hat Pirates

name: Couran
description: Couran is the king of Cameron Kingdom (キャメロン王国, Kyameron Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Cowboy
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Crocodile
description: "Desert King" Sir Crocodile is a former Warlord of the Sea and the former president of the mysterious crime syndicate Baroque Works, formerly operating under the codename "Mr. 0". After the disbandment of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, he now works as a co-leader of the Cross Guild alongside Dracule Mihawk and under the figurehead leadership of Buggy, one of the Four Emperors.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Cross Guild Chief Officer; Baroque Works President (former); Proprietor of Rain Dinners (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Epithet: "Sir Crocodile" (サー・クロコダイル, Sā Kurokodairu?)
"Desert King" (砂漠の王, Sabaku no Ō?)

name: Crocus
description: Crocus is a doctor and the caretaker of the whale Laboon as well as the overseer of the Twin Cape Lighthouse that guides ships coming down from Reverse Mountain into the Grand Line.

name: Curiel
description: Curiel is the former 10th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Curly Dadan
description: Curly Dadan is a friend of Monkey D. Garp and the foster mother of Portgas D. Ace and Monkey D. Luffy. Garp entrusted her to take care of Ace shortly after the boy's birth. Later, Garp also left Luffy in Dadan's care. She took care of Sabo too when he moved in.

Statistics.Occupations: Mountain Bandit Boss; Caretaker of Monkey D. Luffy, Portgas D. Ace, and Sabo (former)

name: Cyrano
description: Cyrano is a character in Oda's one-shot, Monsters, and was a swordsman from Shimotsuki Ryuma's past.

name: D.R.
description: D.R. was one of the main antagonists in Oda's one-shot, Monsters.

name: Dachoman
description: Dachoman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Daddy Dee
description: Daddy Dee is one of the houseparents, alongside Mummy Mee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.

name: Dagama
description: Dagama is the tactician of the Prodence Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Daidalos
description: Daidalos was a giant squid that was close friends with Ikaros Much. He was first shown when Ikaros was thinking of him.

name: Daifugo
description: Daifugo is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who served as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country until his defeat during the prison uprising. After being tamed by Kurozumi Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi; Vice Warden of the Prisoner Mine

name: Daigin
description: Daigin is a Marine Commodore who led the team that went to Impel Down to capture the intruder, Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Daikoku
description: Daikoku is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu; Kurozumi Family

name: Daikon
description: Daikon is an average-sized dwarf with light-colored skin and a large tear-shaped nose. He wears a hood with pointed ears on it that curve back.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta KingdomScouting UnitStraw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Daisy
description: Daisy is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Dalmatian
description: Vice Admiral Dalmatian is one of the many Marine vice admirals to have participated in the Summit War of Marineford.

name: Dalton
description: Dalton is the elected king of the Sakura Kingdom (formerly called the Drum Kingdom). He is a former Royal Guard who once served under Wapol.

Statistics.Occupations: King of the Sakura Kingdom; Chief Royal Guard of the Drum Kingdom (former)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison

name: Damask
description: Damask is a pyromaniac who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Daruma
description: Daruma is a cookie-cutter shark fish-man‎ and an officer of the New Fish-Man‎ Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.

name: Daz Bonez
description: "The Killer" Daz Bonez is a former bounty hunter who joined Baroque Works and was the highest ranked male Officer Agent and the strongest under Crocodile himself. His codename was Mr. 1 and his partner was Miss Doublefinger.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Assassin; Officer Agent (former); Bounty Hunter (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "The Killer" (殺し屋, Koroshiya?)

name: Decalvan Brothers
description: The Decalvan Brothers are two infamous New World pirates who allied with Whitebeard.

name: Delacuaji
description: Delacuaji is a round and large man with an unusual body shape, mostly hidden by the chartreuse robe he wears, which has ruffled edges on the arms and seems to cover most of his upper body, even his head, leaving only his face and hands visible. He has a round face with dark colored lips and concentric circles around his eyes, a black goatee on his chin, and teeth quite spaced out one from another, similarly to Bluejam's. His attire also includes a light blue scarf held up by a clasp made up of three linked jewels, an indument that looks like a brown vest, and a pirate captain's hat matching his robe, with a little skull represented on it. He carries around a saber.

name: Dellinger
description: Dellinger is a combatant and an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army who is a hybrid between a human and a fighting fish fish-man.

name: Demalo Black
description: "Three-Tongued" Demalo Black was the captain of the Fake Straw Hat Crew. He impersonated Monkey D. Luffy to benefit from his reputation, but was later arrested by Sentomaru. Afterwards, he began impersonating Eustass Kid.

Epithet: "Three-Tongued" Demalo Black (三枚舌のデマロ・ブラック, Sanmai-jita no Demaro Burakku?)
(Viz, Funimation: "Triple-Tongued")

name: Den
description: Den is Tom's younger brother. He is a bering wolffish merman. He is also a shipwright and a Sea Forest researcher.

Statistics.Occupations: Shipwright; Sea Forest Researcher; Coating Mechanic

name: Denjiro
description: Denjiro is a samurai from Wano Country and one of the Nine Red Scabbards who served as Kozuki Oden's retainers. He currently serves as the daimyo of Kibi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kozuki Family; Nine Red Scabbards; Kyoshiro Family; Kurozumi Family (undercover)
Statistics.Occupations: Daimyo; Samurai; Retainer of the Kozuki Family (former); Yakuza Boss (former); Money Changer (former); Thief (former)
Alias: "Ushimitsu Kozo" (丑三つ小僧, Ushimitsu Kozō?, Meaning "Witching Hour Boy")
Statistics.Epithet: "Dozing Kyoshiro" (居眠り狂死郎, Inemuri Kyōshirō?, VIZ: "Napping Kyoshiro")

name: Devil Dias
description: Devil Dias is a pirate and the former captain of the Acumate Pirates, but was captured and sold as a slave to the family of World Noble Saint Rosward.

name: Diamante
description: Diamante is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Diamond seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Diamante Army subdivision.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Executive Officer; Colosseum Proprietor (former); Swordsman

name: Didit
description: Didit is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island. She is the wife of Outlook III, the biological mother of Sabo, and the adoptive mother of Sterry.

name: Diesel
description: Diesel is a Longarm and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

name: Diez Barrels
description: Diez Barrels was a Marine officer who defected to become a pirate. Thirteen years ago, he was the captain of the Barrels Pirates while operating in the North Blue until he was killed by Donquixote Doflamingo during an attempt to sell the Ope Ope no Mi to the Marines. He was also the father of X Drake.

name: Dirt Boss
description: The Dirt Boss is a giant mole awoken by Gedatsu during his work for Goro in his cover story.

name: Disc J
description: Disc J is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Disco
description: Disco is the owner of the now-bankrupt Human Auctioning House at Grove 1 in Sabaody Archipelago.

Statistics.Epithet: "Walking Super Bazaar" (歩くスーパーバザール, Aruku Sūpābazāru?)

name: Dive
description: Dive is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Dobby Ibadonbo
description: Dobby Ibadonbo is a man imprisoned in Level 6 of Impel Down.

name: Doberman
description: Vice Admiral Doberman is a veteran Marine officer. He was one of the five Vice Admirals who led the Buster Call against Enies Lobby, and also took part in the Summit War of Marineford. Two years later, he is one of the nine Vice Admirals that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Dobon
description: Dobon is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi; Vice Warden of the Prisoner Mine

name: Doc Q
description: Doc Q, known as "Death God", is the doctor of the Blackbeard Pirates. Ironically, he has a sick body and needs his horse, Stronger (who is just as sick as he is), to get around.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Doctor; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Ninth Ship)
Statistics.Epithet: "Death God" (死神, Shinigami?, "Grim Reaper" in English versions)

name: Dogra
description: Dogra is a member of Dadan's bandits that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

name: Dogya
description: Dogya is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Doha Ittanka II
description: Doha Ittanka II is a prisoner from Level 6 of Impel Down.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ドーハ・イッタンカII世

name: Doll
description: Doll is a Marine Vice Admiral and Commander of the G-14 Marine Base.  She is one of the nine Vice Admirals that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Doma
description: "Bohemian Knight" Doma is an infamous New World pirate who worked for Whitebeard.

Statistics.Epithet: "Bohemian Knight" (遊騎士, Yū Kishi?)

name: Domino
description: Domino is the Head Jailer of Impel Down serving under Warden Hannyabal.

name: Domo-kun
description: Domo-kun and Nnke-kun are aliens planning to conquer the Earth. They are the first joke characters created by Oda. They first appeared in Oda's short story God's Gift for the Future. Later Domo-kun makes an appearance among the Buggy Pirates. Oda answered a question in an SBS and drew both of them. Nnke-kun appeared again alongside Pandaman on the cover of Volume 52.

Statistics.Japanese Name: どーも君, ンーケ君
Statistics.Debut: God's Gift for the Future; Chapter 9

name: Donannoyo
description: Donannoyo is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region of Wano Country.

name: Donovan
description: Donovan is one of the fifty mechanics of the Foxy Pirates. Luffy chose their flag instead of one of their shipwrights.

name: Donquino
description: Donquino was a member of the Roger Pirates.

name: Donquixote Doflamingo
description: Donquixote Doflamingo, nicknamed "Heavenly Yaksha", is the captain of the Donquixote Pirates. Prior to his imprisonment, he was a member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea with a frozen bounty of 340,000,000, as well as the most influential underworld broker under the codename "Joker". He is also a former World Noble, descended from the Donquixote Family.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Prisoner of the Great Prison; Underworld Broker; King of Dressrosa (former); World Noble (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Heavenly Yaksha" (天夜叉, Ten Yasha?, English versions: "Heavenly Demon")

name: Donquixote Homing
description: Saint Donquixote Homing was the father of Doflamingo and Rosinante. A former World Noble of the Donquixote Family, he withdrew from his position and left Mary Geoise in order to live a normal life with his family. After suffering two years of abuse from prejudiced civilians, Homing was killed by his then ten-year-old son, Doflamingo.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ドンキホーテ・ホーミング

name: Donquixote Mjosgard
description: After an attempt to recapture his freed fish-man slaves went awry, Mjosgard met Queen Otohime of Fish-Man Island's Ryugu Kingdom and became their ally and a supporter of their efforts to integrate with humans, opposing the extreme racism typical among World Nobles. During the most recent Levely he would directly oppose other World Nobles from threatening Otohime's family, which resulted in his execution.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ドンキホーテ・ミョスガルド聖
Official English Name: Don Quixote Myosgard (VIZ, Funimation dub (Ep 545), Funimation)

name: Donquixote Rosinante
description: Donquixote Rosinante was formerly a World Noble of the Donquixote Family descent, being the second son of Donquixote Homing and the younger brother of Donquixote Doflamingo. After his family lost their status as Celestial Dragons and became pariahs, Rosinante was discovered by Sengoku and enlisted into the Marines, eventually reaching the rank of Commander. Upon reuniting with Doflamingo, he feigned muteness and operated as an Elite Officer of the Donquixote Pirates, serving Doflamingo under the codename Corazon while remaining an undercover Marine.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ドンキホーテ・ロシナンテ
Statistics.Official English Name: Don Quixote Rocinante (Viz); Donquixote Rosinante (Funimation subs); Don Quixote Rosinante (Funimation dub)
Statistics.Occupations: Marine Commander; Pirate Elite Officer (undercover); World Noble (former)

name: Doran
description: Doran is a child who was captured and kept in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Doringo
description: Doringo was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Dorry
description: Dorry the Blue Ogre is a giant from Elbaf and one of the two captains of the Giant Warrior Pirates alongside Brogy. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Little Garden and Egghead Arcs.

Statistics.Epithet: Dorry the Blue Ogre (青鬼のドリー, Ao-Oni no Dorī?)

name: Dosun
description: Dosun is a hammerhead shark fish-man and was one of the officers of the New Fish-Man Pirates.

name: Dotaku
description: Dotaku is a samurai who resides in Wano Country.

name: Dracule Mihawk
description: Dracule "Hawk Eyes" Mihawk is a world-famous pirate who holds the title "Strongest Swordsman in the World".

Statistics.Japanese Name: ジュラキュール・ミホーク
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Cross Guild Chief Officer; Warlord of the Sea (former)
Epithet: "Hawk Eyes Mihawk" (鷹の目のミホーク, Taka no Me no Mihōku?, "Hawk-Eye" in the English versions)
"Strongest Swordsman in the World" (世界最強の剣士, Sekai Saikyō no Kenshi?)
"Marine Hunter" (海兵狩り, Kaihei-gari?, VIZ: "Naval Hunter")

name: Dragon Number Thirteen
description: Dragon Number Thirteen was a dragon created by Vegapunk to guard Punk Hazard. He carried out this duty even after Vegapunk and the World Government's departure until he was killed by Roronoa Zoro four years later. He was named by one of the World Nobles.

name: Draw
description: Draw is a Marine Vice Admiral and the main antagonist of One Piece novel A Volume 1.

name: Drip
description: Drip was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who was posing as the real Sanji.

name: Drophy
description: "Town-Collapser" Drophy, better known by her alias Miss Merry Christmas, is a former officer agent partnered with Mr. 4.

Statistics.Alias: "Miss Merry Christmas" (ミス・メリークリスマス, Misu Merī Kurisumasu?, 4Kids: "Ms. Groundhog's Day")
Statistics.Epithet: "Town-Collapser" Drophy (町落としのドロフィー, Machi Otoshi no Dorofī?)

name: Drug Peclo
description: Drug Peclo, also known as the Major Undertaker, is an emperor of the Underworld.

Statistics.Epithet: "Major Undertaker" (大手葬儀屋, Ōte Sōgi-ya?)

name: Ducky Bree
description: Ducky Bree is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Duval
description: Duval is the leader of the Rosy Life Riders, who were initially the Flying Fish Riders kidnapping gang in the neighborhood of Fish-Man Island and Sabaody Archipelago. He was initially an enemy of the Straw Hats; however, he has since become their ally.

Statistics.Occupations: Leader of the Rosy Life Riders (formerly the Flying Fish Riders); Slave trader (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Iron Mask Duval" (鉄仮面のデュバル, Tetsu Kamen no Dyubaru?);

name: Eddy
description: He is the bespectacled "pretty boy" of the Bellamy Pirates. He is a tall, blond man with a tan complexion. He wears glasses and a has long black and white jacket with a white t-shirt underneath. He also wears a Log Pose, as he needs it since he is the navigator of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Edison
description: Edison, also designated as Punk-03 (PUNK-03（パンク スリー）, Panku-Surī?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "thinking".

name: Edward Newgate
description: Edward Newgate, more commonly known as "Whitebeard", was the captain of the Whitebeard Pirates and was widely known as the "Strongest Man in the World" and, after Gol D. Roger's death, the "Man Closest to One Piece".

Statistics.Japanese Name: エドワード・二ューゲート
Statistics.Affiliations: Whitebeard Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Four Emperors (former)
Epithet: "Whitebeard" (白ひげ, Shirohige?, "White Beard" in the edited dub);
"The Strongest Man in the World" (世界最強の男, Sekai Saikyō no Otoko?)
"The Man Closest to One Piece" (ひとつなぎの大秘宝（ワンピース）に最も近い男, Wan Pīsu ni Mottomo Chikai Otoko?)

name: Edward Weevil
description: Edward Weevil, or "Whitebeard Jr.", is a pirate claiming to be the biological son of the now deceased Emperor Edward "Whitebeard" Newgate. He is the son of Miss Buckin, the self-proclaimed lover of Newgate. He served as one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, whom he joined sometime during the two-year timeskip, and did so until the Warlords' dissolution.

Statistics.Japanese Name: エドワード・ウィーブル

name: Eiri
description: Eiri is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was once severely injured by a young Charlotte Linlin.

name: Egana
description: Egana is Margarita's employer.

name: Eggplant Soldier
description: Eggplant Soldier is a soldier of the Big Mom Pirates, serving as a guard at the Whole Cake Chateau. He was Sanji's helper during his stay at the castle before his planned wedding to Charlotte Pudding.

name: Eikon
description: Eikon is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Tribe; Tonta Corps Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Elizabello II
description: "The Fighting King" Elizabello II is the king of Prodence Kingdom. He is also a fighter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "The Fighting King" (戦う王, Tatakau Ō?)

name: Elmy
description: Elmy is an elderly woman. She has a large mass of long, curly red hair with a small hat on top of it. She wears large amounts of dark purple eyeliner around her eyes. She has pinkish-red lipstick around her mouth, which has several teeth missing. She wears an elaborate pearl necklace just below several folds in her neck. She also wears long bejeweled earrings and a ring on each finger of at least her right hand. She wears a purple blouse.

name: Emet
description: Emet, also known as the Iron Giant, is a legendary robot that attacked Mary Geoise 200 years ago. It was originally created 900 years ago, around the time of the Void Century, for a yet unknown purpose. It was inactive due to running out of energy and is kept on Egghead. After hearing the Drums of Liberation from Monkey D. Luffy, Emet powered back up, during which it guarded Vegapunk's prerecorded video being broadcasted from within itself. It is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "Iron Giant" (鉄の巨人, Tetsu no Kyojin?)

name: Emma
description: Emma is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Emporio Ivankov
description: Emporio Ivankov, or Iva for short, is the "Queen" of the Kamabakka Kingdom, known as "Okama King" and a "Miracle Person". He is one of the Revolutionary Army's founding members, as well as the commander of the G Army, which covers the Grand Line. A former slave of the World Nobles, he escaped during the Native Hunting Competition on God Valley and was responsible for the God Valley Incident along with Ginny.

Statistics.Japanese Name: エンポリオ・イワンコフ
Statistics.Affiliations: Revolutionary Army; Freedom Fighters (former); Kamabakka Kingdom; Newkama Land (former)
Statistics.Occupations: G Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army; Queen; Slave (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Epithet: "Okama King" (オカマ王, Okama Ō?);
"Miracle Person" (奇跡の人, Kiseki no Hito?)

English Name: Hor-Hor Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Enel
description: Enel is the former tyrannical "God" of Skypiea.

Statistics.Epithet: "God Enel" (神（ゴッド）・エネル, Goddo Eneru?)

name: Enishida
description: Enishida is a member of the Kuja and one of Boa Hancock's attendants in her castle. She is a lady's maid.

name: Epoida
description: Epoida is an infamous New World pirate captain who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates, before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.

name: Époni
description: Époni is a nurse in service to the royal household of the Germa Kingdom. She was primarily charged with caring for the late queen, Vinsmoke Sora.

name: Erik
description: Erik is a member of the Rebel Army in Arabasta led by Koza. He is from Suiren, a town that had been completely dried out.

name: Erio
description: Erio was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Esta
description: Esta is a young woman. In the anime, her dress is light blue (dark in the manga), and she wears a white frilly skirt with light blue spots. She has brownish orange hair.

name: Ethanbaron V. Nusjuro
description: Saint Ethanbaron V. Nusjuro is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title Warrior God of Finance.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イーザンバロン・V（ブイ）・ナス寿郎聖
Occupations: Warrior God of Finance (財務武神, Zaimu Bushin?, VIZ: "Godhead of Finance")

name: Eustass Kid
description: Eustass "Captain" Kid is a notorious pirate from the South Blue and the captain of the Kid Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation".

Statistics.Epithet: "Captain" (キャプテン, Kyaputen?)

name: Farafra
description: Farafra was a member of the Rebel Army led by Koza along with Erik. He lost his right arm and right shoulder while protecting Koza during an enemy attack.

name: Farul
description: Farul is Cavendish's pet horse and a member of the Beautiful Pirates.

name: Faust
description: Faust is a cat mink from North Blue and a member of the Hawkins Pirates, serving as the crew's magician.

name: Fen Bock
description: Fen Bock of the Gourd is an ex-prisoner. During the Punk Hazard Arc, he worked as a satyr henchman for Caesar Clown.

Statistics.Epithet: Fen Bock of the Gourd (瓢箪フェン・ボック, Hyōtan Fen Bokku?)

name: Figarland Garling
description: Saint Figarland Garling is a World Noble of the Figarland Family and the Supreme Commander (最高司令官, Saikō Shireikan?) of the God's Knights, of whom he is the first to be introduced. He was formerly active as a "champion" on God Valley.

Statistics.Japanese Name: フィガーランド・ガーリング聖
Statistics.Occupations: Supreme Commander of God's Knights; World Noble

name: Finamore
description: Finamore is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Fillonce
description: Fillonce is an amethyst anthias mermaid and an employee at Mermaid Café.

name: Fishbonen
description: Fishbonen is a tall broad man with a distinctive hair style. He has been seen chewing a fish bone when talking, fitting his theme. He wears a stethescope, blue shirt with light-blue dots, and a yellow scarf. He has a partially visible tattoo on his left arm.

Statistics.Japanese Name: Dr. フィッシュボーネン

name: Fisher Tiger
description: Fisher Tiger, known as the Adventurer, was a sea bream Fish-Man and the founder and original captain of the Sun Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: フィッシャー・タイガー
Statistics.Occupations: Adventurer; Pirate; Captain; De-facto Leader of Fish-Man District (former); Slave (former)
Epithet: "The Adventurer" (冒険家, Bōkenka?)
"Hero of Slaves" (奴隷解放の英雄, Dorei Kaihō no Eiyū?)

name: Flapper
description: Flapper is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit, when he stopped Leo from taking Robin's clothes and belongings. He participated in Operation SOP and became a temporary victim of Sugar's Hobi Hobi no Mi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tonta Corps; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Flare
description: Flare is a character from Eiichiro Oda's One-Shot Monsters.

name: Forest Boss
description: The Forest Boss is a mandrill that was first introduced in Gedatsu's cover story.

name: Forliewbs
description: Forliewbs is a chubby man with a large rectangular flat nose, facial hair, a scar under his left eye, and wears a crown with some sort of spiral, horn-like objects. He wears an ascot around his neck and some sort of purple shawl around his shoulders. He also wears a purple long sleeved shirt, a pair of light colored pants, and has a sash going across his right side.

name: Fossa
description: Fossa is the former 15th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Fourtricks
description: Due to the nature of his SMILE transformation, much of Fourtricks' body is transformed into a large rooster, although his head is at the chicken's rear end. He wears sunglasses over his eyes and has pronounced lips, and his hair is a massive pompadour resembling a chicken's tail. He has a tattoo of the number 4 on both his left cheek and on the left side of his chicken's head, as well as a tattoo of the word "Tricks" on his forehead over his left eye. He has normal arms stretching down from the top of the chicken's backside, but his legs seem to have transformed into those of a chicken.

name: Foxy
description: Foxy the Silver Fox is the captain of the Foxy Pirates, and the main antagonist of the Long Ring Long Land Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "Silver Fox" (銀ギツネ, Gin-gitsune?)

name: Francois
description: Francois is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5.

name: Franky
description: "Iron Man" Franky is the shipwright of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the crew's eighth member and the seventh to join, doing so at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Shipwright; Senior Officer; Dismantler; Underworld boss (former); Bounty Hunter (former)
Statistics.Alias: "Fra-nosuke" (フラの介, Furanosuke?, English versions: Franosuke)
Epithet: "Iron Man" Franky ("鉄人"フランキー, Tetsujin Furankī?)
"Cyborg" Franky ("鉄人（サイボーグ）"フランキー, Saibōgu Furankī?) (former)
Statistics.Birth Name: Cutty Flam (カティ・フラム, Kati Furamu?)

name: Fuga
description: Fuga is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "two".

name: Fugar
description: Fugar is an old man with white hair, a long white beard, and a mustache. He has dentures which tend to pop out when he is talking. He wears a bicorne with his Jolly Roger on and a typical captain's coat.

Statistics.Epithet: "Memorial Blade" Fugar (慰霊刃のフガー, Ireba no Fugā?, Viz: "Fugar the Addenturer")

name: Fugetsu Kisaburo
description: Fugetsu Kisaburo is a swordsmith from the Wano Country who forged the Yakuza Kasen. He is a member of the Fugetsu Family.

name: Fugetsu Omusubi
description: Fugetsu Omusubi was a samurai who, as a member of the Fugetsu Family, served as the most recent daimyo of the Kibi region until he was imprisoned and killed by Kaidou 20 years ago.

name: Fujin
description: Fujin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)

name: Fukaboshi
description: Fukaboshi is a shark merman and the eldest son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island. After he, his father and his brothers were liberated by the Straw Hat Pirates, he allied himself with them against Hody Jones and his crew.

name: Fukumi
description: Fukumi was the younger sister of Fukurokuju.

name: Fukurokuju
description: Fukurokuju is a ninja and the previous captain of the Orochi Oniwabanshu before they joined the Beasts Pirates following Orochi's deposition. Though he pledged his team's support to Kaidou, Fukurokuju remained loyal to the surviving Orochi and helped him attempt to get revenge. However, Fukurokuju was ultimately bested in combat by his rival Raizo as his and Orochi's plot failed.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kurozumi Family; Beasts Pirates (former); Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kozuki Family (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Ninja; Captain of the Orochi Oniwabanshu (former)

name: Fukurou
description: Fukurou the Silent is an agent of CP0.

Statistics.Epithet: "Fukurou the Silent" (音無しのフクロウ, Otonashi no Fukurō?)

name: Fullbody
description: "Double Ironfist" Fullbody is a Marine lieutenant commander serving under Rear Admiral Hina. He was a Marine Headquarters lieutenant at the start of the series, but was demoted to seaman recruit as a condition when he helped the former Black Cat pirate, Jango, get acquitted for his past crimes (in the anime, it was after getting into a fight with Sanji on the Baratie). During the timeskip, however, he rose back through the ranks to become a commissioned officer once again, being one rank higher than he was to begin with in the series.

Statistics.Occupations: Marine Lieutenant Commander; Marine Seaman Recruit (promoted), Marine Lieutenant (demoted)
Epithet: "Double Ironfist Fullbody" (両鉄拳のフルボディ, Ryōtekken no Furubodi?)
"Ironfist Fullbody" (鉄拳のフルボディ, Tekken no Furubodi?) (former)

name: Funkfreed
description: Funkfreed is Spandam's sword, a unique weapon that "ate" the Zou Zou no Mi and became an Elephant Sword (象剣, Zōken?). As such, he also serves as a pet and unofficial bodyguard for Spandam, compensating his master's physical slightness.

name: Furrari
description: Furrari is the king of Nagagutsu Kingdom (ナガグツ王国, Nagagutsu Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is also the father of Tritobu.

name: Fuza
description: Fuza is the giant Three-length Bird of the Skypiean Priest Shura, who rode on it to get around to the different places at Skypiea.

name: Gab
description: "Howling" Gab is one of the Senior Officers of the Red Hair Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Howling" Gab (“ハウリング”ガブ, "Hauringu" Gabu?)

name: Gaburu
description: Commander Gaburu (ガブル隊長, Gaburu Taichō?) was a revolutionist commander who led a militia group on an unknown island.

Statistics.Epithet: "Revolution's Child" (革命の子, Kakumei no ko?)

name: Gaikotsu Yukichi
description: The Belly, commonly represented as  (a Latin lowercase esh superimposed over a capital B), is the world's main monetary unit.

name: Gaimon
description: Gaimon is a former pirate who currently lives as a hermit on the Island of Rare Animals.

Occupations: Guardian of the Island of Rare Animals

name: Gal
description: Gal is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.

name: Galaxy
description: General Galaxy is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. General Galaxy was first introduced in cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.

name: Galdino
description: "Loan Shark" Galdino, alias Mr. 3, is a former officer agent of Baroque Works, alongside his partner Miss Goldenweek.

Statistics.Affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy's Delivery; Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Baroque Works (formerly)
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Officer Agent (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Alias: "Mr. 3" (Mr. 3（ミスター・スリー）, Misutā Surī?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Loan Shark" (闇金, Yamikin?)

name: Gally
description: "Crescent-Moon" Gally is the captain of the Gally Pirates, currently active in the East Blue.

Statistics.Epithet: "Crescent-Moon Gally" (三日月のギャリー, Mikazuki no Gyarī?, Funimation: "Gally the Crescent")

name: Gama Pyonnosuke
description: Gama Pyonnosuke is a toad that sat atop Usopp's head during his stay in Wano Country.

name: Gambia
description: Gambia the Missionary is the staff officer of the Barto Club. He was also a gladiator competing at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Barto Club; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Epithet: "The Missionary" (宣教師, Senkyōshi?)

name: Gambo
description: Gambo is the deputy commander of the South Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Lindbergh.

name: Gan Fall
description: Gan Fall is the current, two-time God of Skypiea, having been usurped once by Enel. During Enel's reign as God, Gan Fall worked as a mercenary and called himself the Knight of the Sky.

Statistics.Epithet: "Knight of the Sky" (空の騎士, Sora no Kishi?, VIZ and Funimation: Sky Knight, 4Kids: Sky Lord)
Japanese VA: Ennosuke Ichikawa IV (Episode of Sky Island);

name: Gancho
description: Gancho is the king, also called "Tonta-Chief" (トンタ長, Tonta-Chō?), of the Tontatta Kingdom.

name: Gangaru
description: Gangaru is a samurai and member of the Beasts Pirates. He was formerly a member of the Mimawarigumi serving Kurozumi Orochi until Orochi's seeming death.

name: Ganryu
description: Ganryu is a member of the Spade Pirates and a member of the Longarm Tribe.

name: Ganryu
description: Ganryu was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Garudan
description: Garudan is a samurai and member of the Beasts Pirates. He was formerly a member of the Mimawarigumi serving Kurozumi Orochi until Orochi's seeming death.

name: Gatherine
description: Gatherine is a cafeteria worker at Enies Lobby.

name: Gatz
description: Gatz is the announcer at the Corrida Colosseum.

name: Gazelleman
description: Gazelleman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. After being tamed by Tama, he became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

name: Gecko Moria
description: Gecko Moria is the captain of the Thriller Bark Pirates and a former member of the Seven Warlords of the Sea who resides on Thriller Bark, the largest ship in the world. His bounty is 320,000,000, which was frozen until he lost his Warlord position.

name: Gedatsu
description: Sky Boss Gedatsu was one of Enel's priests who punished criminals with the Ordeal of Swamp during Enel's reign.

Statistics.Occupations: Priest of Enel (former), Head Clerk of Hot Springs Resort
Epithet: Sky Boss (空番長, Sora Banchō?)
Sky Punk (4Kids, FUNimation)

name: Gem
description: Gem of the Border, better known by his alias Mr. 5, was formerly the lowest-ranked officer agent in Baroque Works along with his partner, Miss Valentine. He now works as a fireman at the new Spiders Cafe alongside most of his former colleagues.

Statistics.Alias: "Mr. 5" (Mr. 5（ミスター・ファイブ）, Misutā Faibu?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Gem of the Border" (国境のジェム, Kokkyō no Jemu?)

name: Genbo
description: Genbo is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take back the Upper Yard from Enel.

name: Genrin
description: Genrin is an old man who lives in Ebisu Town.

name: Genzo
description: Genzo is the sheriff of Cocoyasi Village. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Arlong Park Arc.

name: George Black
description: Impel Down, also known as the Underwater Prison (海底監獄, Kaitei Kangoku?) and the Great Prison (大監獄, Dai Kangoku?), is a government-controlled stronghold in Paradise together with Marine Headquarters and Enies Lobby. It is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates. It is located underwater in the middle of the Calm Belt and part of the Tarai Current.

name: George Mach
description: George Mach is a former member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought Mountain Ricky before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.

name: Gerd
description: Gerd is a giant from Elbaf and the doctor of the New Giant Warrior Pirates. She was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

Statistics.Affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates; Buggy's Delivery (former); Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Gerotini
description: Gerotini is a man with a frog-like appearance. He has an oval-shaped head with short blonde hair that connects to a short beard at the sideburns. His eyes are squinted, his nose is completely flat and his upper lip is pointy at the middle. The tips of his fingers are ball-shaped, giving him his epithet. He wears a light green top hat and a tuxedo with a bowtie.

Statistics.Epithet: "Ball Fingers" Gerotini (玉指ゲロティニー, Tamayubi Gerotinī?, Viz: "Frog-Toes Ribbitini")

name: Giberson
description: Giberson, known as "The Concealer", is a veteran warehouseman and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

Occupations: Warehouseman (倉庫業老舗, Sōkogyō Shinise?, English versions: "Warehouse Kingpin");
Statistics.Epithet: "The Concealer" (隠匿師, Intoku-shi?, English versions: "The Hider")

name: Gig
description: Gig is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Gimlet
description: Gimlet was the infant son of Senor Pink and Russian.

name: Gin
description: Gin the "Man-Demon" is a pirate and the Combat Commander (戦闘総隊長, Sentō sōtaichō?) of the Krieg Pirates. He is initially introduced as a mere combatant of Krieg before his actual rank and abilities are made clear.

Statistics.Epithet: Gin the "Man-Demon" (鬼人のギン, Kijin no Gin?, 4Kids: "Diablo"; Funimation: "Cold-Hearted Demon")
Funi English VA: David Matranga (Episode of East Blue onwards)

name: Gina
description: Gina is a normal sized, attractive woman with short, wavy red hair reaching down to her neck. She also wears the same mask as other Foxy Pirates and a dark colored shirt with straps over the shoulders and short short with a belt, and long gloves, like some of the other Foxy Pirates. She wears a string abound her forehead with a green jewel on it and two red bands with a heart on her forearms. She has a thigh holster with a hammer in it.

name: Ginko
description: Ginko is a little girl who lived on Punk Hazard. She was one of the children Momonosuke met when he came to the island. She is only named in the anime.

name: Ginnosuke
description: Ginnosuke is a young boy with a round nose and pink hair. The top of his head is bald, leaving hair tied in a topknot in the back, long sideburns, and bangs with an ahoge on his forehead. He wears a light blue kimono with sharp, dark blue triangle patterns arranged in circles.

name: Ginny
description: Ginny was the former East Army commander of the Revolutionary Army, having joined the group alongside Bartholomew Kuma 22 years ago, back when they were known as the Freedom Fighters. She was the mother of Jewelry Bonney.

Statistics.Occupations: East Army Captain of the Revolutionary Army, Slave (former)

name: Ginrummy
description: Ginrummy is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.

name: Giro Chintaro
description: Giro Chintaro is a samurai from Wano Country who was appointed as the kaishakunin for Zorojuro's seppuku ritual.

name: Giolla
description: Giolla is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army.

name: Gion
description: Gion, better known by her alias Momousagi, is a Marine vice admiral.

Statistics.Alias: Momousagi (桃兎, Momousagi?, literally meaning "Pink Rabbit")

name: Giovanni
description: Giovanni is a zebra mink and one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.

name: Gismonda
description: Gismonda is a masked agent of CP0.

name: Gladius
description: Gladius is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Pica Army.

name: Gloriosa
description: Gloriosa is a former empress of the Kuja tribe from one generation before Shakuyaku, two generations before Tritoma, and three generations before Boa Hancock took over. She is more commonly referred to as "Elder Nyon". Over thirty-eight years ago, Gloriosa was part of the legendary Rocks Pirates.

Statistics.Alias: Elder Nyon (ニョン婆, Nyon Bā?)

name: Glove
description: Glove has brown puffy hair and a slight beard. He wears a metal brace around his face and is dressed in the standard Marine soldier outfit with an overcoat. Commander Glove also wears a Marine cap and blue boxing gloves.

name: Gode
description: Sage Gode is one of the three Birkan clergymen who lived on Skypiea and served Enel.

Statistics.Epithet: Sage (賢者, Kenja?, WT100: "the Wise")

name: Going Merry
description: The Going Merry was the first full-sized ship owned by the Straw Hat Pirates, a caravel that served as their main transportation through the East Blue, and the Grand Line up until Water 7. It was often affectionally referred to as simply Merry (メリー, Merī?) by the crew.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ゴーイング・メリー号

name: Goki
description: Goki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "five".

name: Gol D. Roger
description: Gol D. Roger, more commonly known as Gold Roger, was a legendary pirate who, as captain of the Roger Pirates, held the title of Pirate King and owned the legendary treasure known as One Piece. He was also the lover of Portgas D. Rouge and the biological father of Portgas D. Ace.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ゴール・D（ディー）・ロジャー
Statistics.Alias: Gold Roger (ゴールド・ロジャー, Gōrudo Rojā?)
Statistics.Epithet: Pirate King (海賊王, Kaizoku-Ō?, King of the Pirates (English versions))

name: Goldberg
description: Goldberg is a giant from Elbaf who is the cook of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

Statistics.Affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates; Buggy's Delivery (former)   Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Goldfish Princess
description: The Goldfish Princess is a character in the Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story.

name: Gomorrah
description: Gomorrah is one of the two gigantic King Bulls owned by the Franky Family, the other being Sodom.

name: Gonbe
description: Gonbe is known as Chimney's pet cat, although he is actually a rabbit.

name: Goo
description: Captain Goo is a pirate captain who, along with his crew, had their shadows stolen by Gecko Moria.

name: Gorilla
description: Captain Gorilla is a Marine officer who was sent to investigate the Nightmare of Baldimore accidentally caused by Franky.

name: Gorishiro
description: Gorishiro is a gorilla that is attached to Mizerka's body due to her consumption of a gorilla SMILE.

name: Goro
description: Goro is Toto's younger brother and Koza's paternal uncle. He appeared in Gedatsu's cover story.

name: Gorobe
description: Gorobe is a citizen of Okobore Town in the Kuri region of Wano Country.

name: Gotti
description: "Hit Man" Gotti is an assassin, a combatant in the Fire Tank Pirates, and the husband of Charlotte Lola.

name: Grabar
description: Grabar is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit. She is Leo's grandmother.

name: Gram
description: Gram was a young average sized girl, with short blond hair under a purple cap. She wore a coat that matched her hat, with a light blue shirt underneath that was darker blue at the collar, and had four white buttons.

name: Great Michael
description: Great Michael is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

name: Guernica
description: Guernica is a masked agent of CP0.

name: Guillotine
description: Guillotine is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Gyaro
description: As a pop-eyed goldfish fish-man, Gyaro has beige skin and black hair in a ponytail. He has incredibly large eye sockets but incredibly small eyes. He has a long jaw with large lips and a small mouth. He wears a normal t-shirt and pants. He has his Sun Pirates tattoo on his left and right biceps.

name: Gyogyo
description: Gyogyo is a member of the Bonney Pirates. He was once a resident of the Sorbet Kingdom, having been a friend of Bartholomew Kuma and Ginny since childhood.

name: Gyoro
description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ギョロ, ニン, バオ
Statistics.Japanese VA: Kimiko Saitō (Gyoro); Eiji Takemoto (Nin); Yuuta Kasuya (Bao)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Trina Nishimura (Gyoro); Mariela Ortiz (Nin); Ryan Reynolds (Bao)

name: Gyoru
description: Gyoru is a fishmonger in Foosha Village and the husband of Chicken. Luffy bought fish from him when he was a kid.

name: Gyro
description: Gyro is a skinny man of average height with a child-like, oval face, and a square nose. He has two red distinctive spots on his cheeks, dark hair, beard and mustache, he's missing a tooth and has what appears to be a massive four leaf clover on top of his head. He also has well-developed pectorals and abdominal muscles.

Statistics.Affiliations: Gyro Pirates, New Fish-Man Pirates (ruse, former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Crab-Hand Gyro" (蟹手のジャイロ, Kanite no Jairo?)

name: Hack
description: "Hundredth Dan" Hack is a Japanese soldierfish fish-man and a member of the Revolutionary Army, which he serves as combat instructor. He went to Dressrosa to investigate the arms trafficking there and competed at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Statistics.Epithet: "Hundredth Dan Hack" (百段ハック, Hyakudan Hakku?)(Viz: Hundredth-Degree Hack)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Garrett Schenck, Kent Williams (in some episodes)

name: Hack
description: Hack was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Hajrudin
description: Hajrudin is a giant warrior described as the "new generation" from Elbaf. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy and eventually pledged his loyalty towards him.

Statistics.Affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates, Buggy's Delivery (resigned); Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Sixth Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Pirate Captain; Mercenary (former)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Randy E. Aguebor (Episode of Sabo, Episode 639-658) Chris Guerrero (Episode 676+)

name: Hakowan
description: Hakowan is Wapol's pet dog, acquired after Wapol was permanently deposed from Drum Island.

name: Hakugan
description: Hakugan is the helmsman of the Heart Pirates.

name: Ham Burger
description: Ham Burger is the king of the Ballywood Kingdom, acting as chairman of the most recent Levely.

name: Hamburg
description: Hamburg is a combatant of the Foxy Pirates and also the leader of the Groggy Monsters. Along with Porche, he was one of Foxy's first crewmates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Four-Footed Dash Freak" (四足ダッシュの奇人, Yonsoku Dasshu no Kijin?)

name: Hamlet
description: Due to the nature of his SMILE transformation, Hamlet has an entire giraffe's body growing from his backside starting from the neck, thus leaving his main body hanging several meters in the air. He has long, shaggy bright green hair and possesses the ears and ossicones of a giraffe. He wears a regal-looking cloak that leaves his chest exposed and has pronounced shoulder pads, dark gloves, and also wears giraffe-printed pants and boots with spurs.

name: Hammond
description: Hammond is a slim-looking bright yellow skinned Fish-Man with medium-length, puffy orange hair and a long and squarish neck with a small beard. His facial features are quite sinister: they include a long and sharp beak-like muzzle, razor-like teeth, and dark, glaring eyes. On his neck he has the tattoo of the Arlong Pirates symbol near his left shoulder, in honor of Arlong and his ideals. He also wears the New Fish-Man Pirates tattoo on the right side of his abdominals.

name: Han
description: Han-ko is a child from Ebisu Town.

name: Hana
description: O-Hana is a citizen of Wano Country, residing in the Flower Capital.

name: Hanafuda
description: Hanafuda, also known as the "King of Lizards", is a former Warlord of the Sea who was defeated by Portgas D. Ace four years ago. His Warlord position was given to Bartholomew Kuma after his removal.

Statistics.Epithet: "King of Lizards" (トカゲの王, Tokage no Ō?)

name: Hangan
description: Hangan is a man with an abnormally long neck, and blue-grey hair. His cheekbones are square, along with parts of his forehead. He sports a dark coat with a white fur lined hood. He also has a black cowboy hat, and a spotted shirt under his coat.

name: Hanger
description: Hanger is an employee at Robecca Hanberg, a clothing store in Loguetown. Nami tried on all of his best clothes, but did not buy any.

name: Hanji
description: Hanji is a resident of Wano Country who has been running a pawn shop for over 10 years.

name: Hanji
description: Hanji is a former prisoner of Udon's Prisoner Mine.

name: Hannyabal
description: Hannyabal is the warden of Impel Down. He was introduced in the Impel Down Arc as the Vice Warden and secondary antagonist, but during the two year timeskip, was promoted to Magellan's former position and is now in charge of Impel Down.

name: Hanzo
description: Hanzo is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kozuki Family Oniwabanshu (anime only, former)

name: Happa Yamao
description: Happa Yamao is a civilian of Water 7 whom Usopp bought wood and supplies from in order to repair the Going Merry. Happa also gave Usopp some rice balls. He is an old bandit turned carpenter who moved to Water 7 from the "Gourmet City", Pucci.

name: Happygun
description: Happygun is a tall man with long black hair, a long pointed nose, and a triple pointed chin. He wears a purple coat with pink inner edges that exposes his chest.

name: Hara
description: Hara is a resident who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.

name: Haredas
description: Haredas is an old man who lives in Weatheria. He was Nami's tutor in weather-manipulation during the timeskip.

name: Hareji
description: Hareji is a former prisoner of Udon's prisoner mines. In the past, he was a resident of the Flower Capital. In the anime credits and closed captions, he was named Tetsu (テツ?).

name: Harisenbon
description: Harisenbon is a porcupinefish fish-man and a member of the now disbanded New Fish-Man Pirates. He was the commander of the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad Commander

name: Haritsu Kendiyo
description: Kendiyo is a large man, bigger than Kid, and slightly fat as well. He has bushy brown hair and a scraggly beard, and wore a red captain's coat over a white shirt and brown pants. He has a sword over his back.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ハリーツ・ケンディヨ

name: Haruta
description: Haruta is the former 12th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Hasami
description: Hasami is a giant desert crab from Sandy Island, and a friend of Matsuge the camel. Originally an inhabitant of the deserts near Rainbase, he currently works as an employee of Ukkari Hot-Spring Island.

Statistics.Affiliations: Ukkari Hot-Spring Island; Matsuge; Straw Hat Pirates (temporary)

name: Hatcha
description: Hatcha is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "eight".

name: Hatchan
description: Hatchan, nicknamed "Hachi" (ハチ, Hachi?), is an octopus fish-man who was an officer of the Arlong Pirates before their defeat, and a member of the Sun Pirates before that.

Statistics.Epithet: Six-Sword Style Hachi (六刀流のハチ, Rokutōryū no Hachi?)

name: Hatsume
description: Hatsume is a samurai and member of the Beasts Pirates. She was formerly a member of the Mimawarigumi serving Kurozumi Orochi until Orochi's seeming death.

name: Hattori
description: Hattori is Rob Lucci's pet pigeon, and initially acted as the target of his ventriloquism.

name: Heat
description: Heat is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Helmeppo
description: Due to his actions during his initial appearance, he can be considered a supporting antagonist of the Romance Dawn Arc. He and Koby are also the protagonists of Diary of Koby-Meppo Cover Page Serial.

name: Heppoko
description: Heppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the older triplet brother of Peppoko and Poppoko.

name: Hera
description: Hera is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum that competed for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Hera
description: Hera is a thundercloud homie created by Big Mom at Wano Country as a replacement for Zeus. She is a special kind of homie, having received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Napoleon.

name: Heracles
description: Heracles is a strange warrior that used to reside in the Greenstone forest in the Boin Archipelago. He trained Usopp in the use of Pop Greens for two years.

name: Herb
description: Herb was a Shandia from 400 years ago. She was Kalgara's wife and Mousse's mother.

name: Hewitt
description: Hewitt was the chef of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Hibari
description: Hibari is a Marine Commander and a member of SWORD.

name: Hidayu
description: Hidayu is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Higuma
description: Higuma was a mountain bandit and the leader of the Higuma Bandits. He was the first antagonist to be introduced in the series, and the first of three in the Romance Dawn Arc (third of three in the anime).

name: Hihimaru
description: Hihimaru is a baboon that was formerly a guard for the Beasts Pirates before being tamed by Tama.

Statistics.Epithet: "Raging Baboon of the Mountain" (山の暴れ狒々, Yama no Abare Hihi?)

name: Hikoichi
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Hildon
description: Hildon was a Wild Zombie that resembled a stitched-up vampire. He appeared to act as a messenger in-between the members of Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four, reporting to them noteworthy events that were happening throughout the island ship before it fell.

name: Himuro
description: Himuro is a samurai and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He was previously a member of the Mimawarigumi, which served as the police force of the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

name: Hina
description: "Black Cage" Hina is a Marine officer and a former classmate of Vice Admiral Smoker. She currently leads the Black Cage Corps, a unit (containing Jango and Fullbody among others) tasked with patrolling the seas around the Arabasta Kingdom.

Statistics.Epithet: "Black Cage Hina" (黒檻のヒナ, Kuro Ori no Hina?)

name: Hinokizu
description: Hinokizu is the name given to a mysterious man possessing a burn scar. He is rumored to possess the Road Poneglyph which was once on Fish-Man Island and whose location is now unknown. He is said to sail on an all-black ship.

name: Hip
description: Hip is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Hippan Natte
description: Hippan Natte is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.

name: Hippie
description: Hippie the Skull Curry is the captain of the Endurance Curry Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Hippie the Skull Curry" (ヒッピー・ザ・ドクロカレー, Hippī za Dokurokarē?)

name: Hippo Gentleman
description: Hippo Gentleman was a Wild Zombie who worked under Perona. He was the vice commander of the Wild Zombies.

Statistics.Official English Name: Hippo Gallant (Viz); Gentleman Hippopotamus (Funimation Sub); Hippo Gentleman (Funimation Dub)

name: Hiramera
description: Hiramera is an olive flounder mermaid and a dancer in the Mermaid Café.

name: Hiriluk
description: Dr. Hiriluk was a quack doctor from Drum Island, as well as Tony Tony Chopper's father figure. He was also a former thief.

name: Hiro Gomon
description: Hiro Gomon is a member of the Endurance Curry Pirates.

name: Hiroshi
description: Hiroshi is an older man with dark gray hair that is gathered into a topknot. He wears a vertically-striped gray and dark green kimono.

name: Hitsugisukan
description: Duke Hitsugisukan is a sheep mink and the former ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom before Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.

name: Ho
description: Dr. Ho is the palace medic of Arabasta's royal family. He seems to hold Drum medicine in high regard.

name: Hocha
description: Hocha was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Hocker
description: Hocker was the owner of the Pet Food Shop in Orange Town and the owner of Chouchou.

name: Hody Jones
description: Hody Jones is a great white shark fish-man, the captain of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall, and a former soldier of the Neptune Army.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ホーディ・ジョーンズ
Statistics.Affiliations: New Fish-Man Pirates; Ally of the Flying Pirates (former); Ryugu Kingdom (former)

name: Hoe
description: Hoe is the pet whale of King Neptune who uses him as a means of transportation. The only word he can say is his own name.

name: Hogback
description: Doctor Hogback is the world-renowned "Genius Surgeon" who joined the Thriller Bark Pirates under the employment of Gecko Moria and assisted him in creating his undead army. He was one of the Mysterious Four and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga. He also acts as the de facto main antagonist in the anime only Great Mikoshi Race Arc.

Epithet: "Doctor Hogback" (ドクトル・ホグバック, Dokutoru Hogubakku?)
"Genius Surgeon" (天才外科医, Tensai Gekai?)

name: Hoichael
description: Michael and Hoichael are two kids who are troublemakers in the backstreets of Water 7. They idolize Franky, and even dress like him and use his motto as their own: "Mm, super!!" They also idolize Paulie. However, their backstreet delinquency has earned them ire from at least Tilestone and Peepley Lulu.

name: Hoisassa
description: Hoisassa is a retainer of the Kurozumi Family.

name: Holed'em
description: Holed'em is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates, who resides in Bakura Town.

name: Holy
description: Holy is a dog raised and trained by Ohm. In addition to being Ohm's pet, he is a skilled martial artist in his own right.

name: Home
description: Home is a bull that acts as a steed for Ashura Doji.

name: Hongo
description: Hongo is the one of the Senior Officers and the doctor of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Honner
description: Dr. Honner was the doctor aboard Mont Blanc Noland's expedition fleet 400 years ago.

name: Hop
description: Hop is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Hotei
description: Hotei is the former captain of the Mimawarigumi, a samurai police force in Wano Country that served the shogun Kurozumi Orochi until he was deposed by Kaidou.

Statistics.Occupations: Samurai; Pirate; Captain of the Mimawarigumi (former)

name: Hotori
description: Hotori and Kotori are the younger brothers of Satori. They are lieutenants of the Divine Soldiers, an army of 50 warriors under the command of Yama, their leader, and Enel. They are minor antagonists during the Skypiea Arc.

name: Hototogisu
description: Hototogisu is a Marine Vice Admiral and a subordinate of Vice Admiral Tsuru.

name: Hound
description: Hound is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: House
description: House is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Hublot
description: Hublot is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Humphrey
description: Humphrey is a bartender at Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Hustle
description: Hustle is a member of the Krieg Pirates and a combat instructor.

name: Hyogoro
description: Hyogoro of the Flower is the former yakuza boss of the Flower Capital and the most famous yakuza in Wano Country during the Kozuki Family's reign. During Kurozumi Orochi's reign, he was imprisoned in Udon's prisoner mines until he was freed by Monkey D. Luffy. As a prisoner, he was known as Grandpa Hyo (ヒョウじい, Hyō-jii?).

Statistics.Alias: "Grandpa Hyo" (ヒョウじい, Hyō-jii?, English: "Old Man Hyo")
Statistics.Epithet: "Hyogoro of the Flower" (花のヒョウ五郎, Hana no Hyōgorō?, English: "Hyogoro the Flower")

name: Hyota
description: The Tsumegeri Guards were four men who drank the Hero Water and attempted to take down Crocodile, but failed and died from the water's side effects shortly after Crocodile refused to even fight them to give them an honorable death.

Statistics.Official English Name: Kicking Claw Force; Elite Alabastian Royal Guards
Statistics.Japanese VA: Katsuya Fujiwara (Arrow), Takahiro Suzuki (Hyota), Takurou Takasaki (Brahm), Unknown (Barrel)

name: Hyoutauros
description: Hyoutauros is a jaguar centaur and member of the Centaur Patrol Unit on Punk Hazard.

name: Hyouzou
description: Hyouzou is a poisonous blue-ringed octopus merman. Prior to his imprisonment, he was a mercenary and working as the New Fish-Man Pirates' assassin, and later became one of the officers. Hyouzou was also known as the best swordsman on Fish-Man Island.

Statistics.Occupations: Mercenary; Pirate; Assassin; Pirate Officer; Swordsman

name: Ibiributsu
description: Ibiributsu is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region of Wano Country. He is in charge of exchanging meal tickets for kibi dango.

name: Ibusu
description: Ibusu is a short man with a long, unkempt beard and thick lips. He wears a pirate captain's jacket and hat with his crew's jolly roger—a standard skull with crossbones—on it and a white, frilled shirt underneath.

name: Iceburg
description: Iceburg is the president of the Galley-La Company and the mayor of Water 7.

Statistics.Occupations: President of the Galley-La Company; Mayor of Water 7

name: Ichika
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Tsū
Statistics.Official English Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two

name: Ideaman
description: Ideaman is a member of Krieg Pirates. He is the Staff Officer of Planning.

name: Ideo
description: "Destruction Cannon" Ideo is a XXX rank boxer and a member of the Longarm Tribe, as well as the captain of the Ideo Pirates and of the fourth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met three other gladiators with whom he would form the then-XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, as well as Monkey D. Luffy, to whom he eventually pledged his loyalty.

Statistics.Affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Fourth Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Pirate, Captain; Boxer
Statistics.Epithet: "Destruction Cannon" (破壊砲, Hakai Hō?)

name: Igaram
description: Igaram is the captain of the Arabasta royal guard (captain of Arabasta security in the English dub). He aided Nefertari Vivi in infiltrating Baroque Works as a Frontier Agent and took on the codename Mr. 8. He was partnered with Miss Monday. He is also Terracotta's husband. He is an ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Whisky Peak (after being a minor antagonist) and Arabasta Arcs.

Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Royal Guard; Frontier Agent (former); Bounty Hunter (former); Mayor of Whisky Peak (undercover, former)

name: Ikaros Much
description: Ikaros Much is a giant squid fish-man and an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.

name: Ikkaku
description: Ikkaku is the only female member of the Heart Pirates.

name: Ikkaku
description: Ikkaku is an announcer who commentates sumo matches in Bakura Town in Wano Country.

name: Imu
description: Imu is the supreme ruler of the World Government, who occupies the Empty Throne and whom even the Five Elders bow to and serve unquestioningly. However, Imu's existence is kept an absolute secret within the government and from the world at large, to maintain the lie that there is no singular ruler of the world.

name: Inazuma
description: Inazuma is a newkama and the deputy commander of the G Army in the Revolutionary Army, serving under Emporio Ivankov as his right hand man.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kamabakka Kingdom; Newkama Land; Revolutionary Army; Impel Down (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Revolutionary; Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)

English Name: Shear-Shear Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Inbi
description: Like the other Numbers, Inbi is immensely tall, towering over even normal giants and being similar in size to an ancient giant.

name: Indigo
description: Dr. Indigo is the scientist of the Golden Lion Pirates and the secondary antagonist of the tenth One Piece movie. He is the one who created Boss and the other monstrous animals under Shiki's dominion.

name: Inhel
description: Inhel is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the Riku Royal Army Headquarters beneath the Flower Field.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom Scouting Unit; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Inoichibannosuke
description: Inoichibannosuke is a balding man with a tall row of black hair on top of his head resembling a mohawk, as well as hair on the sides of his head slicked toward each side. He wears a low-cut dark blue sleeveless shirt with the symbol of the Igumi on the front in red; the shirt narrows in a trapezoidal shape up toward the top and the front and back of it are held together by strings. Inoichibannosuke also wears light blue shorts lined with fur at the bottom, black leggings, and sandals.

name: Inuarashi
description: Duke Inuarashi is a canine mink and was one of the two rulers of the Mokomo Dukedom, dubbed the "Ruler of Day" as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 AM to 6:00 PM. He and Nekomamushi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Musketeers; Kozuki Family; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded); Nine Red Scabbards; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Ruler of the Mokomo Dukedom (former); Commander of the Musketeers; Retainer; Samurai; Pirate Apprentice (former)
Epithet: "Duke Inuarashi" (イヌアラシ公爵, Inuarashi Kōshaku?, English versions: "Duke Dogstorm")
"Ruler of Day" (昼の王, Hiru no Ō?, Simulcast subs: "King of Day")

name: Inukai
description: Inukai is a Wano Country official.

name: Inuppe
description: Inuppe was a Wild Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback.

name: Ipponmatsu
description: Ipponmatsu is the owner of an arms shop in Loguetown and Ipponume's husband. He was the former owner of both Sandai Kitetsu and Yubashiri.

name: Ipponume
description: Ipponume is Ipponmatsu's wife.

name: Isa
description: Isa is a Shandia woman and Aisa's mother.

name: Ishigo Shitemanna
description: Ishigo Shitemanna is an appraiser in Water 7.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イーシゴ・シテマンナ

name: Ishilly
description: Ishilly is a striped beakfish mermaid who lives on Fish-Man Island and was first seen in Mermaid Cove. She is an employee at Mermaid Café.

name: Island Eater
description: Island Eater was an enormous fish, rivaling the size of even the most massive of Sea Kings. He resembled a typical white-red colored goldfish, with protruding eye sockets and a wide mouth that had a set of large teeth.

name: Islewan
description: Islewan is a massive man whose face greatly resembles that of a walrus, with massive tusks and a large chin. He has black circles around his eyes and a scar under his right eye. Long blonde hair flows on the back of his neck from under his metal helmet, he wears a black and red captain's coat and long gloves almost reaching to his shoulders. He also sports an armor consisting of a barrel-like breastplate and shoulder pads, with porthole-like openings on them.

name: Issho
description: Issho, better known by his alias Fujitora, is an Admiral in the Marines. He was conscripted through a World Military Draft during the two-year timeskip, being appointed to his rank to fill one of the Admiral vacancies caused by Kuzan's resignation and Sakazuki's promotion. A proponent of "Humane Justice", Fujitora notably spearheaded a campaign for the abolishment of the "Seven Warlords of the Sea" system, which came to pass during the most recent Levely.

name: Isuka
description: "Nailing" Isuka is a Marine Ensign that confronted the Spade Pirates during their time of activity.

Statistics.Epithet: "Nailing" (釘打ち, Kugi-uchi?, VIZ Media: Nailer)

name: Itomimizu
description: Itomimizu is the former Foxy Pirates' game official and serves as the announcer and commentator of the Davy Back Fight events. He rides on a very large bird named Chuchun.

name: Ivan X
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Izou
description: Izou was the former 16th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates and prior to this, a retainer of the Wano Country daimyo Kozuki Oden. He was the older brother of fellow retainer Kikunojo.

Statistics.Occupations: 16th Division Commander (former); Samurai; Retainer of the Kozuki Family

name: Iwatobi
description: Iwatobi is the king of Whiteland Kingdom (ホワイトランド王国, Howaitorando Ōkoku?) in the North Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Iyan'eno Chinode
description: Iyan'eno Chinode is a writer for the fashion column "Streetcorner Collection" in the World Economy News Paper.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イヤンエーノウ・チノデ

name: Jabra
description: Jabra is an agent of CP0. He was previously an agent of CP9, being the third strongest of this agency.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf

name: Jack
description: Jack the Drought is a giant grouper fish-man, an All-Star of the Beasts Pirates as one of Kaidou's three closest confidants, and the captain of the Mammoth. He was formerly considered to be the ruler of Kuri in Wano Country.

Statistics.Occupations: All-Star; Captain of the Mammoth; De Facto Ruler of Kuri (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Jack the Drought" (旱害のジャック, Kangai no Jakku?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
Devil Fruit.English Name: Elephant-Elephant Fruit, Ancient Zoan Model: Mammoth (Funimation), Eleph-Eleph Fruit Ancient Zoan Model Mammoth

name: Jack-in-the-Box
description: Zombies are corpses capable of self-movement and other sentient actions. Well-known in superstitions and literature throughout the world, they can be created in actuality through at least one method: infusing corpses with shadows via the Kage Kage no Mi.

name: Jacksonbanner
description: Jacksonbanner was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Jaguar
description: Jaguar is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Jaguar D. Saul
description: Jaguar D. Saul is a giant and former Vice Admiral who deserted the Marines and happened to wash ashore on Ohara.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ハグワール・D（ディー）・サウロ

name: Jaki
description: Jaki is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "four".

name: Jalmack
description: Though his initial appearance is hidden in the shadows, Jalmack has a similar hairstyle as the Rosward family, but his goes up in two bulbs. He also has a wide chin and wears a red earring on his right ear.

name: Jango
description: The subject of this article is sometimes called Django.

Statistics.Occupations: Marine Lieutenant Commander; Marine Seaman Recruit (promoted); Pirate (former); Captain (former), First Mate (former), Dancer (former)
Epithet: "One-Two" Jango (as a pirate) (1・2のジャンゴ, Ichi Ni no Jango?);
"Jango the Turncoat" (Marine) (寝返りのジャンゴ, Negaeri no Jango?)

name: Jarul
description: "Mountain Beard" Jarul is a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, alongside Jorul. Along with Jorul, he is known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.

Statistics.Epithet: "Mountain Beard" Jarul (山ひげのヤルル, Yamahige no Yaruru?, VIZ: Beardhill)

name: Jaygarcia Saturn
description: Saint Jaygarcia Saturn is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government and a scientist by trade, possessing the title Warrior God of Science and Defense.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ジェイガルシア・サターン聖
Occupations: Warrior God of Science and Defense (科学防衛武神, Kagaku Bōei Bushin?, VIZ: "Godhead of Science & Defense");

name: Jean Ango
description: Jean Ango, also known as Jean the Bandit, is a bounty hunter. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Statistics.Epithet: "Jean the Bandit" (追剥のジャン, Oihagi no Jan?)

name: Jean Bart
description: Jean Bart is a pirate who was originally introduced as Saint Rosward's slave, being part of his Pirate Captain Collection. He currently serves under Trafalgar Law as a member of the Heart Pirates after being freed from the World Noble.

Statistics.Affiliations: Heart Pirates; his own crew (former); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance

name: Jean Goen
description: Jean Goen is a prisoner on Level 1 of Impel Down.

name: Jeep
description: Jeep is a slightly stocky man with thick lips, high cheekbones, small ears, small eyes, and a high forehead with a mole on the right side. His dark orange hair is pulled up to his small gold crown.

name: Jeet
description: Jeet is a criminal and a former bounty hunter who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, along with his partner, Abdullah. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc. After the battle with the Donquixote Pirates at Dressrosa, he joined the XXX Gym Martial Arts Alliance, which later converted to a pirate crew called the Ideo Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Ideo Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Jerry
description: Jerry is a Cipher Pol agent of CP6. He was found as head of security of the Puffing Tom's seventh railcar, which Sanji invaded to rescue Nico Robin. He comes from Karate Island in the South Blue, and claims to be a boxing champion.

name: Jero
description: Jero is a member of the G-5 branch of the Marines.

name: Jesus Burgess
description: Jesus Burgess, better known as the "Champion", is the helmsman and one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as the captain of the First Ship.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ジーザス・バージェス
Statistics.Occupations: Helmsman; Titanic Captain (Captain of the First Ship)
Statistics.Epithet: "Champion" (チャンピオン, Chanpion?)

name: Jew Wall
description: Mock Town, known as the "Town of Ridicule" (嘲りの街, Azakeri no Machi?), is a port town on the western coast of Jaya. It is inhabited mostly by pirates, despite it looking like a resort.

name: Jewelry Bonney
