description: Jewelry Bonney, also known as the "Big Eater", is a pirate from the South Blue and the captain of the Bonney Pirates. She is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation".

Statistics.Epithet: "Big Eater" (大喰らい, Ō-Gurai?, English versions: "Glutton")

name: Jibuemon
description: Jibuemon is a former retainer from Kibi serving under the Kozuki Shogunate. As a hatamoto, he directly served under the former shogun, Kozuki Sukiyaki.

Statistics.Occupations: Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Samurai

name: Jigoku Benten
description: Jigoku Benten is a kunoichi and a member of the Beasts Pirates. She previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)

name: Jigokukamabuta Megatenpanchiro
description: Jigokukamabuta Megatenpanchiro was a retainer of Shimotsuki Family under the Daimyo of Hakumai, Shimotsuki Yasuie.

Statistics.Japanese Name: 地獄釜蓋 目我点藩血ロウ

name: Jigoro
description: Jigoro of the Wind was a General Zombie on Thriller Bark in the service of Gecko Moria who was eventually assigned to guard Hogback. As he had Zoro's shadow, he was a user of Three Sword Style.

Statistics.Epithet: "Jigoro of the Wind" (風のジゴロウ, Kaze no Jigorō?)

name: Jigra
description: Jigra was an organ trader and a member of the Underworld who attempted to attack the Big Mom Pirates. In the anime, he is also part of the Organ Dealing Assassination Group

name: Jinbe
description: "Knight of the Sea" Jinbe is the helmsman of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the tenth member of the crew and the ninth to join, doing so during the Wano Country Arc.

Affiliations: Ally of the Big Mom Pirates (former);
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Helmsman; Senior Officer; Captain (former); Warlord of the Sea (former); Soldier (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Epithet: "Knight of the Sea" Jinbe (海侠のジンベエ, Kaikyō no Jinbē?, English versions: "First Son of the Sea")
"Boss Jinbe" (ジンベエ親分, Jinbē Oyabun?)

name: Jiron
description: Jiron is the  deputy commander of the North Army in the Revolutionary Army and the assistant of Karasu.

name: Jobo
description: Jobo is a citizen of Mock Town.

name: John
description: Captain John was a famous pirate captain who was once a member of the infamous Rocks Pirates prior to forming his own crew. He was notable for collecting one of the most significant treasures in the world; his fabled treasure cave and the riches within, which are notably long sought after by Buggy.

Statistics.Affiliations: Rocks Pirates (former); Thriller Bark Pirates (post mortem)
Statistics.Epithet: Captain John (キャプテン・ジョン, Kyaputen Jon?)

name: John Giant
description: John Giant is a Vice Admiral in the Marine Headquarters, and the first giant to ever enlist in the Marines.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ジョン・ジャイアント

name: Johnny
description: Johnny along with Yosaku are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.

name: Jorge
description: Jorge was the head of the Judicial Ship that sailed to Water 7. He was the one who judged Tom for his support of the Pirate King Gol D. Roger.

name: Joseph
description: Joseph is a masked agent of CP0 and a Longarm tribesman.

name: Joshu
description: Joshu is a cat and Edison's assistant on Egghead.

name: Jorul
description: "Waterfall Beard" Jorul was a giant and former co-captain of the Giant Warrior Pirates, along with Jarul. He was known as a hero of the giants and one of the world's oldest warriors.

Statistics.Epithet: "Waterfall Beard" Jorul (滝ひげのヨルル, Takihige no Yoruru?, VIZ: Beardfall)

name: Joy Boy
description: Joy Boy was a man from the Great Kingdom born 900 years ago at the start of the Void Century, as well as the very first pirate in history. An extremely relevant figure in the Void Century, Joy Boy played an important role in the history of Fish-Man Island and left behind a certain item of unimaginable value on the last island of the Grand Line, thus becoming a legendary and remembered figure in the world.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika

name: Jozu
description: "Diamond" Jozu is the former 3rd division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates, serving as one of the crew's most prominent members.

Statistics.Epithet: "Diamond" Jozu (ダイヤモンド・ジョズ, Daiyamondo Jozu?)

name: Judy
description: Judy is a young man with shaggy light brown hair. He wore a blue shirt along with a white apron with the kanji for "alcohol" written on it. He also wore a pair of yellow pants with square patterns.

name: Jujiro
description: Jujiro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Juki
description: Due to his actions and role, he is a minor antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

name: Julius
description: Julius is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

name: Junan
description: Junan is a fish-man and a cashier at Pappag's Criminal Brand store.

name: Kabu
description: Kabu is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who is the leader of the Yellow Kabu Squad and a member of the Tontatta Pirates.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Leader of Yellow Kabu Squad; Pirate

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi

name: Kadar
description: Rear Admiral Kadar is a Marine rear admiral at the G-2 Marine base from fifteen years ago. His current location and rank are unknown.

name: Kagero
description: Kagero is a priest and samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance for the Raid on Onigashima.

name: Kagikko
description: Kagikko is a member of the Krieg Pirates and a locksmith.

name: Kaidou
description: Kaidou of the Beasts, renowned as the world's "Strongest Creature", is the Governor-General of the Beasts Pirates and was formerly one of the Four Emperors that ruled over the New World. He is also the father of Yamato.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Four Emperors (former)
Epithet: "Kaidou of the Beasts" (百獣のカイドウ, Hyakujū no Kaidō?, English versions: "Kaido, King of the Beasts")
"The Strongest Creature" (最強の生物, Saikyō no Seibutsu?)
"Wise King" (明王, Myōō?, English versions: "Deity")

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu

name: Kairen
description: Kairen is a mermaid with a somewhat wide face, red lipstick, and long, flowing blonde hair. She wears a white, revealing bikini, with a purple stripe-like pattern on it, that looks similar to the marine's "MÖWE" logo.

name: Kairiken
description: Kairiken is a bounty hunter at Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Kairo Kureyo
description: Kureyo has frozen spiky hair and wears a prisoner uniform that is almost completely covered in ice.

name: Kaku
description: Kaku is a masked agent of CP0. He was previously an assassin of CP9, operating undercover in order to obtain the Pluton blueprints from Iceburg. While undercover, he acted as one of the five foremen of Galley-La Company's Dock One, specializing in mechanics, diagnostics, and housecalls.

Statistics.Epithet: "Mountain Wind" (山風, Yamakaze?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe

name: Kaku
description: Kaku is a gangster who is a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.

name: Kakukaku
description: Kakukaku is a man with rectangular and square-like features, such as his rectangular head with black hair and his rectangular nose. He has a small necklace around his neck and wears two layers of clothing with a pair of pants that have a spiral design. In the digitally colored manga, his short-sleeved shirt is red with outer edges that are yellow, his button-up long-sleeved undershirt is brown, and his pants are green with the spiral designs being yellow. In the anime, however, he sports a brown short sleeved shirt over a red button-up undershirt.

name: Kakunoshin
description: Kakunoshin is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Kalgara
description: Kalgara was a hero of the Shandia who lived while Upper Yard was still a part of Jaya (some 400 years ago), and who befriended the explorer Mont Blanc Noland (the ancestor of Mont Blanc Cricket). A statue of him was erected after his death as an eternal reminder to the Shandia of his strength and courage. He had a daughter named Mousse. Wyper is his descendant.

Statistics.Epithet: "Shandora's Demon" (シャンドラの魔物, Shandora no Mamono?)

name: Kalifa
description: Kalifa is a Cipher Pol agent of CP0.

name: Kamakiri
description: Kamakiri is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take Upper Yard from Enel. After the timeskip, he joined the God's Guards under Wyper.

name: Kamekichi
description: Kamekichi is a newspaper deliveryman in the Flower Capital who announced reports of Kamazo the Manslayer and Ushimitsu Kozo.

name: Kamijiro
description: Kamijiro is a lion's head, legs, and tail that are attached to Holed'em's body due to his consumption of a lion SMILE.

name: Kaneshiro
description: Kaneshiro is the shipwright of the Arlong Pirates and a goldfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.

name: Kanezenny
description: Kanezenny is an elderly farm woman from Nico Robin's past.

name: Kappa
description: Kappa is a young shoeshine-boy in Nanohana.

name: Karasu
description: Karasu is the commander of the North Army in the Revolutionary Army.

Statistics.Occupations: North Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army

name: Karma
description: Karma is an octopus fish-man and the captain of the Takotopus Pirates, an infamous New World pirate crew subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Karoo
description: Karoo is Nefertari Vivi's pet super spot-billed duck, a fleet riding bird (one of the fastest modes of transportation available in the Arabasta Kingdom). Alongside his owner Vivi, Karoo infiltrated the organization known as Baroque Works. With her, he ended up traveling with the Straw Hat Pirates for most of the Arabasta Saga after their cover was blown. He is the leader of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops in Arabasta.

Statistics.Affiliations: Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops, Nefertari Vivi, Straw Hat Pirates (former), Baroque Works (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Pet; Royal Transport; Captain of the Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops; Pirate (former)

name: Kasa
description: Kasa is an elderly woman from Raijin Island.

name: Kasagoba
description: He is a stocky, beige fish-man with brown spots on his thick neck. He has pink trailings with yellow on the tips on his head and neck. He also appears to wear a white tank top and vertically striped pants. He also has a very large grin.

name: Kashii
description: Kashii, together with Oimo, was one of the two giants who guarded the front gate of Enies Lobby for over fifty years until he and Oimo realized they were tricked by the World Government. He is a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates. He and Oimo became major allies to the Straw Hat Pirates during the Enies Lobby Arc and Egghead Arc.

name: Kashigami
description: Kashigami was a giant snake that lived on Jaya four centuries ago. It was worshiped by the Shandia as a god until it was slain by Mont Blanc Noland. It is the grandparent of Nola, who lives on the land in the present day.

Epithet: "God of the Sun" (太陽の神, Taiyō no Kami?)
"God of the Rain" (雨の神, Ame no Kami?)
"God of the Forest" (森の神, Mori no Kami?)
"God of the Earth" (大地の神, Daichi no Kami?)

name: Katsuzo
description: Katsuzo was a citizen of Wano Country. He died 41 years before the present day, and his cremated body was used by Kozuki Oden to cook a pot of oden.

name: Kawamatsu
description: Kawamatsu the Kappa is a Japanese puffer fish-man who is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler. As a child, he was shipwrecked in Wano and orphaned soon afterwards. After Kozuki Oden rescued him from an attempted lynching, he went on to serve as one of Oden's Nine Red Scabbards until Oden's death 20 years ago.

Statistics.Occupations: Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Samurai; Sumo Wrestler; Highway Robber (former)
Epithet: "Kawamatsu the Kappa" (河童の河松, Kappa no Kawamatsu?),
"Yokozuna Kawamatsu" (横綱河松, Yokozuna Kawamatsu?)

name: Kaya
description: Kaya is a young woman who lives in the largest mansion in Syrup Village on the Gecko Islands. She is a close friend of Usopp and is currently studying to become a doctor.

name: Kazekage
description: Kazekage is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

name: Kazenbo
description: Kazenbo was a flaming ghost-like entity created by Kurozumi Kanjuro, with the power of the Fude Fude no Mi, for the purpose of destroying Onigashima. It was created to symbolize the "burning hatred" (燃える怨念, moeru onnen?) of the Kurozumi Family against those who wronged them.

name: Kebi
description: Kebi was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza and Okame.

Statistics.Affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom; Suna Suna Clan (formerly); Rebel Army (formerly)

name: Kechatch
description: Kechatch is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Keith
description: Keith is an average-sized monkey mink with a curled tail and brown fur. He wears a black suit with a black tie, a light-colored shirt, black pants, and a black top hat on his head. He also wears a red ascot and two black paw gauntlets on his hands.

name: Kentauros
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Kelly Funk
description: Kelly Funk is an assassin from the Mogaro Kingdom and Bobby Funk's older brother. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Kerville
description: Three-Headed Baskerville is the Chief Justice of Enies Lobby, in service of the World Government. Ostensibly a three-headed man, "he" is actually three men—Bas, And, and Kerville—who are such close friends that they prefer acting as one body.

Statistics.Epithet: "Three-Headed Baskerville" (3つ首のバスカビル, Mitsu-Kubi no Basukabiru?)

name: Kibagaeru
description: Kibagaeru was the captain of the Fanged Toad Pirates until he lost to Foxy at the Davy Back Fight and joined his crew but eventually left sometime during the Timeskip. Due to his anime-exclusive actions, he can be considered one of the main antagonists of the Foxy's Return Arc.

name: Kibin
description: Commodore Kibin is a Marine officer that debuted during the Marineford Arc. His canon name and rank are unknown. However, in the anime, he was given the name Kibin and the rank of Commodore.

name: Kiev
description: Kiev is a member of the Franky Family.

name: Kikipatsu
description: Kikipatsu is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

name: Kiku
description: Kiku is a member of the Kuja. She is never seen but her name appears on the match-ups of the arena battle board.

name: Kikunojo
description: Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow, more commonly referred to as Kiku, is a samurai from Wano Country and a retainer for the Kozuki Family, serving as one of Kozuki Oden's Nine Red Scabbards. She is also the younger sister of Izou and the daughter of the dancing school head of the Hanayanagi School (花柳流, Hanayanagi-ryū?) in Ringo.

Statistics.Occupations: Samurai; Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Tea House Poster Girl
Statistics.Epithet: "Kikunojo of the Lingering Snow" (残雪の菊之丞, Zansetsu no Kikunojō?, English: "Kikunojo of the Fallen Snow")

name: Kikyo
description: Kikyo is a Kuja warrior from Amazon Lily.

name: Killer
description: "Massacre Soldier" Killer is a pirate from the South Blue and a combatant of the Kid Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". After the timeskip, his bounty has been raised from 162,000,000 to 200,000,000.

Statistics.Alias: "Kamazo the Manslayer" (人斬り鎌ぞう, Hitokiri Kamazō?, VIZ: "Hitokiri Kamazo")
Statistics.Epithet: "Massacre Soldier" (殺戮武人, Satsuriku Bujin?, VIZ: "Murder Machine")

name: Kimel
description: Kimel is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Kin'emon
description: "Foxfire Kin'emon" is a samurai from the region of Kuri in Wano Country, a retainer of the Kozuki Family, the leader of the Nine Red Scabbards, the husband of Tsurujo, and a former thug. He was born 56 years before the present day, but traveled 20 years forward in time when he was 36 years old.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kozuki Family; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance; Nine Red Scabbards
Statistics.Occupations: Samurai; Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Leader of the Nine Red Scabbards; Thief (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Foxfire Kin'emon" (狐火の錦えもん, Kitsune-bi no Kin'emon?)

English Name: Garb-Garb Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Kinbo
description: Kinbo is a boy who lives in Okobore Town of Kuri with his mother Yame and his little brother.

name: Kinderella
description: Kinderella, also known as Miss Universe, is a woman who married Wapol after he became the head of his own corporation. Two years after that, she became the queen of Black Drum Kingdom when Wapol became its king.

Statistics.Epithet: "Miss Universe" (ミス・ユニバース, Misu Yunibāsu?)

name: King
description: King the Conflagration is one of the three All-Stars of the Beasts Pirates and Kaidou's right-hand man. Born as Alber, he is a member of the near-extinct lunarian race from the Red Line, noted for their ability to create fire.

Statistics.Epithet: "King the Conflagration" (火災のキング, Kasai no Kingu?, English versions: "King the Wildfire")

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon

name: Kingbaum
description: Kingbaum is a tree homie, a member of the Big Mom Pirates, and the master of the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island. However, he was forced to serve the Straw Hat Pirates due to them possessing Charlotte Linlin's Vivre Card.

name: Kinga
description: Kinga is an infamous New World pirate who was once a member of the Whitebeard Pirates before forming his own crew subordinate to Whitebeard.

name: Kingdew
description: Kingdew is the former 11th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Kinoko
description: Kinoko is a former prisoner on Level 5 of Impel Down and is currently a member of the Buggy Pirates, joining after his escape from Impel Down and the Summit War of Marineford.

name: Kirinkodanuki
description: Kirinkodanuki is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.

Statistics.Affiliations: Animals of the Island of Rare Animals

name: Kirintauros
description: Kirintauros is a giraffe centaur and member of the Centaur Patrol Unit on Punk Hazard.

name: Kisegawa
description: Kisegawa is a geisha from the Flower Capital of Wano Country. She once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.

name: Kitton
description: Kitton is seen wearing a parka, a pair of boots, and a gun during his first appearance. Later on in his house, he is seen wearing a sweater. His house appears to be a mechanical looking igloo.

name: Kiwi
description: Mozu and Kiwi, also known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyle, are two members of the Franky Family very loyal to Franky, who went with him everywhere and tended to mimic every pose he did.

Statistics.Epithet: Square Sisters (スクエアシスターズ, Sukuea Shisutāzu?)

name: Koala
description: Koala is a high ranking officer of the Revolutionary Army, serving as the Fish-Man Karate assistant instructor. She started as a slave on Mary Geoise, but was then set free by Fisher Tiger's rampage. She sailed along with the Sun Pirates to reach her home town. At some point before the Summit War of Marineford, she joined the Revolutionary Army, where she often works alongside both Sabo and Hack.

Statistics.Occupations: Revolutionary Army Officer; Assistant Fish-Man Karate Instructor; Slave (former)
Statistics.Residence: Baltigo (former); Foolshout Island (former); Mary Geoise (former); Momoiro Island

name: Kobe
description: Kobe is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country and the landlord for the Longhouses. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.

name: Koby
description: Koby the Hero is a Marine Captain who trained together with Helmeppo under Vice Admiral Garp's supervision. He is currently a member of the Marine special forces unit SWORD.

Statistics.Occupations: Marine Captain; Master Chief Petty Officer (promoted), Chore Boy (promoted); Pirate Ship Caretaker (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Hero" (英雄, Eiyū?)

name: Koda
description: Koda is a short, relatively pudgy woman who wears a marine apron and a dotted shirt.

name: Koito
description: Koito has a rather wide mouth with large teeth, and is missing a tooth in the right side. She has brown hair done in a bun.

name: Kojuro
description: Kojuro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Kokoro
description: Kokoro is an icefish mermaid and the stationmaster for Shift Station, a Sea Train station near Water 7. She was also Tom's secretary during the days of Tom's Workers.

name: Komachiyo
description: Komachiyo is a komainu that resides in the Kuri region of Wano Country. It has been Kurozumi Tama's best friend since their childhood.

name: Komakkov
description: "Winter Cuisine" Komakkov is a chef under the employment of the Marines as one of its Four Head Chefs.

Statistics.Epithet: "Winter Cuisine" Komakkov (冬料理のコマッコフ, Fuyu Ryōri no Komakkofu?)

name: Komane
description: Komane is the deposed princess of the Lulusia Kingdom, being the daughter of the former king Seki.

name: Konbu
description: Konbu is a child who lived in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Kong
description: Kong is the World Government Commander-in-Chief. He was a Fleet Admiral of the Marines at the time of the Battle in Edd War twenty-seven years ago. Some time after, he was promoted while Sengoku eventually became the new Fleet Admiral.

name: Kop
description: Kop is a member of the Franky Family.

name: Kotatsu
description: Kotatsu is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Kotetsu
description: Kotetsu was a swordsmith who crafted the cursed Great Grade sword Nidai Kitetsu. He is an ancestor of the present-day Kozuki Family in Wano Country, namely Sukiyaki, Oden, Momonosuke, and Hiyori.

name: Kotori
description: Hotori and Kotori are the younger brothers of Satori. They are lieutenants of the Divine Soldiers, an army of 50 warriors under the command of Yama, their leader, and Enel. They are minor antagonists during the Skypiea Arc.

name: Koyama
description: Koyama, as named by Kozuki Oden and his retainers, is a white boar and the child of the Mountain God that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was kidnapped from its parent and later stolen by Kin'emon.

name: Koza
description: Koza is princess Nefertari Vivi's childhood friend. As a child, he was the leader of the Suna Suna Clan. As an adult, he became the leader of the Arabasta Rebellion. He later became the environmental minister of the Arabasta Kingdom.

name: Koze
description: Koze and Packy were members of the Yes Pirates.

name: Kozuki Hiyori
description: Kozuki Hiyori is the daughter of the late Kozuki Oden and Kozuki Toki and the younger sister of Kozuki Momonosuke.

name: Kozuki Momonosuke
description: Kozuki Momonosuke is the current shogun of Wano Country, as well as the son of the late daimyo of Kuri, Kozuki Oden and Toki, the grandson of the former shogun, Kozuki Sukiyaki and the older brother of Kozuki Hiyori.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu (Artificial)

name: Kozuki Oden
description: Kozuki Oden was the daimyo of Kuri in Wano Country and the son of the former shogun Kozuki Sukiyaki, being a member of the Kozuki Family. He was the husband of Kozuki Toki and the father of Momonosuke and Hiyori. Additionally, he was the leader of a group of legendary and powerful samurai known as the Nine Red Scabbards, with all of them serving as his retainers and most trusted allies.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kozuki Family; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Idiot Lord" (バカ殿, Bakatono?, VIZ: "Fool of a Lord")

name: Kozuki Sukiyaki
description: Kozuki Sukiyaki is the former shogun of Wano Country. He is the father of the late daimyo of Kuri, Kozuki Oden, as well as the grandfather of current shogun Kozuki Momonosuke and Hiyori. The descendant of the legendary swordsmith Kotetsu, he is a swordsmith by hobby and crafted one of Roronoa Zoro's swords, Sandai Kitetsu, as well as Ame no Habakiri, which was previously wielded by Oden and currently by his son, Momonosuke.

Statistics.Residence: Wano Country (Amigasa Village, formerly Flower Capital)

name: Kozuki Toki
description: Kozuki Toki, born Amatsuki, was the wife of the daimyo of Kuri, Kozuki Oden and the mother of Kozuki Momonosuke and Kozuki Hiyori.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kozuki Family; Amatsuki Family; Whitebeard Pirates (former); Roger Pirates (former)
Statistics.Birth Name: Amatsuki Toki (天月トキ, Amatsuki Toki?)

name: Krieg
description: Don Krieg is the admiral of the Krieg Pirates and an infamous pirate of East Blue. Because of his underhanded methods and domination over a fleet of 50 pirate ships, he is infamously known as Foul-Play Krieg and Pirate Fleet Admiral.

Epithet: "Don Krieg" (首領（ドン）・クリーク, Don Kurīku?);
"Pirate Fleet Admiral" (海賊艦隊提督, Kaizoku Kantai Teitoku?);
"Ruler of the East Blue" (東の海（イースト･ブルー）の覇者, Īsuto Burū no Hasha?);
"Foul Play Krieg" (ダマし討ちのクリーク, Damashi-uchi no Kurīku?)

name: Kujaku
description: Kujaku is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine Base G-14 and also a member of SWORD. She is the granddaughter of Marine Vice Admiral Tsuru.

name: Kukai
description: Kukai is a samurai and member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Kumadori
description: Kumadori is an agent of CP0. He was previously an agent of CP9 and one of the last agents to be introduced. He is also the son of Kumadori Yamanbako.

name: Kumadori Yamanbako
description: Kumadori Yamanbako is the mother of Kumadori who was an assassin like him which means Kumadori followed her footsteps. Kumadori made lots of poetry about his mother in heaven, but in reality she is still alive.

name: Kumae
description: Kumae was a bear introduced in SBS Volume 66. It was shown to be Perona's pet when she was young.

name: Kumagoro
description: Kumagoro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.

name: Kumaguchi Ichiro
description: The Belly, commonly represented as  (a Latin lowercase esh superimposed over a capital B), is the world's main monetary unit.

name: Kumashi
description: Kumashi was a stuffed bear zombie of the Thriller Bark Pirates who acted as Perona's servant and the commander-in-chief of the Wild Zombies prior to being purified by Usopp.

name: Kuni
description: Kuni is a gangster and a member of the Kyoshiro Family in Wano Country.

name: Kunyun
description: Kunyun is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "nine".

name: Kureha
description: Dr. Kureha is an elderly doctor who works on Drum Island. She is referred to as "witch" by some people.

Statistics.Occupations: Head-Doctor of the Sakura Kingdom; Leader of the Isshi-100
Epithet: "Witch" (魔女, Majo?);
"Master of Doctors" (マスターオブ医者, Masutā Obu Isha?)

name: Kuro
description: Kuro of a Hundred Plans, also known by the alias Klahadore, was the captain of the Black Cat Pirates. After he faked his own capture and execution, Kuro pretended to stumble into the Syrup Village, where he was taken in by Kaya's family and acted as her servant and caretaker for three years, with the intent of inheriting her fortune.

Statistics.Epithet: "Kuro of a Hundred Plans" (百計のクロ, Hyakkei no Kuro?, English: "Kuro of a Thousand Plans")

name: Kurokoma
description: Kurokoma was a yakuza of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. Forty-one years before the present day, he was the head of his family.

name: Kuromarimo
description: Kuromarimo was the magistrate during Wapol's rule on Drum Island, and was the highest-ranking law officer below Wapol. After fleeing Drum Island to escape Blackbeard's attack, Kuromarimo became part of the Bliking Pirates.

name: Kuroobi
description: Kuroobi is a ray fish-man and an officer of the Arlong Pirates, who was once a member of the Sun Pirates. He is one of the major antagonists of the Arlong Park Arc.

name: Kurosawa
description: Kurosawa is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Kurotsuru
description: Dr. Kurotsuru, also named "Dr. Black Beard" based on the same name on the lapel of his coat, is a doctor who appeared in Ace's cover story.

name: Kurozumi Higurashi
description: Kurozumi Higurashi was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi. She was killed by Kaidou for her interruption in his fight with Kozuki Oden.

name: Kurozumi Kanjuro
description: Kurozumi Kanjuro, nicknamed "Evening Shower" Kanjuro, was a samurai from Wano Country and a member of the Kurozumi Family. After losing his parents, he was instructed by Kurozumi Orochi to operate undercover within the Kozuki Family. Kanjuro became Kozuki Oden's retainer and one of the Nine Red Scabbards while secretly aiding Orochi in his rise to power and efforts to eliminate the Kozuki bloodline, by feeding him information. He would continue to do so until he revealed himself as Orochi's spy just before the Raid on Onigashima, leading to his former comrades engaging in battle with him until he was lethally wounded by Kin'emon during a final skirmish, dubbing it his final act.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kurozumi Family; Kozuki Family (undercover); Nine Red Scabbards (undercover); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (undercover); Beasts Pirates (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Theatre Performer (former); Spy of the Kurozumi Family; Samurai; Retainer of the Kozuki Family (undercover)
Epithet: "Evening Shower" (夕立ち, Yūdachi?);
Ghost of Kibi (希美の妖怪, Kibi no Yōkai?, VIZ Media: Goblin of Kibi)

name: Kurozumi Orochi
description: Kurozumi Orochi was the former shogun of Wano Country and one of the last members of the Kurozumi Family.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi
Devil Fruit.English Name: Snake-Snake Fruit, Model: Eight Headed Serpent

name: Kurozumi Semimaru
description: Kurozumi Semimaru was a member of the Kurozumi Family and a major supporter of Kurozumi Orochi.

name: Kurozumi Tama
description: Kurozumi Tama, commonly known as O-Tama (お玉?), is a girl from the region of Kuri in Wano Country. She is a kasa weaver working under Tenguyama Hitetsu, as well as a kunoichi in training under the apprenticeship of Shinobu. She is the last known survivor of the Kurozumi Family.

name: Kuzan
description: Kuzan, better known by his alias Aokiji, is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as the captain of the Tenth Ship. Before joining Blackbeard's crew, he served as a Marine Admiral, having been taught by Monkey D. Garp. He was nominated by Sengoku for the position of Fleet Admiral; however, after fighting Sakazuki for the position and losing, Kuzan resigned from the Marines.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Tenth Ship); Admiral (former); Vice Admiral (former)
Statistics.Alias: Aokiji (青キジ, Aokiji?, literally meaning "Blue Pheasant")

name: Kyros
description: He spent ten years as a toy before being freed by the success of his own Operation SOP. After helping bring down the Donquixote Pirates, Kyros currently lives with Rebecca.

Statistics.Alias: "Thunder Soldier of Rage" (怒りの雷兵, Ikari no Kaminari Hei?, Viz: "The Angry Lightning Soldier");, "The Invincible Gladiator"

name: Kyuin
description: Kyuin is a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, and the former boss of the SMILE Factory on Dressrosa.

name: Kyuji
description: Kyuji has light curly hair, with a darker mustache and beard. He wears a chef's hat and an apron with the Marine emblem, a collared shirt with the sleeves rolled up, as well as dark shoes and pants.

name: Kyukyu
description: Dr. Kyukyu is a doctor in Water 7. He examined Iceburg after he was shot by the CP9.

name: Laboon
description: 50 years ago, after being separated from his pod as a baby, Laboon became a close companion of the Rumbar Pirates, but he had to be left behind under Crocus's care due to the dangers of the Grand Line. The pirates promised they would come back for Laboon someday, so the whale still awaits their return to this day. As a former and the only surviving member of the Rumbar Pirates, it is Brook's ultimate goal to reunite with Laboon.

name: Lacroix
description: He is one of the few giants seen so far that does not have unusual facial features or a beard. Like many giants, he has a large, bulky belly. He wears a Marine hat and a double-breasted suit with his sleeves rolled up, along with a purple tie. Like all high-ranking Marines, he wears a standard Marine coat draped over his shoulders.

name: Lacuba
description: Lacuba is a pirate famed as a devious tactician, with a bounty of 17,000,000.

name: Lady Tree
description: As her name suggests, Lady Tree is a tree homie. She has full lips and long eyelashes, with her red foliage high on her head. She uses two slim branches as hands.

name: Laffitte
description: Laffitte, nicknamed "Demon Sheriff", is the navigator, chief of staff, and the Titanic Captain of the Blackbeard Pirates' Fifth Ship. He is also a former West Blue policeman known for countless acts of police brutality, which resulted in his exile from that sea.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Navigator; Sheriff (former); Titanic Captain (Captain of the Fifth Ship); Chief of Staff
Statistics.Epithet: "Demon Sheriff" (鬼保安官, Oni Hoankan?)

name: Lao G
description: Lao G is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.

name: Laskey
description: Laskey is a former CP9 agent and the father of current Cipher Pol agents Kalifa and Alpha.

name: Lassoo
description: Lassoo is Mr. 4's gun that consumed a Devil Fruit through some unknown method which allows it to become a living dog. He is classified as a Type D creature, "Small Savage".

Japanese VA: Koji Haramaki (Grand Battle! Rush!, Pirates' Carnival)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund

name: Lemoncheese
description: Lemoncheese is the queen of Bestland Kingdom (ベストランド王国, Besutorando Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Leo
description: "Warrior" Leo is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom and the leader of the "Tonta Corps " (トンタ兵長, Tonta-heichō?), which was later reformed as a pirate crew now known as the Tontatta Pirates, with Leo now acting as the captain. He is the captain of the fifth ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Straw Hat Grand Fleet (Tontatta Pirates)
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Fifth Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Captain of the Tontatta Pirates;
Statistics.Epithet: "Warrior" (戦士, Senshi?)

English Name: Sew-Sew Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Leonero
description: Leonero is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Lilith
description: Lilith, also designated as Punk-02 (PUNK-02（パンク ツー）, Panku-Tsū?), is one of six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "evil".

name: Lily
description: Lily was a member of the Bellamy Pirates. She was first seen with Sarquiss on Jaya Island. She was the only member of the minor crew members in Bellamy's crew that was openly named. Lily appeared in most of the events the crew were involved with during the Jaya Arc. She was last seen when Doflamingo came to punish Bellamy.

name: Limejuice
description: Limejuice is one of the Senior Officers of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Linaria
description: Linaria is a young woman described as beautiful. She has long, light hair that is straight at the roots and curly at the ends, with a dark flower adorning it. She wears a vertically striped captain's coat and lipstick.

Statistics.Affiliations: Night Butterfly Pirates; Red Hair Pirates
Statistics.Epithet: "Igniting Linaria" (着火のリナリア, Chakka no Rinaria?)

name: Lindbergh
description: Lindbergh, or "Lind" for short, is a cat mink and the commander of the Revolutionary Army's South Army.

Statistics.Occupations: South Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army

name: Lines
description: Seaman First Class Lines is a former subordinate of Fullbody from his time as a lieutenant.

name: Lionbuta
description: Lionbuta is a mixture of a lion and a pig, with a pink pig body and brown lion mane.

Statistics.Affiliations: Animals of the Island of Rare Animals

name: Lip Doughty
description: Doughty is a tan skinned man with a pointed head and a rectangular chin jutting out from it. He wears a tricorne hat with his Jolly Roger on it; underneath it is long, curly black hair. He wears a shirt and polka-dotted pants, has a foulard around his neck, dons a sash around his waist, in which he keeps some of his numerous weapons, and sports a cape. He has big lips, but very small nose and eyes, and is almost always seen scowling.

Statistics.Affiliations: Fake Straw Hat Crew; His own crew
Statistics.Epithet: Lip "Service" Doughty (リップ・"サービス"・ドウティ, Rippu Sābisu Douti?)

name: Little Oars Jr.
description: Little Oars Jr. (also referred to as Oars III on his flag) is the captain of the Little Pirates, a descendant of Oars, and a former subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is among the several New World pirates that aided the Whitebeard Pirates in saving Ace from execution by the World Government.

Statistics.Affiliations: Little Pirates; Subordinate of the Whitebeard Pirates

name: Loki
description: Loki has only been shown in silhouette, but he is a large giant who has seemingly long hair. He appears to wear a tall crown on his head, a tunic, boots, and a cape.

name: Lola
description: Lola was a General Zombie created by Dr. Hogback and animated by Gecko Moria's powers, using the shadow of Charlotte Lola.

name: Lonz
description: Lonz is a giant who wears what appears to be a medieval helmet with a T-shaped visor, and has long dark hair. His Marine coat is white with red wrist cuffs and a pair of steel pads that are positioned on his shoulders. Beneath this, he wears a gray suit with brown pants and a lighter gray shirt beneath the suit. Around his waist, he wears a gigantic fur belt that seems to be where he sheathes his battle-axe. Lonz's face was briefly shown when Whitebeard shattered his helmet with a quake bubble, but it was barely visible for the few seconds it was seen.

name: Lord of the Coast
description: The Lord of the Coast is a Sea King that inhabits the waters of Dawn Island, typically near Foosha Village. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".

Official English Name: Master of the Near Sea (video games);

name: Louis Arnote
description: Brag Men is a famous book which contains many stories from the Grand Line. It is mentioned to be a collection of journals from explorers of the distant past. Due to the nature of the stories, many people mock them, and so the book was named to discredit their authors as "liars" (うそつき達, usotsuki-tachi?). The book is labeled as "fiction romance".

name: Lucky Roux
description: Lucky Roux is one of the Senior Officers, and the cook of the Red Hair Pirates.

name: Lu Feld
description: Lu Feld, known as the "God of Fortune", is the "Loan Shark King" (闇金王, Yamikin-Ō?). He is a member of the Lu Feld Conglomerate (ルフェルド財閥, Ru Ferudo Zaibatsu?), the former financer of MADS, and an emperor of the Underworld.

Statistics.Epithet: "God of Fortune" (福の神, Fuku no Kami?)

name: Lulis
description: Lulis is a mermaid with an orange-red tail that has lighter zig-zag like straps along it. Her orange wavy long hair is relatively straight until it curls in the ends.

name: Machvise
description: Machvise is an officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army.

name: Macro
description: Macro is a pelican eel fish-man and the captain of the Macro Pirates. He first appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll cover story. He was also a member of the Sun Pirates.

name: Macro
description: Colonel Macro is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Dr. Tsukimi. Colonel Macro was first introduced in the cover story of Enel's Great Space Operations.

name: Madilloman
description: Madilloman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Magellan
description: Magellan is the vice warden of Impel Down. He was formerly the chief warden, but after his failure to stop the jail's one and only mass-breakout, he was replaced by Hannyabal and demoted to vice warden.

name: Magra
description: Magra is a member of the Dadan Family that are active on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island. He helped take care of Ace and Luffy for Garp.

name: Maha
description: Maha is a masked agent of CP0.

name: Maidy
description: Maidy is a servant of the Nefertari Family, working as a lady's maid in Alubarna Palace.

name: Maki
description: Maki is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

name: Makino
description: Makino is a bartender from Monkey D. Luffy's home town, Foosha Village. She is the owner of Partys Bar and the mother of an unknown child.

name: Makko
description: Ensign Makko is a senior member of Hina's death squad who was on one of the ships that attacked the Straw Hat Pirates as they fled Arabasta.

name: Manboshi
description: Manboshi is an opah merman and the third son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island.

name: Mani
description: Mani was a combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Manjaro
description: Manjaro is a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew and masqueraded as Roronoa Zoro. When the crew switched to posing as the Kid Pirates, Manjaro impersonated Heat.

name: Mansherry
description: Mansherry is a dwarf and the princess of the Tontatta Kingdom. She is the daughter of Gancho, the king of the Tontatta Kingdom.

name: Marco
description: Marco the Phoenix is the former 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. Once starting out as an apprentice on the crew, he eventually came to be Whitebeard's closest confidant and right-hand man. After his captain's death during the Summit War of Marineford, Marco assumed leadership of the Whitebeard Pirates until the crew's disbandment following the Payback War.

Statistics.Epithet: "Marco the Phoenix" (不死鳥マルコ, Fushichō Maruko?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
English Name: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Phoenix (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Marcus Mars
description: Saint Marcus Mars is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Environment.

Occupations: Warrior God of Environment (環境武神, Kankyō Bushin?, VIZ: "Godhead of Environment")

name: Margarita
description: Margarita is a young, average-sized girl with freckles, dark blue eyes and light brown, wavy hair worn in a ponytail. She was seen wearing her working clothes: a maid outfit.

name: Marguerite
description: Marguerite is a member of the Kuja tribe living on the island of Amazon Lily. She, along with Aphelandra and Sweet Pea, saved Luffy after he ate mushrooms that completely covered his body. During the timeskip, she became a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Mari
description: Mari is the king of Czacho Kingdom (チャコ王国, Chako Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Maria Napole
description: Maria Napole is a singer and is considered the pride of Fish-Man Island.

name: Marianne
description: Marianne, also known as the "Flag-Bearer of Freedom" and more commonly by her alias Miss Goldenweek, was an officer agent of Baroque Works and the partner of Mr. 3. She is currently working as a painter at the new Spider's Cafe alongside many of her former colleagues.

Statistics.Alias: "Miss Goldenweek" (ミス・ゴールデンウィーク, Misu Gōruden Wīku?, 4Kids: "Ms. April Fools Day")
Statistics.Epithet: "Flag-Bearer of Freedom" (自由の旗手マリアンヌ, Jiyū no Kishu Mariannu?)

name: Marie
description: Marie is the thirteenth wife of Saint Charlos. Before being enslaved by Charlos, she worked as a nurse in the Sabaody Archipelago, and was the fiancée of Judy.

name: Marilyn
description: Marilyn is an old lady that lives in Skypiea. She was Miss Skypiea forty-two years ago.

name: Marin
description: Marin is a male slave who was forced to dress as a mermaid by his owner.

name: Mario
description: Mario is a dog that tore off the arm of a toy citizen of Dressrosa.

name: Marshall D. Teach
description: Marshall D. Teach, most commonly referred to by his epithet "Blackbeard", is the captain-turned-admiral of the Blackbeard Pirates, and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World. He is also the only known person in history to wield the powers of two Devil Fruits, as well as being part of a special bloodline, which is only known to a small number of individuals, including his own crew and the Five Elders.

Statistics.Japanese Name: マーシャル・D（ディー）・ティーチ
Official English Name: Marshall D. Teech (VIZ, Funimation subs, edited dub);
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Admiral; Emperor; Apprentice (former); Warlord of the Sea (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Blackbeard" (黒ひげ, Kurohige?) ("Black Beard" in the edited dub)

name: Marumieta
description: Marumieta is the daughter of Bimine, the mayor of Pucci.

name: Mash
description: Mash is a giant octopus that appeared in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.

Statistics.Occupations: Holder of the Takoyaki recipe and sauce

name: Mashikaku
description: Chief Petty Officer Mashikaku is a subordinate of Smoker and Tashigi. However, it is unknown if he remained with the two after they transferred to G-5 as he is not seen with the G-5 Marines.

name: Masira
description: "Salvage King" Masira is the boss (園長（ボス）, bosu?) of the Masira Pirates and the head of a simian ship salvage operation near Jaya Island. His sworn brother is Shoujou and both of them are members of the Saruyama Alliance, headed by Mont Blanc Cricket. He and Shoujou are both fans of Mont Blanc Noland's exploits and the fairy tale book based on them.

Statistics.Epithet: "Salvage King" Masira (サルベージ王マシラ, Sarubēji-Ō Mashira?)

name: Masked Deuce
description: Masked Deuce is an alias used by the first member of Ace's pirate crew, the Spade Pirates, usually referred to as just "Deuce" or "Deu". He abandoned his real name, which remains unknown, but is known to have come from a prominent East Blue family of medical professionals. Despite nominally being the head of the crew besides Ace, Deuce could struggle being respected by the crew, often relying on Skull and Mihar, the other ship's officers. Deuce also came to be referred to as "Doc" by at least Whitebeard after being integrated into the medical staff of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Massui
description: Massui is a Waiter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Master
description: The Master is a digger who works in an unnamed island in the Grand Line.

name: Master of the Waters
description: The Master of the Waters is a giant yellow serpentine Sea King, with red spots and fins on its head and sides. It is huge, as all Sea Kings are. It has a lot of sharp, pointed teeth, two small eyes, a big tongue, and flat nostrils.

name: Matryosaka
description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka (マトリョーサカ?), Matryosuka (マトリョースカ?), Matryoseka (マトリョーセカ?), and Matryosoka (マトリョーソカ?).

name: Matryoseka
description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka (マトリョーサカ?), Matryosuka (マトリョースカ?), Matryoseka (マトリョーセカ?), and Matryosoka (マトリョーソカ?).

name: Matryosoka
description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka (マトリョーサカ?), Matryosuka (マトリョースカ?), Matryoseka (マトリョーセカ?), and Matryosoka (マトリョーソカ?).

name: Matryosuka
description: The Matryo Princesses are the princesses of the Roshwan Kingdom. Their names, in order from largest to smallest, are Matryosaka (マトリョーサカ?), Matryosuka (マトリョースカ?), Matryoseka (マトリョーセカ?), and Matryosoka (マトリョーソカ?).

name: Matsuge
description: Matsuge is a camel who accompanied the Straw Hat Pirates during the Arabasta Arc. He is classified as a Type-A creature, "Big Friendly".

Statistics.Affiliations: Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops, Straw Hat Pirates (temporary)
Funi English VA: Troy Baker (Episode of Arabasta: The Desert Princess and the Pirates)

name: Maujii
description: Maujii is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared in the SMILE Factory during the dwarves' rebellion.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tonta Corps; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Maynard
description: Maynard the Pursuer is a vice admiral who appears in the Dressrosa Arc. He was registered as a gladiator to compete at the Corrida Colosseum for the Mera Mera no Mi, but was defeated before he could participate.

Statistics.Epithet: "Maynard the Pursuer" (追撃のメイナード, Tsuigeki no Meinādo?)

name: MAX Marx
description: MAX Marx was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

Statistics.Japanese Name: MAX（マックス） マークス

name: Mayushika
description: Mayushika is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.

name: McGuy
description: "Thunder Lord" McGuy is an infamous New World pirate who allied with Whitebeard.

Statistics.Epithet: "Thunder Lord" (雷卿, Raikyō?)

name: McKinley
description: McKinley is a tall, well-built Skypiean man who bears the typical wings, as well as a small scar under his left eye. He wears the standard White Beret uniform, consisting of the namesake beret, a short-sleeved shirt, cloud-patterned flared-hip jodhpurs, and black boots; his rank is distinguished by a cape-like overcoat, similar to those worn by pirate and Marine captains.

name: Meadows
description: Meadows participated in a competition at the Corrida Colosseum as a gladiator to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Mecha-Shark
description: The Mecha-Shark is a cyborg shark created by Vegapunk alongside the Sea Beast Weapons.

name: Megalo
description: Megalo is a shark that lives on Fish-Man Island. He is the beloved pet of princess Shirahoshi and former pet of the Neptune Army.

name: Mero
description: Mero is a smelt-whiting mermaid and an employee of the Mermaid Cafe.

name: Merry
description: Merry is Kaya's butler, and the original designer of the Going Merry.

name: Michael
description: Michael and Hoichael are two kids who are troublemakers in the backstreets of Water 7. They idolize Franky, and even dress like him and use his motto as their own: "Mm, super!!" They also idolize Paulie. However, their backstreet delinquency has earned them ire from at least Tilestone and Peepley Lulu.

name: Mihar
description: Mihar is a tall man with thin limbs and slight shoulders. He has a thin nose, a small smile, a mustache, and a tattoo on his left cheek. He wears a dark-colored silk hat, glasses, dark shorts, and dark boots. He also wears a v-neck shirt with a dark jacket over it.

Statistics.Epithet: "Indoor Mihar" (インドアのミハール, Indoa no Mihāru?)

name: Mikazuki
description: Mikazuki is the captain and only named member of the Big Helmet Pirates. He has a bounty of 36,000,000.

name: Mikio Itoo
description: Mikio Itoo is a background joke character created by Eiichiro Oda, and arguably the first Easter Egg featured in One Piece.

name: Mikita
description: "Courier" Mikita, more commonly known by her alias Miss Valentine, is a former officer agent who was partnered with Mr. 5. As of now, she is currently working as a chocolate lady alongside most of the other Baroque Works members at the new Spiders Cafe.

Statistics.Alias: "Miss Valentine" (ミス・バレンタイン, Misu Barentain?)
Statistics.Epithet: "Courier" (運び屋, Hakobi-ya?)

name: Milky
description: Milky is a reindeer mink of average height with brown eyes and long, blonde hair. She wears a green cloak draped around her back, a long, white laced dress that exposes her cleavage, long furry legs, and long, pink boots with high heels.

name: Millet Pine
description: Millet Pine was a member of the Roger Pirates.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a citizen of Dressrosa. While he was a toy, he was known as "Onepoco".

Statistics.Alias: Onepoco (ワンポコ, Wanpoko?, Viz: Onepoko)

name: Minatomo
description: Minatomo-san is a carpenter who was created by Oda as a One Piece SBS joke character to explain how the door Higuma kicked off its hinges was suddenly back in place as the bandit left the bar, after Higuma smashed a bottle of sake over Shanks.

name: Minatomo
description: Minatomo is a legendary carpenter in Wano Country and the leader of a guild that Franky joined to get access to the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress. He is related to another person, whose name is also Minatomo, who is a descendant of someone who traveled from Wano to East Blue.

name: Minister of the Left
description: The Minister of the Left is a catfish merman in service of King Neptune. While it is not clear what his job entails, it appears to involve some sort of administrative and military duties. His actual name is currently unknown.

name: Minister of the Right
description: The Minister of the Right is a seahorse merman in service to King Neptune. While it is not clear exactly what his job entails, he appears to have some administrative and military duties. He also appears to be a guard or commander as he and the other guards hurried to the princess when she needed help. His actual name is unknown.

name: Minochihuahua
description: Minochihuahua is the newest Jailer Beast in Impel Down. He is a Zoan Devil Fruit user who ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a chihuahua.

name: Minokoala
description: Minokoala is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an "awakened" Zoan Devil Fruit user that ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a koala.

name: Minorhinoceros
description: Minorhinoceros is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an "awakened" Zoan Devil Fruit user, having eaten a Devil Fruit that allows him to turn into a blue rhinoceros.

name: Minoruba
description: Minoruba is a bounty hunter on Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Minotaurus
description: Minotaurus is one of the five Jailer Beasts in Impel Down and the first one to appear. He is an "awakened" Zoan Devil Fruit user who ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a Holstein cow.

name: Minozebra
description: Minozebra is one of the five Jailer Beasts of Impel Down. He is an "awakened" Zoan Devil Fruit user that ate a fruit that allows him to turn into a zebra.

name: Misery
description: Misery takes the form of a giant phantom-like woman composed of flames and lightning. She has long, flowing hair, a pointy nose, and sharp nails. Lightning forms bracelet-like circles around her wrists and the bottom half of her body is one long tail without legs.

Statistics.Funi English VA: Juliet Simmons; Alex Mai; Aaron Campbell

name: Mishoin Cashible
description: Mishoin Cashible is a salesman based in Water 7 who rents bulls to ferry people around the canals.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミショイン・キャシブル

name: Miss Catherina
description: Miss Catherina is a former Baroque Works Millions agent who was stationed at Whisky Peak alongside her partner, Mr. Beans. She worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.

name: Miss Father's Day
description: Miss Father's Day has a strange sense of fashion involving frogs. She has purple hair, with a long, thin widow's peak. Over her hair she has a frog styled hat, with appendages jutting out with white balls on the end. She wears a purple shirt with pink dots that shows off her belly with a yellow button up shirt underneath, and a blue tie. She has frog styled sleeves at the end of her shoulders, and white gloves. She wears a purple skirt with pink dots on it, and a frog styled decoration with white balls on the end. She also has frog themed boots, that go up to the middle of her shins.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミス・ファーザーズデー
Statistics.Alias: Miss Father's Day (ミス・ファーザーズデー, Misu Fāzāzu Dē?)

name: Miss Friday
description: Miss Friday is a vulture and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies (13日の金曜日（アンラッキーズ）, Anrakkīzu?) along with Mr. 13. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions. She is classified as Type D creatures, "Small Savage".

name: Miss Monday
description: Miss Monday is the code name of a former frontier agent of Baroque Works and partner to Igaram (Mr. 8 at the time) during his infiltration of Baroque Works. Due to her actions, she is a supporting antagonist in the Whisky Peak Arc. After the fall of Baroque Works, she stayed at Whisky Peak, and had a child with Mr. 9.

name: Miss Mother's Day
description: Miss Mother's Day is the partner of Mr. 6 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. She was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Miss Saturday
description: Miss Saturday is the partner of Mr. 12 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. She was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Miss Thursday
description: Miss Thursday's appearance is unknown, as she has not been seen in the series.

name: Miss Tuesday
description: Miss Tuesday is the partner of Mr. 10 and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings.

name: Miyagi
description: Miyagi is a male goat mink with a thickset body covered in light-colored hair. He has two pointed horns on the top of his head and a long beard, and wears a white doctor's jacket, black pants, and black boots.

name: Mizerka
description: Mizerka is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, she was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

name: Mizuira
description: Mizuira was a little girl from Ohara. She was the daughter of Oran and Roji, the niece of Nico Olvia, and the cousin of Nico Robin.

name: Mizuta Madaisuki
description: Mizuta Madaisuki was the older of the two Mizuta Twins, identical twin brothers of the Rumbar Pirates. He and his brother, Mawaritosuki, were identified by Oda in a SBS question. A fan asked why one of the Rumbar Pirates that died singing had a sword in his skull. Oda explained that this was because they were two identical pirates who died two separate ways.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミズータ・マダイスキー

name: Mizuta Mawaritosuki
description: Mizuta Mawaritosuki was the younger of the two Mizuta Twins, identical twin brothers of the Rumbar Pirates. He and his brother, Madaisuki, were identified by Oda in a SBS question. A fan asked why one of the Rumbar Pirates that died singing had a sword in his skull. Oda explained that this was because they were two identical pirates who died two separate ways.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミズータ・マワリトスキー

name: Moai
description: Moai is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: MocDonald
description: MocDonald was a Wild Zombie who lived on Thriller Bark.

name: Mocha
description: Mocha is a little girl who was held captive on Punk Hazard. She was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Mochi
description: Mochi is a Skypiean on Angel Island and Moyle's son.

name: Moda
description: Moda is a milk maiden from the Lulusia Kingdom that Ace met during his cover story. She is the daughter of Koda and Kyuji.

name: Mohji
description: Mohji the Beast Tamer is a pirate and the first mate of the Buggy Pirates and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance. He is a pet tamer, usually accompanied by his pet lion Richie. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and now currently a member of Cross Guild.

Statistics.Affiliations: Cross Guild; Buggy and Alvida Alliance; Buggy Pirates
Epithet: Beast Tamer (猛獣使いのモージ, Mōjū-tsukai no Mōji?);
Beast Breaker (4Kids)

name: Momonga
description: Vice Admiral Momonga is a Marine officer and the Base Commander of the G-1 Marine Base. He was one of the five vice admirals who had led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.

Statistics.Occupations: Vice Admiral; Base Commander of G-1
Statistics.Funi English VA: Francis Henry,Kent Williams (One Piece Film: Red)

name: Momoo
description: Momoo is a giant sea cow from the Grand Line, and the first Sea Beast seen in the series. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".

Statistics.Affiliations: Arlong Pirates (former); Caribou Pirates (former); Fake Straw Hat Crew (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Arlong Pirates' pet (former); Caribou Pirates' steed (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Momoo the Sea Cow" (海牛モーム, Kaigyū Mōmu?)

name: Monda
description: Monda is a Star Shark and is one of the pet animals of the Foxy Pirates.

name: Monet
description: Monet was a scout and assistant for Caesar Clown and his underlings in the research facility on Punk Hazard. She had her original human arms and legs replaced with bird limbs, giving her an appearance resembling a harpy. She was, in truth, a member and officer of the Donquixote Pirates and was sent as a deep cover agent by Doflamingo.

Statistics.Occupations: Caesar's secretary (Undercover); Doflamingo's spy; Pirate Officer

name: Monjii
description: Monjii is a monkey mink.

name: Monjiro
description: Monjiro is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Monkey D. Dragon
description: Monkey D. Dragon, also known as the "Rebellious Dragon", is the infamous Supreme Commander (総司令官, Sōshireikan?) of the Revolutionary Army and one of its founding members, as well as formerly the captain of the Freedom Fighters. He used to be part of the Marines but became disillusioned with the organization's outlook on justice; this, along with the fallout from the Ohara Incident, sparked Dragon's desire to attempt to overthrow the World Government, with his endeavors ultimately causing him to be labeled the "World's Worst Criminal".

Statistics.Japanese Name: モンキー・D（ディー）・ドラゴン
Statistics.Affiliations: Revolutionary Army; Clan of D.; Freedom Fighters (former); Marines (defected)
Occupations: Supreme Commander of the Revolutionary Army;
Former Captain of the Freedom Fighters
Epithet: "Rebellious Dragon" (反逆竜, Hangyaku Ryū?, Funimation: "The Insurgent Serpent")
"World's Worst Criminal" (世界最悪の犯罪者, Sekai Saiaku no Hanzaisha?, Funimation: "World's Most Heinous Criminal")

name: Monkey D. Garp
description: Monkey D. Garp, also known as "Garp the Fist", is an extremely famous and powerful Marine Vice Admiral. He is the father of Monkey D. Dragon, the paternal grandfather of Monkey D. Luffy, and the adoptive grandfather of Portgas D. Ace. He was responsible for overseeing Ace's birth and raising a young Luffy, before entrusting them both to the Dadan Family.

Statistics.Japanese Name: モンキー・D（ディー）・ガープ
Epithet: "Garp the Fist" (ゲンコツのガープ, Genkotsu no Gāpu?);
Hero of the Marines (海軍の英雄, Kaigun no Eiyū?) (VIZ: "Naval Hero");
"Demon/Devil" (悪魔, Akuma?)

name: Monkey D. Luffy
description: Monkey D. Luffy, commonly known as "Straw Hat Luffy" or simply "Straw Hat", is the founder, captain, and strongest combatant of the increasingly infamous and powerful Straw Hat Pirates. He fearlessly pursues the legendary treasure of the late Gol D. Roger in order to become the new Pirate King and reach a further, untold dream (currently known to only his crew and closest friends). He believes that being the Pirate King means having the most freedom in the world.

Statistics.Japanese Name: モンキー・D（ディー）・ルフィ
Statistics.Affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates;Straw Hat Grand Fleet;Four Emperors;Clan of D.;Dadan Family (former);Baratie (temporary, former);Impel Down (former);Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded)
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Emperor; Senior Captain of the Grand Fleet; Prisoner (former); Chore Boy (temporary, former); Bandit (former)
Statistics.Alias: Lucy (ルーシー, Rūshī?)Luffy-tarou (ルフィ太郎, Rufitarō?, English versions: "Luffytaro")Luffy-no-Umi (ルフィの海, Rufinoumi?)Joy Boy (ジョイボーイ, Joi Bōi?)
Statistics.Epithet: Straw Hat Luffy (麦わらのルフィ, Mugiwara no Rufi?)

name: Monster
description: Monster is one of the Senior Officers and musicians of the Red Hair Pirates. He first appeared playing with his crew at the Partys Bar.

name: Mont Blanc Cricket
description: Mont Blanc Cricket is an inhabitant of Jaya, living in a small home behind the facade of a castle. He is the distant descendant of Mont Blanc Noland and the "Last Boss" (最終園長（ラストボス）, Rasuto Bosu?) of the Saruyama Alliance.

Statistics.Japanese Name: モンブラン・クリケット

name: Mont Blanc Noland
description: Mont Blanc Noland was an admiral (提督, Teitoku?) in the Lvneel Kingdom who made multiple trips into the Grand Line. He discovered a city of gold on Jaya, but found upon returning there with Lvneel's king that it had disappeared, causing him to be executed. He was then memorialized in a fairy tale as a liar and trickster.

Statistics.Japanese Name: モンブラン・ノーランド
Statistics.Official English Name: Mont Blanc Noland (Viz); Montblanc Noland (uncut Funimation); Monbran Noland (edited Funimation), Mombran Noland (4kids)
Statistics.Epithet: "Liar Noland" (うそつきノーランド, Usotsuki Nōrando?)

name: Moodie
description: Moodie is a woman who Fullbody took to the Baratie.

name: Moon Isaac Jr.
description: Moon Isaac Jr. was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ムーン・アイザックJr.（ジュニア）

name: Moqueca
description: Moqueca is the king of Samba Kingdom (サンバ王国, Sanba Ōkoku?) in the South Blue and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Morgan
description: "Axe-Hand" Morgan is a former Marine captain, the father of Helmeppo and the first significant Marine officer to appear in the storyline. After his defeat by Monkey D. Luffy and Roronoa Zoro, he was stripped of his rank for his many abuses of power.

Statistics.Epithet: Axe-Hand Morgan (斧手のモーガン, Onote no Mōgan?)

name: Morgans
description: "Big News" Morgans is the president of the World Economy News Paper and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

Statistics.Occupations: World Economy News Paper President; Emperor of the Underworld
Statistics.Epithet: "Big News" (ビッグニュース, Biggu Nyūsu?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
English Name: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Albatross (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Morley
description: Morley of Fur is a giant and a newkama, as well as the commander of the West Army in the Revolutionary Army.

Statistics.Occupations: West Army Commander of the Revolutionary Army; Pirate (former); Prisoner of Impel Down (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Morley of Fur" (毛皮のモーリー, Kegawa no Mōrī?)

name: Mornin
description: Mornin is the mayor of Syrup Village, and one of several villagers who used Usopp's antics as a makeshift alarm clock.

name: Mororon
description: Mororon is a slender and regal-looking woman with teal eyes. Her pale blonde hair is gathered in an updo with sidelocks that curl at her cheeks and a thinner lock of hair on each side of her face that reach pass her shoulders.

name: Mosh
description: Mosh is a very large man, comparable to Jean Bart in size. His hair is light-colored and arranged in a ponytail, with a prominent bang covering the left side of his face. He wears a feathered coat adorned with spikes at the shoulders (similar to Kid's own captain coat before the timeskip) and a shirt with the picture of a guitar printed on it.

name: Motobaro
description: Motobaro is the pet bison of Duval. He is used by Duval as a steed, and can also swim on water.

name: Motzel
description: Mr. Motzel is a gourmand and one of the known customers of the Baratie.

name: Mounblutain
description: Mounblutain was a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew who masqueraded as Sogeking.

name: Mountain God
description: The Mountain God, respectfully called Yama-san (山さん, Yama-san?, VIZ Media: Yama) by Kozuki Oden and his retainers, is a giant boar that lived in the forests of Wano Country as late as thirty years ago. In what became known as the Mountain God Incident, it was cut down by Kozuki Oden during its attack on Flower Capital, but it ultimately survived the ordeal.

name: Mountain Ricky
description: Mountain Ricky is a former member of the Foxy Pirates. He fought George Mach before the third round of the Davy Back Fight.

Statistics.Japanese Name: マウンテン・リッキー

name: Mouseman
description: Mouseman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates. He resides in Bakura Town.

name: Mousse
description: Mousse was the daughter of Kalgara and Herb and was considered the most beautiful of the Shandia women on the island of Jaya four hundred years ago.

name: Moyle
description: Moyle is a Skypiean and the father of Mochi. He originally worked for Gan Fall in the Divine Squad, but after Enel took over, he and the other members were forced to work in God's Army until they were betrayed and almost killed.

Statistics.Occupations: Member of the Divine Squad; Slave

name: Mozambia
description: Mozambia is a dark-skinned man with short dark gray hair and a scar on the left side of his face, which he had since his early days as a marine. He wears a brown suit with a blue shirt and tie, with the standard Marine coat draped over his shoulders.

name: Mozu
description: Mozu and Kiwi, also known as the Square Sisters due to their square-like hairstyle, are two members of the Franky Family very loyal to Franky, who went with him everywhere and tended to mimic every pose he did.

Statistics.Epithet: Square Sisters (スクエアシスターズ, Sukuea Shisutāzu?)

name: Mr. 6
description: Mr. 6's appearance is unknown, as neither him nor his partner are seen in the series. It is assumed that the number 6 plays a major part of his design, similar to the other Frontier Agents' designs.

name: Mr. 7
description: Mr. 7 was a frontier agent of Baroque Works. He died on duty when he attempted to forcefully recruit Roronoa Zoro to the organization. His position was filled by the next Mr. 7.

name: Mr. 7
description: Mr. 7 is a former Frontier Agent of Baroque Works, being half of a sniper duo along with his partner, Miss Father's Day. He replaced the previous agent of the same codename when the latter died in the line of duty. Due to his actions, he is a minor antagonist in the Arabasta Arc.

name: Mr. 9
description: Mr. 9 is the code name of a former Frontier Agent and bounty hunter of Baroque Works, and Miss Wednesday's former assigned partner during her infiltration. Due to his actions, he is one of the main antagonists of the Reverse Mountain Arc, and a supporting antihero in the Whisky Peak Arc. He is currently married to Miss Monday.

name: Mr. 10
description: Mr. 10 is the partner to Miss Tuesday and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings.

name: Mr. 11
description: Mr. 11 was a Frontier Agent for Baroque Works and the partner of Miss Thursday.

name: Mr. 12
description: Mr. 12 is the partner of Miss Saturday and a Frontier Agent in the Baroque Works rankings. He was first mentioned by Nefertari Vivi, who explained how Baroque Works was organized to the Straw Hat Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: Mr. 12（ミスター・トゥエルブ）

name: Mr. 13
description: Mr. 13 is an otter and a member of the criminal organization Baroque Works, being a part of The Unluckies (13日の金曜日（アンラッキーズ）, Anrakkīzu?) along with Miss Friday. They were a team that served as messengers for Mr. 0 and were also responsible for executing any Baroque Works agents that fail their missions. He is classified as Type D creatures, "Small Savage".

Statistics.Japanese Name: ミスター・サーティーン

name: Mr. Beans
description: Mr. Beans is a former Baroque Works Millions agent who was stationed at Whisky Peak alongside his partner, Miss Catherina. He worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.

name: Mr. Love
description: Mr. Love is one of Baroque Works' Billions who posed as a member of the Rebel Army.

name: Mr. Mellow
description: Mr. Mellow is one of the only identified members of Baroque Works' Billions.

name: Mr. Momora
description: Mr. Momora was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Mr. Sacrifice
description: Sapoten Graveyard, also known as Cactus Rock (サボテン岩, saboten iwa?, English versions: Cactus Rocks) is a graveyard located on Whisky Peak. The large, cactus-like appearance of Sapoten Graveyard makes it a notable landmark of Cactus Island.

name: Mr. Shimizu
description: Mr. Shimizu was a Baroque Works Millions agent stationed at Whisky Peak. He worked under the Frontier Agents Mr. 8, Miss Monday, Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday.

name: Muchana
description: Muchana is a doctor who currently works in Impel Down's medical room.

name: Mugren
description: Colonel Mugren was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Mukkashimi Tower
description: Mukkashimi Tower is a spectator at the Corrida Colosseum.

name: Mummy
description: Mummy is a sorcerer who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Mummy Mee
description: Mummy Mee is one of the houseparents, alongside Daddy Dee, of a World Government-affiliated orphanage situated on the Conomi Islands.

name: Muret
description: Muret was the doctor of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Nako
description: Nako is an elderly man with a wrinkled face, grey hair, grey eyebrows, and a grey mustache and goatee. He wears a bandanna with a red cross, a common symbol for medical personnel (which is edited out in the 4Kids dub) and sunglasses. He wore a striped light green and dark green shirt under a doctor's coat with a red cross on the side of the right sleeve.

name: Nami
description: "Cat Burglar" Nami is the navigator of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. She is the third member of the crew and the second to join, doing so during the Orange Town Arc. She is the adoptive sister of Nojiko after the two were orphaned and taken in by Bell-mère.

Statistics.Occupations: Navigator; Senior Officer; Thief; Pirate Officer (Arlong Pirates, former); Kunoichi (temporary)
Statistics.Epithet: Cat Burglar (泥棒猫, Dorobō Neko?)

name: Namur
description: Namur is a fish-man and the former 8th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Nangi
description: Nangi is a member of the Numbers in the Beasts Pirates, representing the number "seven".

name: Napoleon
description: Napoleon the Bicorne is a homie taking the form of a bicorne hat that is worn by Big Mom. He can also become a sword homie that Big Mom uses in combat. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Prometheus and Hera, and formerly Zeus.

Statistics.Epithet: "Napoleon the Bicorne" (二角帽（バイコーン）のナポレオン, Baikōn no Naporeon?)

name: Nashi
description: Nashi is the king of Ringo Kingdom (リンゴ王国, Ringo Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Natto
description: Natto was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi, Koza, Okame, and Kebi.

name: Nazu Ketagari
description: Nazu Ketagari is a Vice Admiral and the head of a Marine Headquarters division in charge of assigning epithets to Marines, including the Admiral aliases.

name: Nefertari Cobra
description: Nefertari Cobra was the 12th king of the Arabasta Kingdom, the former patriarch of Nefertari Family, husband of the late Nefertari Titi and father of Nefertari Vivi. He was related to Nefertari D. Lili, one of the First Twenty monarchs who founded the World Government, and secretly bore her initial D. in his name.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ネフェルタリ・コブラ

name: Nefertari D. Lili
description: Nefertari D. Lili was the queen of the Arabasta Kingdom during the time of the Void Century, being one of the twenty monarchs credited with the founding of the World Government. Unlike the other nineteen monarchs, Lili chose not to become a World Noble and move to Mary Geoise, but before she could return to her home country, she mysteriously vanished. Aside from that, little is known about her except that she had a younger brother who succeeded her as ruler of Arabasta.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ネフェルタリ・D（ディー）・リリィ
Statistics.Affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom; Nefertari Family; World Government; Clan of D.

name: Nefertari Titi
description: Nefertari Titi was the queen of Arabasta, Nefertari Cobra's wife, and Nefertari Vivi's mother.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ネフェルタリ・ティティ

name: Nefertari Vivi
description: Vivi debuted as one of the main antagonists of the Reverse Mountain Arc as a Bounty Hunter, under the Baroque Works codename Miss Wednesday. During this time, she was partnered with fellow Frontier Agent, Mr. 9. However, after the events of the Whisky Peak Arc, Vivi and her pet duck Karoo ended up joining the Straw Hat Pirates for most of the Arabasta Saga once she was discovered to be a spy plotting against Baroque Works.

Official English Name: Nefeltari Vivi (VIZ, 4Kids, Funimation subs, Odex, Movie 8 dub);
Statistics.Affiliations: Arabasta Kingdom (Nefertari Family); Straw Hat Pirates (former); Baroque Works (double agent); Clan of D.; Suna Suna Clan (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Princess of Arabasta; Pirate (former); Bounty Hunter (former); Frontier Agent (former); Suna Suna Clan Vice-Leader (former)
Alias: "Miss Wednesday" (ミス・ウェンズデー, Misu Wenzudē?),

name: Neggy
description: Neggy is the queen of Gingaball Kingdom (ギンガボール王国, Gingabōru Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Negikuma Maria
description: Negikuma Maria is the woman who spoke to Dalton while the Straw Hat Pirates were in Bighorn.

name: Nekomamushi
description: Master Nekomamushi is a feline mink and the guardian of the Whale Forest on Zou, dubbed the "Ruler of Night" as he formerly ruled over the Mokomo Dukedom from 6:00 PM to 6:00 AM. He and Inuarashi serve as retainers for the Kozuki Family of Wano Country, as members of the Nine Red Scabbards.
