Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Guardians; Kozuki Family; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance (disbanded); Nine Red Scabbards; Roger Pirates (former); Whitebeard Pirates (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Ruler of Mokomo Dukedom (former); Guardian of the Whale Forest (former); Retainer; Samurai; Pirate Apprentice (former)
Epithet: "Master Nekomamushi" (ネコマムシの旦那, Nekomamushi no Dan'na?, Viz: "Cat Viper" Funimation: "Master Cat Viper")
"Ruler of Night" (夜の王, Yoru no Ō?, Simulcast subs: "King of Night")

name: Nekozaemon
description: The fruit is shaped like the lower part of a gourd, having a very narrow top before widening out significantly. It notably possesses two colors, with its top half being dark-colored and the bottom being light-colored (the exact colors are currently unknown as the anime scene where the fruit was shown was in black and white). While the bottom half possesses normal Devil Fruit spirals, the top half possesses a more unusual fishhook-shaped pattern set. The fruit has a horizontal-shaped stem which curves in an upward spiral on the left side and a downward spiral on the right.

name: Neoki
description: Neoki is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.

name: Neptune
description: King Neptune is a coelacanth merman and the king of the Ryugu Kingdom on Fish-Man Island. He is also the current patriarch of the Neptune Family, father of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi, and the husband of the late Queen Otohime.

Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Royal Guard (former); King of the Ryugu Kingdom
Statistics.Epithet: God of the Sea (海神, Kaishin?); Great Knight of the Sea (海の大騎士, Umi no Dai-kishi?)

name: Nerine
description: Nerine is a member of the Kuja from Amazon Lily.

name: Nero
description: Nero the Sea Weasel was the newest agent of CP9. He was first introduced on the Puffing Tom, where he helped to escort Nico Robin to Enies Lobby.

Statistics.Epithet: "Nero the Sea Weasel" (海イタチのネロ, Umi Itachi no Nero?)

name: Nerona Imu
description: Saint Imu of the Nerona Family was one of the twenty kings who founded the World Government after the Void Century 800 years ago. They have been theorized by Emporio Ivankov to be the same-named Imu who secretly occupies the Empty Throne, and who may possibly have had his life prolonged by the Ope Ope no Mi's Perennial Youth Operation.

name: Nezumi
description: Captain Nezumi is a Marine captain of the 16th Branch in the East Blue. Highly corrupt, he covered up the vast majority of Arlong's actions in the Conomi Islands in exchange for bribe money.

name: Nico Olvia
description: Nico Olvia was the mother of Nico Robin, the older sister of Oran and paternal aunt of Mizuira, and an archaeologist from Ohara who studied the Poneglyphs two decades ago.

name: Nico Robin
description: Nico Robin, also known by her epithet "Devil Child" and the "Light of the Revolution", is the archaeologist of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. She is the seventh member of the crew and the sixth to join, doing so at the end of the Arabasta Arc. She temporarily left the crew during the Water 7 Arc but rejoined during the Enies Lobby Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Archaeologist; Senior Officer; Geisha (temporary); Assassin (former); Baroque Works Vice President (former); Rain Dinners manager (former); Revolutionary (former, temporarily); Slave (former)
Alias: "Miss All Sunday" (ミス・オールサンデー, Misu Ōrusandē?, Ms. Sunday (4Kids dub)) (former)
Epithet: "Devil Child" (悪魔の子, Akuma no Ko?, English versions: "Demon Child");
"Light of the Revolution" (革命の灯, Kakumei no Tomoshibi?)

name: Nigeratta
description: Nigeratta is a man from Nico Robin's past.

name: Nika
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Tsū
Statistics.Official English Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two

name: Nika
description: Nika is the name of a mythical warrior revered as the Sun God by slaves from ancient times and whose existence is tied to Elbaf mythology. He was first mentioned by Who's-Who, who heard about the legend from a prison guard during his imprisonment by the World Government.

Epithet: "Sun God Nika" (太陽の神ニカ, Taiyō no Kami Nika?)
"Warrior of Liberation" (解放の戦士, Kaihō no Senshi?)

name: Nin
description: Gyoro, Nin, and Bao were a trio of oddly shaped Soldier Zombies that were first seen reporting to Moria about the Straw Hats' arrival.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ギョロ, ニン, バオ
Statistics.Japanese VA: Kimiko Saitō (Gyoro); Eiji Takemoto (Nin); Yuuta Kasuya (Bao)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Trina Nishimura (Gyoro); Mariela Ortiz (Nin); Ryan Reynolds (Bao)

name: Ninjin
description: Ninjin is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Piiman and Tamanegi, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Ninth
description: Ninth is a tall man with dark hair and a scar on his forehead. He has long sideburns, a pointed nose and a rather long chin. His chest is exposed, and he has ruffles on his wrists.

name: Nitro
description: Nitro is a jelly homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.

name: Nnke-kun
description: Domo-kun and Nnke-kun are aliens planning to conquer the Earth. They are the first joke characters created by Oda. They first appeared in Oda's short story God's Gift for the Future. Later Domo-kun makes an appearance among the Buggy Pirates. Oda answered a question in an SBS and drew both of them. Nnke-kun appeared again alongside Pandaman on the cover of Volume 52.

Statistics.Japanese Name: どーも君, ンーケ君
Statistics.Debut: God's Gift for the Future; Chapter 9

name: Noble Croc
description: The Noble Croc is a crocodile homie that lives in the Seducing Woods on Whole Cake Island.

name: Nodoi Wakan
description: Nodoi Wakan is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.

name: Nokotti
description: Nokotti is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region. She acted as the gyōji during the Sumo Inferno held by Queen.

name: Nojiko
description: Nojiko is the owner of a mikan farm in Cocoyasi Village and is the adoptive older sister of Nami. They were raised together by their adoptive mother, Bell-mère.

name: Nola
description: Nola, known to many as the Master of the Sky, is a giant snake who lives on Upper Yard in Skypiea. Having lived for over four centuries, the snake was once the companion of Kalgara and Mont Blanc Noland back when Upper Yard was still part of Jaya. It is the grandchild of the snake Kashigami, whom the Shandia once worshiped as a god.

Statistics.Epithet: "Master of the Sky" (空の主, Sora no Nushi?)

name: Nora Gitsune
description: Nora Gitsune is a fox who filled the role of the "pet" for the Fake Straw Hat Crew, who did not know that the real Chopper is the crew's doctor and is given human-traits by the Hito Hito no Mi.

name: Noriko
description: Noriko is a nori maker who lives in Ebisu Town.

name: Nosgarl
description: Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

name: Nubon
description: Nubon is a normal sized dwarf with a stubby, round nose, thick lips, and dark lines beneath his eyes. He has bushy, light-colored hair under a large, round hat and a dark-colored mustache. He wears a long sleeved shirt with a tie and overalls.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tonta Corps; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Nugire Yainu
description: Nugire Yainu was the shipwright of the Black Cat Pirates and the crew member who was killed three years prior to Luffy's visit to Syrup Village by the Marines.

name: Nure-Onna
description: Nure-Onna is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.

name: Nyasha
description: Nyasha is a giant cat owned by the Vinsmoke Family that pulls their royal carriage.

name: Oars
description: Oars the Continent-Puller was an infamous ancient giant who was born over 500 years prior to the current storyline.

Statistics.Occupations: Special Zombie; Leader of clan of evil giants (former)
Epithet: "Devil" (魔人, Majin?);
"Oars the Continent-Puller" (国引きオーズ, Kunihiki Ōzu?)
Statistics.Funi English VA: Colleen Clinkenbeard (Monkey D. Luffy's voice, distorted mix)

name: Octopako
description: Octopako is an octopus fish-woman whom Hatchan tried to win over during his cover story, Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.

name: Ochoku
description: Ochoku is a former member of the Rocks Pirates and one of the participants of the Rocky Port Incident. They were also the previous ruler of Hachinosu, before Blackbeard took over and became the island's current ruler.

name: Ohm
description: Skybreeder Ohm is one of four priests of the former God Enel and a high-ranking member of God's Army. Together with his giant dog steed Holy, he subjected God's enemies to the Ordeal of Iron on Upper Yard. Due to his affiliation and actions, he is a major antagonist in the Skypiea Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: Skybreeder (スカイブリーダー, Sukaiburīdā?)

name: Oide
description: Oide is a little girl who lives in Sphinx. She is the owner of Tama.

name: Oimo
description: Oimo is a giant from Elbaf and a member of the Giant Warrior Pirates under Dorry and Brogy.

name: Okame
description: Okame was a member of the Suna Suna Clan along with Vivi and Koza.

name: Okome
description: Okome is the first mate and the only known member of the Hokahoka Pirates.

name: Oli
description: Oli is a slim elderly woman with a wrinkly face and long, curly black hair. She wears a long dark dress with light sleeves, a vertically striped skirt, and a ribbon at the back. On her head she wears a dark cavalier hat with a long plume.

name: Oliva
description: Oliva is the former boss of Port Chibaralta Island, which was part of Whitebeard's territory. However, he was deposed by Portgas D. Ace due to partaking in the slave trade.

name: Omasa
description: Blood Letter Omasa is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Udon region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

Statistics.Epithet: "Blood Letter Omasa" (血文字の大マサ, Chimoji no Ōmasa?, VIZ: "Blood-Writing Ohmasa")

name: Onigumo
description: Vice Admiral Onigumo is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby. His name was revealed in the third databook.

name: Onimaru
description: Onimaru is a komagitsune who was once the companion of the late daimyo of Ringo, Shimotsuki Ushimaru.

Statistics.Epithet: "Gyukimaru on Oihagi Bridge" (おいはぎ橋の牛鬼丸, Oihagi-bashi no Gyūkimaru?, Viz: "Gyukimaru on Bandit's Bridge")

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo

name: Oran
description: Oran was the husband of Roji, the father of Mizuira, the younger brother of Nico Olvia and the maternal uncle of Nico Robin.

name: Orlumbus
description: "Massacre Ruler" Orlumbus is a former adventurer who is the admiral of the Yonta Maria Grand Fleet from the Standing Kingdom and the captain of the seventh ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. After the final battle against Donquixote Doflamingo, Orlumbus pledged his loyalty to Monkey D. Luffy and became a pirate.

Statistics.Affiliations: Yonta Maria Grand Fleet; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Standing Kingdom
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Seventh Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Pirate;  Admiral; Adventurer (former)
Epithet: "Massacre Ruler" (殺戮支配者, Satsuriku Shihaisha?, Viz: "Savage Surmounter")
"Made-Up Explorer" (偽りの冒険野郎, Itsuwari no Bōken Yarō?, Viz: "Adventurer of Lies")
"Pioneer Explorer" (開拓冒険家, Kaitaku Bōken-ka?, Viz: "Adventuring Pioneer")

name: Ossamondo
description: Ossamondo is a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Otohime
description: Queen Otohime was a goldfish mermaid, the queen of the Ryugu Kingdom, the wife of king Neptune, and the mother of Fukaboshi, Ryuboshi, Manboshi, and Shirahoshi.

Statistics.Epithet: Incarnation of Love (愛の化身, Ai no Keshin?)

name: Outlook III
description: Outlook III is a noble living in the Goa Kingdom on Dawn Island and is the husband of Didit, the biological father of Sabo, and the adoptive father of Sterry.

name: Packy
description: Koze and Packy were members of the Yes Pirates.

name: Pagaya
description: Pagaya is Conis' father and a native to Skypiea who fixed the waver that Nami rides.

name: Page One
description: Page One is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. He is the younger brother of fellow Tobiroppo Ulti.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus

name: Palms
description: Palms is a slim man with curly black hair and black circles around his eyes, which make him resemble a panda, his overall animal theme. On his head and shoulders he has an indument apparently made of panda fur, with the animal's head on his own as a head-covering. He wears a pair of shoulder pads secured by straps that run diagonally across his bare muscular chest, and dons long, striped gloves, almost reaching to his shoulders. Around his waist he seems to have yet another indument made of fur, but this one is spotted similarly to a leopard's.

Statistics.Affiliations: His own crew; Ally of the Whitebeard Pirates

name: Pandaman
description: Pandaman is a joke character created by Eiichiro Oda, and one of the most prominent easter eggs in One Piece.

name: Pandawoman
description: Pandawoman is the female version of Pandaman. She first appeared in the Amazon Lily Arc where Pandaman would not be allowed (as men are forbidden on Amazon Lily).

name: Pandora
description: Pandora is a sun homie that was created by Carmel, who placed a portion of her soul into a fire on Elbaf with the power of the Soru Soru no Mi.

name: Pankuta Dakeyan
description: Pankuta Dakeyan is a prisoner in Impel Down.

Statistics.Japanese Name: パンクータ・ダケヤン

name: Pansy
description: Pansy is a member of the Kuja tribe.

name: Papaneel
description: Papaneel is a rather rotund Fish-Man with relatively thin legs and gray skin. His short, black hair is arranged in pattern of having seven thin stripes sticking out, while six spiked stripes inward. He had a relatively square face with a thin five-o'-clock stubble around his mouth. After being slapped hard by Otohime, one of his upper molars have been knocked out of his mouth.

name: Papas
description: Papas is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Pappag
description: Pappag is a starfish who is Camie's pet and teacher. He is the creator of the Criminal fashion line and is mentoring Camie to be a fashion designer.

name: Part
description: Part is a member of the Bonney Pirates. He was once a resident of the Sorbet Kingdom, having been a friend of Bartholomew Kuma and Ginny since young adulthood.

name: Pascia
description: Pascia is a female dancer, who was to be sold at the Auction House.

name: Patty
description: Patty is one of the main cooks at the Baratie, currently serving as the restaurant's head pâtissier.

name: Paulie
description: Paulie is the current vice president of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Before being promoted, he was one of the five Dock One foremen, specializing in rigging, knots, and masts.

Statistics.Occupations: Vice President of Galley-La; Dock One Foreman (promoted); Shipwright

name: Pavlik
description:
Pavlik is a fat man with short legs and thin arms. He dresses in mafia-style clothing such as a black fedora alongside a white collared shirt with a black tie under black coat.
In the manga, he appears on separate occasions with a slightly different appearance. In his debut, he had a thick gray beard and wore a black pirate captain coat, but he had shorter facial hair and wore a black coat with a white cape over, in subsequent appearances, much like that of his concept art and the anime.

name: Peachbeard
description: Peachbeard is the epithet of the captain of the Peachbeard Pirates, who are subordinates of the Emperor Blackbeard.

name: Pearl
description: Pearl the Iron Wall is the commander of the Krieg Pirates' second unit. Due to his actions, he can be considered the tertiary antagonist of the Baratie Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Commander of the Krieg Pirates' second unit
Statistics.Epithet: "Pearl the Iron Wall" (鉄壁のパール, Teppeki no Pāru?, "Pearl the Invincible Shield")

name: Peepley Lulu
description: Peepley Lulu is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. His specialties as shipwright are pitch, block and tackle, and blacksmithing.

name: Pedro
description: Pedro of the Treetops was a jaguar mink and captain of the Guardians.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Guardians;; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance; Nox Expedition Party\Pirates (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Guardians; Pirate (former); Captain (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Pedro of the Treetops" (木の上のペドロ, Ki no Ue no Pedoro?, Viz: "Treetop Pedro")

name: Pekkori
description: Pekkori is the leader of Harahettania, the Land of Poverty, situated on Namakura Island in Paradise. He directed the ritual in which he and his people "summoned" Brook, though they were trying to summon the devil.

name: Pekoms
description: Pekoms is a combatant of the Big Mom Pirates and a lion mink. He is partnered with Tamago, and both are responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fish-Man Island in exchange for Big Mom's protection.

name: Pell
description: Pell the Falcon is one of the two head guards in the Arabasta Kingdom that serve under Igaram, the other being Chaka. He is said to be the strongest fighter in all of Arabasta.

Statistics.Epithet: "Pell the Falcon" (ハヤブサのペル, Hayabusa no Peru?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon

name: Pellini
description: Pellini is a dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom who first appeared on Green Bit.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta KingdomTontatta PiratesStraw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Penguin
description: Penguin is a member of the Heart Pirates.

name: Peppoko
description: Peppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the middle triplet brother of Heppoko and Poppoko.

name: Perona
description: "Ghost Princess" Perona is the former commander of the Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies of Thriller Bark prior to its collapse. She was one of the Mysterious Four and one of the major antagonists of the Thriller Bark Saga.

Occupations: Wild Zombies and Surprise Zombies Commander
Statistics.Epithet: "Ghost Princess" (ゴーストプリンセス, Gōsuto Purinsesu?)

name: Peterman
description: Peterman is the head of a kidnapping gang called the Hound Pets, located in Sabaody Archipelago, and a minor antagonist of the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.

name: Petermoo
description: Petermoo was a member of the Roger Pirates.

name: Pica
description: Pica is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates. He occupies the Spade seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Pica Army subdivision. Due to his actions and role, he is one of the major antagonists in the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Pickles
description: Pickles, also known as the "Tackle Machine", is a former combatant of the Groggy Monsters of the Foxy Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Tackle Machine" (タックルマシーン, Takkuru Mashīn?)

name: Pierre
description: Pierre is a Sky Dot Bird belonging to Gan Fall.

name: Piiman
description: Piiman is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Ninjin and Tamanegi, from before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Pike
description: Pike is a tan man with beady eyes, a flat nose, thick lips, thick eyebrows, and rounded teeth. He also has scruffy brown hair and a goatee. He wears a brown shirt, blue pants, black boots, a brown cloak with "G-5" printed on it, and a standard white Marine cap that is turned on an angle.

name: Pinky
description: Monstrous Bird Pinky is a giant bird that appeared in the Orange Town Arc. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".

Statistics.Epithet: "Monstrous Bird" (怪鳥, Kaichō?)

name: Pisaro
description: Pisaro is the musician of the Arlong Pirates. He is an ocean sunfish fish-man. He was previously a member of the Sun Pirates.

name: Pluming
description: Saint Pluming is a World Noble.

name: Poker
description: Poker is a Shinuchi in the Beasts Pirates. During the raid on Onigashima, he was tamed by the power of the Kibi Kibi no Mi and joined the side of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance.

name: Pomp
description: Pomp is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Pomsky
description: Pomsky is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Poppoko
description: Poppoko is a member of the Alvida Pirates and the younger triplet brother of Heppoko and Peppoko.

name: Poppy
description: Poppy is a member of the Kuja tribe.

name: Porche
description: Due to her actions, she is a major antagonist during the Long Ring Long Land Arc, and a supporting antagonist in the Foxy's Return and Spa Island filler Arcs.

name: Porchemy
description: Porchemy was a member of the Bluejam Pirates until he was killed by his captain Bluejam for losing to Ace and Sabo.

name: Poro
description: Poro is a bookstore owner from Orange Town.

name: Portgas D. Ace
description: Portgas D. Ace, born as Gol D. Ace and nicknamed "Fire Fist" Ace, was the biological son of the late Pirate King, Gol D. Roger, and Portgas D. Rouge, as well as the sworn older brother of Monkey D. Luffy and Sabo. Ace was first adopted by Monkey D. Garp, as had been requested by Roger before his execution. Ace was captain of the Spade Pirates before being recruited into the Whitebeard Pirates and becoming its 2nd division commander. He ate the Mera Mera no Mi, giving him the power to transform into and manipulate flames.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ポートガス・D（ディー）・エース
Statistics.Occupations: 2nd Division Commander; Pirate; Captain (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former); Thief (former); Bandit (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Fire Fist" Ace (火拳のエース, Hiken no Ēsu?) ("Heat Fist Trace" in the edited dub)
Statistics.Birth Name: Gol D. Ace (ゴール・D・エース, Gōru D. Ēsu?)

name: Portgas D. Rouge
description: Portgas D. Rouge was the mother of Portgas D. Ace and the lover of Gol D. Roger.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ポートガス・D（ディー）・ルージュ
Statistics.Affiliations: Gol D. Roger; Portgas D. Ace; Clan of D.

name: Potato
description: Potato is a member of the Bonney Pirates. He was once a resident of the Sorbet Kingdom.

name: Potaufeu
description: Potaufeu is an average size man with short brown hair and goatee, and light stubble. His face is long and somewhat wrinkled with thick jaw and lips. His droopy eyes gives him a sleepy expression.

name: Potsun
description: Dr. Potsun is an Arabasta doctor who runs an isolated clinic in the desert. He managed to recuperate Pell after his near-fatal sacrifice at Alubarna.

name: Pound
description: Pound is Big Mom's 25th ex-husband and the father of Charlotte Chiffon and Charlotte Lola. He is also the grandfather of Capone Pez and father-in-law of Capone Bege and Gotti.

name: Prince Grus
description: Prince Grus is a Marine Rear Admiral stationed at Marine base G-14 and a member of SWORD. His fellow SWORD members also refer to Grus by the title of Prince (王子, Ōji?) which differs from his surname.

name: Prometheus
description: Prometheus the Sun is a sun homie that Big Mom summons from her right hand. He is a special kind of homie, as he received a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, and serves as one of her personal weapons alongside Napoleon and Hera, and formerly Zeus.

Statistics.Epithet: "Prometheus the Sun" (太陽のプロメテウス, Taiyō no Purometeusu?)

name: Pudding Pudding
description: Pudding Pudding was a Marine commodore in the 77th Branch of the Marines.

name: Pudos
description: Pudos is a Waiter in the Beasts Pirates who worked as a guard in the Prisoner Mine. He was injured by Kawamatsu after trying to attack Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Puppu
description: Puppu is the captain of a pirate crew who attempted to pillage Nanohana in Arabasta.

name: Pururu
description: Pururu is a short woman with a pointy nose, similar to those of the Tontatta Tribe's women, and light curly hair. She has make-up consisting of mascara, lipstick and blush. She wears a dark dress that exposes her shoulders and a bicorne with hearts lining the rim and her Jolly Roger on the center.

Statistics.Epithet: "Trembling" Pururu (ブルブルのプルル, Buruburu no Pururu?, Viz: "Pururu the Brr-rave")

name: PX-1
description: The Pacifista are human weapons (人間兵器, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. The originals are clones of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who were cybernetically enhanced into cyborgs Kuma himself was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.

name: PX-4
description: The Pacifista are human weapons (人間兵器, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. The originals are clones of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who were cybernetically enhanced into cyborgs Kuma himself was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.

name: PX-5
description: The Pacifista are human weapons (人間兵器, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. The originals are clones of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who were cybernetically enhanced into cyborgs Kuma himself was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.

name: PX-7
description: The Pacifista are human weapons (人間兵器, ningen-heiki?) developed by Marine head scientist, Dr. Vegapunk. The originals are clones of the former Warlord Bartholomew Kuma, who were cybernetically enhanced into cyborgs Kuma himself was the cyborg prototype for the project. As stated by Sentomaru, the funds required for the construction of just one Pacifista are roughly equal to that of a Marine-issued battleship.

name: Pythagoras
description: Pythagoras, also designated as Punk-04 (PUNK-04（パンク フォー）, Panku-Fō?), was one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "wisdom".

name: Queen
description: Queen the Plague is an All-Star of the Beasts Pirates as one of Kaidou's three closest confidants. He formerly served as the de-facto ruler of Udon, a region in Wano Country. He previously was also part of MADS.

Statistics.Occupations: All-Star; Scientist; De Facto Ruler of Udon (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Queen the Plague" (疫災のクイーン, Ekisai no Kuīn?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus

name: Queen Mama Chanter
description: Queen Mama Chanter is a ship homie belonging to the Big Mom Pirates, and the apparent flagship of their fleet.

Statistics.Japanese Name: クイーン・ママ・シャンテ号

name: Quincy
description: Quincy is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Rabbitman
description: Rabbitman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Rabiyan
description: Rabiyan is a flying carpet homie that is often seen with Charlotte Pudding.

name: Raccoon
description: "Pretended Sleep" Raccoon is a West Blue Pirate Captain who was defeated by the Whitebeard Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Pretended Sleep" (狸寝入りのラクーン, Tanukineiri no Rakūn?)

name: Raideen
description: Raideen is a giant who resided on Elbaf 63 years ago. He was shown training Hajrudin.

name: Raijin
description: Raijin is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Beasts Pirates; Orochi Oniwabanshu (former); Kurozumi Family (former)

name: Raizo
description: Raizo of the Mist is a ninja and retainer of the Kozuki Family, being one of the Nine Red Scabbards that served the legendary samurai Kozuki Oden during the Legendary Hour 20 years ago. He was born 55 years ago, but traveled 20 years forward in time at the age of 35.

Statistics.Affiliations: Kozuki Family; Nine Red Scabbards; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance
Statistics.Occupations: Ninja; Retainer of the Kozuki Family; Samurai; Member of the Kozuki Family Oniwabanshu (Former); Bandit (Former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Raizo of the Mist" (霧の雷ぞう, Kiri no Raizō?)

English Name: Scroll-Scroll Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Raki
description: Raki is one of the Shandia warriors that fought to take back Upper Yard from Enel.

name: Rakuda
description: Rakuda is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints of Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.

name: Rakuyo
description: Rakuyo is a tall man with dark blonde dreadlocks. He has a mustache that consists of two straight points angled diagonally. He wears a typical outfit consisting of a yellow coat with green linings, a green vest under an unbuttoned shirt, a standard light green pirate sash, square-patterned pants, and standard boots. His outfit most notably includes a yellow and purple bandanna bearing Whitebeard's mark. He is often seen wielding a unique spiked ball and chain that has a face at the end.

name: Ramba
description: Ramba is an infamous New World pirate captain who allied with Whitebeard.

name: Ramen
description: Ramen is the king of the Kano Country and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Rampo
description: Rampo, like all of the other dwarves, is very small. He has a long, pointed nose and a wide mouth with a predominant lower lip. He wears a dark colored jacket that has buttons, a light colored scarf, dark boots, and dark pants that have a hole for his tail. He also wears a large hat, similar to Absalom's, that has a dark colored v-shaped design on it.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Kingdom; Tontatta Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Ran
description: Ran is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Randolph
description: "Crane Rider" Randolph is a rabbit homie and a member of the Big Mom Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Crane Rider" (鶴騎士（クレインライダー）, Kurein Raidā?)

name: Rangram
description: Rangram was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Ratel
description: Ratel is a Marine captain who led an invasion of Sphinx during Marco's absence.

name: Rebecca
description: Rebecca is the daughter of Scarlett and Kyros, the niece of Viola and the granddaughter of Riku Doldo III. She is the former crown princess of Dressrosa, who forfeited her title to live with her father and currently serves as a lady-in-waiting to her aunt, Viola.

Epithet: "The Undefeated Woman" (無敗の女, Muhai no Onna?)
"The Phantom Princess" (幻の王女, Maboroshi no Ōjo?)

name: Reck
description: Reck is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Recycle-Wan
description: The Recycle-Wan is a mechanical dog-like creature that eats scraps and litter on Egghead.

name: Red King
description: Red King is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Reforte
description: Reforte is a man with long yellow-blonde hair and a small stubble on his chin. He wears a white shirt that shows most of his chest in a V shape and also wears a black cape over it that is draped across his shoulders. He also wears a sash and a pair of pants with some sort of design on the sides. Furthermore, he wears a black pork pie hat and a pair of black sunglasses or goggles.

name: Reuder
description: Reuder is a reporter who witnessed and reported on the events of the Summit War of Marineford from Sabaody Archipelago.

name: Richie
description: Richie is Mohji's pet lion and a member of the Buggy and Alvida Alliance as part of Buggy Pirates. He was a member of Buggy's Delivery, and is currently a member of Cross Guild. He is classified as a Type C creature, "Big Savage".

name: Rika
description: Rika is a young girl from Shells Town, and the daughter of Ririka. She currently serves as a waitress at the 153rd Marine Branch.

name: Riku Doldo III
description: Riku Doldo III is the recrowned king of Dressrosa after the defeat of Donquixote Doflamingo, who dethroned him a decade ago. The current patriarch of the Riku Family, Doldo is the father of the late Scarlett and Viola and the grandfather of Rebecca. During the latest Levely, he was one of the leading figures in the vote for the abolishment of the Seven Warlords of the Sea.

Statistics.Epithet: "King of Miracles" (奇跡の王, Kiseki no Ō?)

name: Rindo
description: Rindo is a member of the Kuja Pirates.

name: Rint
description: Rint was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Ripper
description: Commander Ripper is an East Blue Marine who heads the 153rd Branch. Formerly a subordinate of Morgan, he assumed control after Morgan was defeated by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Ririka
description: Ririka is a bartender who runs a local bar in Shells Town. She is also the mother of Rika.

name: Risky Brothers
description: The Risky Brothers were a duo of Wild Zombie squirrels that served under Perona. They were animated from the shadows of two pirates by the same name.

name: Risky Brothers
description: The Risky Brothers are two male pirates working as members of the Rolling Pirates under their captain, Lola. They were members of the Thriller Bark Victim's Association, a group of Gecko Moria's victims who banded together. During the time their shadows were stolen from them, they were placed in two squirrel zombies who were also named the Risky Brothers.

Statistics.Affiliations: Rolling Pirates; Thriller Bark Victim's Association

name: Rivers
description: Rivers was the sniper of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Road
description: Road is a giant from Elbaf who is the navigator of the New Giant Warrior Pirates and was formerly an S-Class ranked mercenary for Buggy's Delivery.

Statistics.Affiliations: Straw Hat Grand Fleet (New Giant Warrior Pirates), Buggy's Delivery (former)

name: Rob Lucci
description: Rob Lucci, also known as "Massacre Weapon", is a masked agent of CP0.

Statistics.Epithet: "Massacre Weapon" (殺戮兵器, Satsuriku Heiki?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard

name: Robson
description: Robson is Wapol's pet, and personal transport. He is a White Walkie, also known as "Wooly Hippo".

name: Roche
description: Roche was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Roche Tomson
description: Impel Down, also known as the Underwater Prison (海底監獄, Kaitei Kangoku?) and the Great Prison (大監獄, Dai Kangoku?), is a government-controlled stronghold in Paradise together with Marine Headquarters and Enies Lobby. It is the World Government's maximum-security prison for the most dangerous criminals and pirates. It is located underwater in the middle of the Calm Belt and part of the Tarai Current.

name: Rock
description: The Yeti Cool Brothers, Rock (ロック, Rokku?) and Scotch (スコッチ, Sukotchi?), are assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown until his defeat. They are members of a mysterious type of giants.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イエティ COOL（クール） BROTHERS（ブラザーズ）
Statistics.Epithet: "Killers of the Snowy Mountain" (雪山の殺し屋, Yukiyama no Koroshiya?)

name: Rocks D. Xebec
description: Rocks D. Xebec, commonly known simply as Rocks, was the captain of the Rocks Pirates. He was a prominent figure four decades ago, before the Pirate King Gol D. Roger came into power. He was ultimately defeated by an alliance formed by Monkey D. Garp and Roger, earning Garp the nickname "Hero of the Marines".

Statistics.Japanese Name: ロックス・D（ディー）・ジーベック

name: Rockstar
description: Rockstar is a member of the Red Hair Pirates, being relatively new in the crew two years ago.

Japanese VA: Shirō Saitō (One Piece Film: Red; Episode 1109-)

name: Roddy
description: Roddy is a large, orange-skinned bull mink with two large horns, a small nose, and long, messy, light orange, bison-like hair flowing down his back. He wears dark clothing with a light-colored cape draped above his shoulders.

name: Roji
description: Roji was the wife of Oran, the mother of Mizuira, the sister-in-law of Nico Olvia, and the maternal aunt of Nico Robin.

name: Rokkaku
description: Lieutenant Junior Grade Rokkaku was one of Axe-Hand Morgan's officers at the 153rd Marine Branch. He currently serves under Commander Ripper.

name: Rokki
description: Like the other Numbers, Rokki is massive in size, being comparable to an ancient giant. He is bald but has a noticeable amount of body hair on his chest, arms, and legs, as well as stubble on his upper lip. His body is covered in tattoos, including a swirl-shaped design around his head, the daiji 陸 ("six") on his forehead, and a crown-like design on both of his arms. He possesses two dark-colored horns which point straight up. The only clothes he wears are a pair of dark-colored overalls which cover his abdomen but leave much of his upper chest exposed.

name: Rolling Logan
description: Rolling Logan is an army commander of the Majiatsuka Kingdom. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ローリング・ローガン

name: Roronoa Arashi
description: Roronoa Arashi was the son of Shimotsuki Furiko and Roronoa Pinzoro making him a member of the Shimotsuki Family. He is the father of Roronoa Zoro and the husband of Tera.

name: Roronoa Pinzoro
description: Roronoa Pinzoro is a swordsman from a village in the East Blue. He is also the husband of Shimotsuki Furiko, the father of Roronoa Arashi, and the grandfather of Roronoa Zoro.

name: Roronoa Zoro
description: Roronoa Zoro, also known as "Pirate Hunter" Zoro, is a main combatant of the Straw Hat Pirates, one of their two swordsmen, one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet, and is publicly recognized as the right-hand man and number two of his crew's captain Monkey D. Luffy. Formerly a bounty hunter, he is the second member of Luffy's crew and the first to join it, doing so in the Romance Dawn Arc.

Official English Name: Roronoa Zoro (Uncut dub, Early VIZ manga);
Statistics.Occupations: Master Swordsman; Pirate; Crew Combatant; Senior Officer; Rōnin (temporary); Bounty Hunter (former)
Statistics.Alias: "Zoro-juurou" (ゾロ十郎, Zorojūrō?, Funimation: Zorojuro, VIZ Media: "Zolojuro")
Statistics.Epithet: "Pirate Hunter Zoro" (海賊狩りのゾロ, Kaizoku Gari no Zoro?)

name: Roshio
description: "Executioner" Roshio is a pirate captain who has a bounty of 42,000,000.

Statistics.Epithet: "Executioner" Roshio (処刑人ロシオ, Shokei-nin Roshio?)

name: Ross
description: Ross is a former combatant of the Bellamy Pirates.

name: Rosward
description: Saint Rosward is one of the World Nobles who reside in the Holy City of Mary Geoise. He is the father of Shalria and Charlos.

name: Rowing
description: Rowing was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Roxanne
description: Roxanne was a Baratie customer with whom Sanji spoke.

name: Rug Bear
description: Zombies are corpses capable of self-movement and other sentient actions. Well-known in superstitions and literature throughout the world, they can be created in actuality through at least one method: infusing corpses with shadows via the Kage Kage no Mi.

name: Run
description: Run is a huge man, with a long, brown chin beard and sideburns. He still dresses in the style of a pirate, and carries several machetes on his back. Trafalgar Law's ability has turned him in a spider centaur, and now he has four normal arms, a spider abdomen and eight spider legs. He also wears white boots on all of his spider legs and brown gloves on his four arms.

Statistics.Epithet: "Run the Machete" (マチェーテのルン, Machēte no Run?)

name: Rush
description: Rush is a man with long blonde hair that wears a horned hat. He wears a jacket that has white spirals on the jacket's yellow sleeves. He is also seen smoking a cigarette.

name: Russian
description: Russian was Senor Pink's wife and the mother of Gimlet.

name: Ryuboshi
description: Ryuboshi is an oarfish merman and the second son of the royal Neptune Family on Fish-Man Island.

name: Ryuma
description: Ryuma was a member of the General Zombies serving the Thriller Bark Pirates. His body came from the legendary Wano Country samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma, which was brought back to life after Gecko Moria infused it with Brook's shadow.

Epithet: Legendary Samurai (伝説の侍, Densetsu no Samurai?);
Sword God (刀神様, Tōjin-sama?, VIZ: "God of the Blade");

name: Ryunosuke
description: Ryunosuke was a "Rising Dragon" (昇り竜, Nobori Ryū?) created by Kurozumi Kanjuro using the power of the Fude Fude no Mi. It was created to aid Kurozumi Kanjuro, Kin'emon, Trafalgar Law, and the Straw Hat Pirates in scaling the leg of Zunesha to reach Zou, and received its name from the Straw Hats.

name: S-Bear
description: S-Bear is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Bartholomew Kuma.

name: S-Hawk
description: S-Hawk is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Dracule Mihawk.

name: S-Shark
description: S-Shark is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Jinbe.

name: S-Snake
description: S-Snake is one of the Seraphim and a clone of Boa Hancock.

name: Saber
description: Saber is a member of the Spade Pirates.  Despite being commonly seen at Ace's side, he was allegedly not a commanding officer.

name: Sabo
description: "Flame Emperor" Sabo is the Revolutionary Army's chief of staff, recognized as the No. 2 of the entire organization and outranked only by Supreme Commander Monkey D. Dragon. He is also the sworn brother of the notorious pirates Monkey D. Luffy and the late Portgas D. Ace.

Statistics.Occupations: Chief of Staff (参謀総長, Sanbō Sōchō?) of the Revolutionary Army; Noble (former); Pirate (former); Thief (former); Bandit (former)
Statistics.Residence: Goa Kingdom (former); Mt. Colubo (former); Baltigo (former); Momoiro Island
Statistics.Epithet: "Flame Emperor" (炎帝, Entei?)
Japanese VA: Tōru Furuya (adult; Episodes 663–1089, Episode of Sabo, Movie 13, Movie 14)
Funi English VA: Vic Mignogna (adult; Episode of Sabo, Movie 13);

name: Sadi
description: Sadi is a chief guard of Impel Down. She always wants to be addressed as Little Sadi (サディちゃん, Sadi-chan?).

name: Sai
description: Sai, also known as Don Sai, is a member of the Chinjao Family and the 13th leader of the Happo Navy, as well as the captain of the third ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is also a martial artist who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, where he met Monkey D. Luffy, whom he eventually pledged his loyalty to. He is now married to Baby 5, a former officer of the Donquixote Pirates who defected due to falling in love with him.

Statistics.Affiliations: Happo Navy; Chinjao Family; Straw Hat Grand Fleet
Statistics.Occupations: Captain of the Third Ship of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet; 13th Leader of the Happo Navy; Martial Artist (VIZ: Fighter)
Statistics.Epithet: Don Sai (首領（ドン）・サイ, Don Sai?)

name: Saikoro
description: Saikoro is a tanuki owned by Wakasa and Hiroshi that lives in Bakura Town in Wano Country.

name: Sakazuki
description: Sakazuki, formerly known by his Admiral alias Akainu, is the current Fleet Admiral of the Marines, succeeding the previous Fleet Admiral, Sengoku. During the first half of the series, he was one of the three Admirals, and was the last one out of the three to debut. Upon becoming the Fleet Admiral, one of Sakazuki's first decisions was to relocate Marine Headquarters into the New World in preparation for the New Pirate Age.

Statistics.Alias: Akainu (赤犬, Akainu?, literally meaning "Red Dog")

name: Saki
description: O-Saki is a resident of Ebisu Town.

name: Saldeath
description: Saldeath is one of the Chief Guards of Impel Down. He is the commander of the Blue Gorillas. Due to his actions, he is a major antagonist in the Impel Down Arc.

name: Salome
description: Salome is Boa Hancock’s personal Snake Weapon.

name: Sam
description: Sam is a man that is bald at the top, but has black hair on the sides of his head, and has a black mustache which is straightened down on both ends. He wear a black suit with a white dress shirt and purple tie (white in the anime). His face is usually red due to his drunkenness. He has also been seen carrying a package at times.

name: Samosa
description: Samosa is a king and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Samurai Batts
description: Samurai Batts is a visitor on Kyuka Island.

name: Sancrin
description: Sancrin the Thief is a member of the Longarm Tribe and Brook's former manager.

name: Sandayu
description: Sandayu is a man of medium height with hard features, thick sideburns, hairy arms, and curly brown hair gathered into a topknot. He wears a dark turquoise kimono with a pattern of green circle and white tasuki. Sandayu also wears a pair of simple sandals.

name: Sanji
description: "Black Leg" Sanji, born as Vinsmoke Sanji, is the cook of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fifth member of the crew and the fourth to join, doing so at the end of the Baratie Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Cook; Senior Officer; Sous Chef (former); Prince (former); Cart Vendor (temporary)
Alias: "Mr. Prince" (Mr. プリンス, Misutā Purinsu?)
"San-gorou" (サン五郎, Sangorō?, English versions: Sangoro)
"Osoba-mask" (おそばマスク, O-Soba Masuku?, English versions: "Soba Mask")
Statistics.Epithet: "Black Leg" (黒足, Kuro Ashi?)
Statistics.Birth Name: Vinsmoke Sanji (ヴィンスモーク・サンジ, Vinsumōku Sanji?)

name: Sanjuan Wolf
description: Sanjuan Wolf is an enormous giant, known as "Colossal Battleship" for his size, and was originally one of the legendary criminals who was given a life sentence in Level 6 of Impel Down, as his crimes were so atrocious they had to effectively be erased from history itself. He was initially mentioned briefly by Emporio Ivankov.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Seventh Ship); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Colossal Battleship" (巨大戦艦, Kyodai Senkan?, Viz, Funimation: "Great Battleship")

name: Sanka
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Tsū
Statistics.Official English Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two

name: Sapi
description: Sapi is a fish salesman from Loguetown who sold Sanji the blue-finned elephant tuna.

name: Sarahebi
description: Sarahebi is a Gifter of the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria. She was also a school teacher in the Flower Capital.

name: Sarfunkel
description: She has long, flowing blond hair and wears a pair of goggles. She is stuck within a barrel, similar to how Gaimon is stuck inside a chest. Her barrel has the word "Caution" written on it with a star below it.

name: Sarie Nantokanette
description: Sarie Nantokanette is the queen of Goa Kingdom and Sterry's wife.

Statistics.Japanese Name: サリー・ナントカネット

name: Sarquiss
description: "Big Knife" Sarquiss was the first mate of the Bellamy Pirates, with a bounty of 38,000,000 on his head. His epithet originates from the large dagger he always wields, which bears a strong resemblance to a massive kukri.

Statistics.Epithet: "Big Knife Sarquiss" (ビッグナイフ・サーキース, Biggunaifu Sākīsu?)

name: Saru
description: Saru is the pet dog of two of the World Nobles, Saint Rosward and Saint Shalria.

name: Sarutobi
description: Sarutobi is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

name: Sasaki
description: "Overflowing" Sasaki is a bluespine unicornfish fish-man and one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates. He also leads the crew's Armored Division. Before joining the Beasts Pirates, he captained his own crew called the Sasaki Pirates.

Statistics.Epithet: "Overflowing Sasaki" (盛っ切りのササキ, Mokkiri no Sasaki?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops

name: Satori
description: Satori of the Forest punished criminals with the Ordeal of Balls during Enel's reign. He was one of Enel's top warriors, the Skypiea Priests, until his defeat. He is also the oldest triplet brother of Hotori and Kotori. Due to this actions, he was a major antagonist of the Skypiea Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "Satori of the Forest" (森のサトリ, Mori no Satori?)

name: Sauce
description: Sauce is the king of Jambalaya Kingdom (ジャンバラヤ王国, Janbaraya Ōkoku?)  and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Scarlett
description: Scarlett was the first daughter of the Riku Family and the former crown princess of Dressrosa until falsifying her own death. She was Viola's elder sister, Kyros' wife, and Rebecca's mother. She was killed by Diamante when Donquixote Pirates took over Dressrosa ten years ago.

name: Schollzo
description: Schollzo is a member of the Franky Family.

name: Scimitarta
description: Scimitarta is a member of the Endurance Curry Pirates.

name: Scopper Gaban
description: Scopper Gaban is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スコッパー・ギャバン

name: Scotch
description: The Yeti Cool Brothers, Rock (ロック, Rokku?) and Scotch (スコッチ, Sukotchi?), are assassins who were employed by Caesar Clown until his defeat. They are members of a mysterious type of giants.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イエティ COOL（クール） BROTHERS（ブラザーズ）
Statistics.Epithet: "Killers of the Snowy Mountain" (雪山の殺し屋, Yukiyama no Koroshiya?)

name: Scotch
description: "Iron Boy" Scotch is a member of the Beasts Pirates working as the guardian of one of the former Emperor Kaidou's favorite islands.

Statistics.Epithet: "Iron Boy" (アイアンボーイ, Aian Bōi?)

name: Scratchmen Apoo
description: Scratchmen Apoo, also known as "Roar of the Sea", is the captain of the On Air Pirates and was formerly an informant for the Beasts Pirates, led by Kaidou of the Four Emperors.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スクラッチメン・アプー
Statistics.Epithet: "Roar of the Sea" (海鳴り, Umi Nari?)

name: Seaboar
description: The Seaboar is a sea creature that debuted in Hatchan's Sea-Floor Stroll.

name: Seagull Guns Nozdon
description: Seagull Guns Nozdon is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シーガル・ガンズ・ノズドン

name: Seamars
description: Seamars is a fox-like alien that has a long white beard and wears a top hat. He wears a body suit that has what they seem to be three manometers on it: one on the left sleeve, another on the right, and the last on the chest area. His suit also has boots.

name: Seira
description: Seira is a mermaid with brunette hair tied in a ponytail and a pink tail with purple marks.

name: Seki
description: Seki is the deposed king of Lulusia Kingdom and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely. He is the father of Princess Komane.

name: Sengoku
description: Sengoku the Buddha is a former Fleet Admiral of the Marines, succeeding Kong and preceding Sakazuki. He retired from his leadership position after the Summit War of Marineford, but remained in the Marines as an Inspector General.

Epithet: "Sengoku the Buddha" (仏のセンゴク, Hotoke no Sengoku?, Funimation subs : "Saint Sengoku");
"The Resourceful General" (智将, Chishō?)
Funi English VA: Ed Blaylock (Episode 151-511, Strong World, Film Z, 3D2Y);

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu

name: Sennorikyuru
description: Sennorikyuru is the master of tea ceremonies and is considered the best cook of Wano Country.

name: Senor Pink
description: Senor Pink is an assassin and officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Diamante Army. He was also the husband of Russian and the father of Gimlet.

name: Sentomaru
description: Sentomaru is the bodyguard of Dr. Vegapunk and is in command of the Marines' Science Unit (科学部隊, Kagaku Butai?) as its captain (隊長, taichō?).

Statistics.Occupations: Marine Officer (former); Captain of the Science Unit (former); Dr. Vegapunk's bodyguard

name: Serizawa
description: Serizawa is an older man with a long, thin head. On his face, he notably possesses an extremely large and bushy white mustache which dwarfs his nose, mouth, and eyes, the latter of which are shrouded by a pair of glasses. He wears a light-colored pair of overalls over a dark long-sleeved shirt; the overalls have the kanji 染 ("dye") written on the front. He also wears a tall and pointy hat which has a small generic Jolly Roger cloth hanging off of its side like a flag.

name: Seto
description: Seto was one of the Shandia who lived on Jaya four hundred years ago.

name: Shachi
description: Shachi is a member of the Heart Pirates.

name: Shaka
description: Shaka, also designated as Punk-01 (PUNK-01（パンク ワン）, Panku-Wan?), was one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "good".

name: Shakuyaku
description: Shakuyaku, most commonly known by her nickname Shakky, is the bartender of Shakky's Rip-off Bar on the Sabaody Archipelago, where she lives with her husband Silvers Rayleigh. She is a minor ally of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Sabaody Archipelago Arc.

Statistics.Affiliations: Shakky's Rip-off Bar; Kuja; Kuja Pirates (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Bartender; Pirate; Pirate Captain (former); Empress of Amazon Lily (former)

name: Shalria
description: Saint Shalria is a World Noble, the younger sister of Saint Charlos, and the daughter of Saint Rosward.

name: Sham
description: Sham is an officer of the Black Cat Pirates. Along with his partner Buchi, he is also the protector of the crew's ship, the Bezan Black, and together they are known as the Nyaban Brothers (ニャーバン・兄弟（ブラザーズ）, Nyāban Burazāzu?).

Statistics.Epithet: "Nyaban Brothers" (ニャーバン兄弟 (ブラザーズ),  Nyāban Burazāzu?) (English versions: "Meowban Brothers")

name: Shanba
description: Shanba is an inhabitant of Torino Kingdom. He was first seen at the time of Chopper's arrival.

name: Shandia Chief
description: The Shandia chief is the leader of the Shandia tribe.

name: Shanks
description: "Red-Haired" Shanks, commonly known as just "Red Hair", is the chief of the Red Hair Pirates and one of the Four Emperors that rule over the New World. Having sailed with the legendary Roger Pirates since he was an infant, Shanks would begin his pirate career on their ship as an apprentice alongside Buggy, before forming his own crew following Roger's death.

Statistics.Epithet: "Red-Haired Shanks" (赤髪のシャンクス, Akagami no Shankusu?)

name: Sharinguru
description: Sharinguru is a normal-sized Marine with a large nose and a chin that sticks out. He has black, curly hair under a hat with points on the sides, and goggles that cover his eyes. Like most of his fellow captain-ranked subordinates he also wears a marine coat, with a dark green button up shirt under it.

name: Sheepshead
description: Sheepshead is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who was in charge of the Gifters on Zou.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi of the Gifters (ギフターズ真打ち, Gifutāzu Shin'uchi?)

name: Shelly
description: Shelly is Tonjit's hooorse and an animal of Long Ring Long Land.

name: Shepherd Ju Peter
description: Saint Shepherd Ju Peter is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government,, holding the title Warrior God of Agriculture.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シェパード・十（ジュウ）・ピーター聖
Occupations: Warrior God of Agriculture (農務武神, Nōmu Bushin?, VIZ: "Godhead of Agriculture")

name: Shiki
description: Shiki the Golden Lion, also known as the "Flying Pirate", is the admiral and helmsman of the Golden Lion Pirates. He is also a former member of the Rocks Pirates and the first known prisoner to have ever escaped from Impel Down.

Statistics.Debut: Chapter 0; Chapter 530 (mentioned); Episode 425; One Piece Film: Strong World
Statistics.Affiliations: Golden Lion Pirates; Rocks Pirates (former); Impel Down (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain/Admiral; Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Epithet: "Shiki the Golden Lion" (金獅子のシキ, Kinjishi no Shiki?);
"The Flying Pirate" (空飛ぶ海賊, Soratobu Kaizoku?)

name: Shimotsuki Furiko
description: Shimotsuki Furiko is a member of the Shimotsuki Family, a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma and the older sister of Shimotsuki Ushimaru. She is also the wife of Roronoa Pinzoro, the mother of Roronoa Arashi, and the grandmother of Roronoa Zoro.

name: Shimotsuki Koushirou
description: Shimotsuki Koushirou is a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a master swordsman, he was both the teacher of as well as the distant relative of Roronoa Zoro. He is also the father of the late Shimotsuki Kuina and son of Shimotsuki Kozaburo. He is the master of Isshin Dojo in Shimotsuki Village.

name: Shimotsuki Kozaburo
description: Shimotsuki Kozaburo was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a swordsmith who crafted the Great Grade Blades, Wado Ichimonji and Enma. He was born in Wano Country, but illegally departed from there 55 years ago and eventually settled down in what became Shimotsuki Village in the East Blue. There, he fathered a son named Koushirou, making him the grandfather of Koushirou's daughter Kuina.

name: Shimotsuki Kuina
description: Shimotsuki Kuina was a childhood friend, relative and rival of Roronoa Zoro. She was the daughter of Shimotsuki Koushirou and the granddaughter of Shimotsuki Kozaburo making her a descendant of Wano Country's famed Shimotsuki Family. Her death at the age of eleven drove much of Zoro's ambitions as a swordsman, including his development of the Three Sword Style.

name: Shimotsuki Ryuma
description: Shimotsuki Ryuma was a legendary, world-famous samurai hailing from the Shimotsuki Family of Wano Country, who lived during Wano's "Country of Gold" era centuries ago. He was revered for his mastery of swordsmanship that earned him the title Sword God, as well as his feat of slaying a dragon. He is the direct ancestor of Shimotsuki Ushimaru and Roronoa Zoro.

Epithet: Legendary Samurai (伝説の侍, Densetsu no Samurai?);
Sword God (刀神様, Tōjin-sama?, VIZ: "God of the Blade");
Ryuma de King (リューマ・ド・キング, Ryūma do Kingu?)

name: Shimotsuki Ushimaru
description: Shimotsuki Ushimaru was a member of the Shimotsuki Family, and the last daimyo of Ringo in Wano Country. He ruled until the takeover of Kurozumi Orochi as shogun 20 years ago. He was a direct descendant of the legendary samurai Shimotsuki Ryuma, the younger brother of Shimotsuki Furiko, and the great-uncle of Roronoa Zoro.

name: Shimotsuki Yasuie
description: Shimotsuki Yasuie, also known as "Yasu the Hedgehog", Tonoyasu, or just Yasu (ヤス, Yasu?), was a member of the Shimotsuki Family and a taikomochi who lived in Ebisu Town near the capital of Wano Country. He was the adoptive father of Toko.

Statistics.Epithet: "Yasu the Hedgehog" (ハリネズミの康, Harinezumi no Yasu?)

name: Shin Detamaruka
description: Detamaruka is an old woman with white hair and a large number of wrinkles. She wears a pink and purple polka dotted dress.

name: Shin Jaiya
description: Shin Jaiya is a citizen of Dressrosa. She is the granddaughter of Shin Detamaruka.

name: Shine
description: Shine is a Marine Chief Petty Officer who works under the command of Hina.

name: Shinobu
description: Shinobu is a kunoichi from Wano Country and a retainer of the Kozuki Family, having once served in the Oniwabanshu of the Kozuki Shogunate and trained under Kin'emon as his protégée. She is also the younger sister of Shinosuke.

Statistics.Occupations: Kunoichi; Retainer of the Kozuki Family
Epithet: "Bewitching Kunoichi" (悩殺くの一, Nōsatsu Kunoichi?);
"Shinobu the Man-Killer" (男殺しのしのぶ, Otoko-goroshi no Shinobu?)

English Name: Ripe-Ripe Fruit (One Piece Official YouTube Channel)

name: Shinosuke
description: Shinosuke is a ninja who serves the Kozuki Family. He is Shinobu's older brother.

name: Shion
description: Shion is a member of the Kuja. She is never seen but her name appears on the match-ups of the arena battle board.

name: Shioyaki
description: Shioyaki is a salmon Fish-Man who was a member of the Arlong Pirates and the head of banquets.

name: Shirahoshi
description: Princess Shirahoshi, famous in the world as the Mermaid Princess (人魚姫, Ningyo Hime?), is a giant smelt-whiting mermaid and the princess of the Ryugu Kingdom, as the youngest of King Neptune's children and the only daughter in the Neptune royal family.

Statistics.Epithet: "Mermaid Princess" (人魚姫, Ningyo Hime?)

name: Shiryu
description: Shiryu of the Rain is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as the captain of the Second Ship.

Statistics.Occupations: Titanic Captain (Captain of the Second Ship); Head Jailer (former); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Shiryu of the Rain" (雨のシリュウ, Ame no Shiryū?)

name: Shishilian
description: "Full Power" Shishilian is a lion mink and the captain of the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad, as well as one of the Three Inuarashi Musketeers leading the squad.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance
Statistics.Epithet: "Full Power Shishilian" (全力のシシリアン, Zenryoku no Shishirian?)

name: Shoujou
description: "Sonar King" Shoujou is the big boss (大園長（おおボス）, ō bosu?) of the Shoujou Pirates, the head of underwater sonar operations around Jaya's coast, the sworn brother of Masira and a follower of Mont Blanc Cricket, as part of the Saruyama Alliance. He and Masira were both fans of the fairy tale concerning Cricket's ancestor, Mont Blanc Noland.

Statistics.Epithet: "Sonar King" Shoujou (海底探索王ショウジョウ, Kaitei Tansaku Ō Shōjō?)

name: Shu
description: Captain Shu was one of the Marine captains that helped in the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.

name: Shura
description: "Sky Rider" Shura was one of the four priests of the Upper Yard, who punished criminals with the Ordeal of String during Enel's reign. He rode a giant flying bird named Fuza. He is a major antagonist during the Skypiea Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "Sky Rider" (スカイライダー, Sukai Raidā?)

name: Shyarly
description: Madam Shyarly is a shortfin mako shark mermaid living on Fish-Man Island. She is the proprietor of the Mermaid Cafe and Arlong's younger half-sister. She used to be a fortune teller until she decided to discard her crystal ball.

Statistics.Occupations: Proprietor of the Mermaid Cafe; Fortune teller (former)
Statistics.Epithet: Madam Shyarly (マダム・シャーリー, Madamu Shārī?)

name: Sicily
description: Sicily is a Marine Rear Admiral.

name: Sig
description: The Giant Warrior Pirates is a pirate crew made up of giants from Elbaf lead by Dorry and Brogy. Before them, the crew's captains were Jarul and Jorul. They disbanded 102 years ago when Dorry and Brogy began their duel, but reunited once they returned to Elbaf. They are major allies of the Straw Hat Pirates during the Egghead Arc.

Official English Name: Giant Pirate Warrior Band / Pirate Giants / Giant Pirate Crew (VIZ, former);

name: Silver Axe
description: The Rocks Pirates were a legendary and powerful pirate crew that sailed the seas until their defeat at God Valley 38 years ago.

name: Silvers Rayleigh
description: Silvers Rayleigh, also known as the "Dark King", is an extremely powerful and famous retired pirate who formerly served as the first mate of the legendary Roger Pirates, being known as the "Right Hand of the Pirate King". He is one of the major figures, along with Whitebeard, Shiki, Monkey D. Garp, Sengoku, Tsuru, and Kong from the times when Gol D. Roger, the "Pirate King", was still alive.

Statistics.Japanese Name: シルバーズ・レイリー
Epithet: "Right Hand of the Pirate King" (海賊王の右腕, Kaizoku-Ō no Migiude?);
"Dark King" (冥王, Meiō?)

name: Sind
description: Sind is a child who was held captive in the Biscuits Room on Punk Hazard. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Skull
description: Skull is a man with an average build, a hairy chest, and long dark hair. He has an angular chin and a tattoo on his right arm, and he stands with a slight slouch. He wears a cracked skull mask, a dark-colored shirt with a skull pattern, bracelets on his wrists and left forearm, and a sash with a skull on it. He also wears light-colored pants with a dark skull on the left leg, skull-shaped necklaces, and dark-colored boots. On his right hip, Skull sports a sword with a striped hilt and a dark sheath.

name: Sleepy
description: Sleepy is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

name: Smiley
description: Smiley, more commonly known as Slime (スライム, Suraimu?), was a pet of Caesar Clown. It was created by gathering and compressing the poisonous H2S gas that had spread throughout Punk Hazard and using Vegapunk's process of Zoan Devil Fruit animation to bring it to life. It was kept in the Burning Lands before being released.

Statistics.Occupations: Pet, Bio-Chemical weapon of mass destruction

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl

name: Smoker
description: Smoker the White Hunter is a Marine vice admiral and the Commander of the G-5 Marine base, following the treason of his former superior Vergo. He was first introduced as a captain in Loguetown, where he made it his mission to capture Luffy, and was later promoted to the rank of commodore, due to the events in the Arabasta Kingdom. Since his debut, he has been the superior of Tashigi, serving as her mentor as well.

Epithet: "Smoker the White Hunter" (白猟のスモーカー, Hakuryō no Sumōkā?);
"White Chase Smoker" (VIZ);
"Smoke Hunter" (4Kids)

Devil Fruit.English Name: Smoke-Smoke Fruit (4Kids); Plume-Plume Fruit (VIZ, Funimation); Steam-Steam Fruit (Grand Adventure)

name: Smooge
description: "Rebar" Smooge is an ex-prisoner, who was a centaur henchman for Caesar Clown.

Statistics.Epithet: "Rebar" Smooge (鉄筋のスムージ, Tekkin no Sumūji?)

name: Snakeman
description: Snakeman is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates.

name: Sodom
description: Sodom is one of the two gigantic King Bulls (sea horse in the most literal sense) owned by the Franky Family, the other being Gomorrah.

name: Solitaire
description: Solitaire is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a vice warden of the Prisoner Mine in the Udon region of Wano Country.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi; Vice Warden of the Prisoner Mine

name: Some
description: Some is a young woman of average size with wavy light-colored hair that is tied into a bun at the back and has flowers attached on the right side. She wears a dark-colored kimono with a light-and-dark checkerboard pattern on the top, as well as a light obi with a star pattern. Queen considers her to be very beautiful, and states that she is his second choice for a partner behind only Komurasaki.

name: Sonieh
description: Sonieh is an average sized man, with light colored long shaggy hair on the back of his head, and sideburns. He has a small black goatee, stubble on his upper lip, and a round nose. He wears a rope around his forehead, like other craftsmen, and a cap on his head. Like other foxy pirates, he sports a black mask.

name: Sora
description: Sora is a coris mermaid and an employee at the Mermaid Cafe.

name: Sora
description: Sora is a fictional character and the main protagonist of the comic Sora, Warrior of the Sea. The character's exploits are based on the actions of Marine heroes, in order to serve as Marine propaganda.

name: Soro
description: Soro was a light brown wolf with yellow eyes. He had small pupils, a brown nose, and sharp teeth. He was also seen drooling.

name: Spacey
description: First Lieutenant Spacey is one of the automata created on Karakuri Island by Tsukimi.

name: Spandam
description: Spandam is the former chief of CP9 and CP5. He is the son of Spandine, who was also his predecessor as the chief of CP9. He currently serves under CP0.

Statistics.Occupations: CP0 Chief (former); CP9 Chief (former); CP5 Chief (former)

name: Spandine
description: Spandine is the father of Spandam and was CP9's chief 22 years ago during the Ohara Incident. He led the "investigation" in Ohara and was responsible for summoning the Buster Call. Presently, his political power within the World Government is weakening due to an unknown disease he has been stricken with. At some point later, his sickness and a plot of his being thwarted led to him losing all of his authority within the government.

name: Spartan
description: Spartan is a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum who was going to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi, before being defeated by Luffy.

name: Spector
description: Spector is the owner of the Tropical Hotel.

name: Speed
description: Speed is a Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates who is stationed in Bakura Town. However, she became a subordinate to Kurozumi Tama due to the latter's Devil Fruit powers and became an ally of the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance. She has been dubbed Umami (ウマ美, Umami?, English version: "Horselina") by Tama and Monkey D. Luffy.

name: Speed Jiru
description: Speed Jiru is the former 14th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Spencer
description: Spencer was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Sphinx
description: The Sphinx is a giant sphinx that serves as the boss of Impel Down's Level 2, Beast Hell.

name: Splash
description: Splash and Splatter are two okama pirate twins who are found on Fish-Man Island. They both willingly donated blood to Sanji, who was dying of severe blood loss.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スプラッシュとスプラッタ

name: Splatter
description: Splash and Splatter are two okama pirate twins who are found on Fish-Man Island. They both willingly donated blood to Sanji, who was dying of severe blood loss.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スプラッシュとスプラッタ

name: Spoil
description: Spoil is a short old man with gray, wrinkled skin. He has a large jaw, elongated nose, a scar on the right side of his forehead over his eye, and a dark ring around the other eye. His chest has a long scar on it, and he is extremely skinny and has no muscle mass, causing him to look like a zombie.

Statistics.Occupations: Chairman of Thriller Bark Victim's Association

name: Squard
description: "Maelstrom Spider" Squard is an infamous New World pirate and the captain of the Maelstrom Spider Pirates. Squard and his crew were allies of the Whitebeard Pirates and participated in the Summit War of Marineford.

Statistics.Epithet: "Maelstrom Spider" (大渦蜘蛛, Ō Uzu Gumo?, English versions: Whirl Spider)

name: Stainless
description: Stainless is a tall man standing at a similar height to Momonga, who is 8'3 or 251 cm, he is also a well built individual. His most distinctive feature is his handlebar mustache. His hair is black and combed back with a scalp lock, but by the time at the meeting in Mary Geoise, it was more straightly combed.

name: Stalker
description: Lieutenant Junior Grade Stalker is a Marine on Vice Admiral Momonga's ship.

name: Stansen
description: Stansen is a giant from Elbaf, who is a shipwright. After being imprisoned in the Auction House, he was freed alongside other slaves by Silvers Rayleigh during the Straw Hat Pirates' assault on the business.

Statistics.Affiliations: New Giant Warrior Pirates; Straw Hat Grand Fleet; Buggy's Delivery (former)

name: Stealth Black
description: Stealth Black is a fictional member of Germa 66 portrayed in the comic strip Sora, Warrior of the Sea. His character was likely based on a Raid Suit created by the Vinsmoke Family that was later given to their estranged third son, Sanji.

name: Stefan
description: Stefan is Whitebeard's dog. It is a character invented by Oda when a fan asked him in an SBS if Whitebeard's mustache could be used as a boomerang. Oda answered that Whitebeard probably did whenever he took his dog, Stefan, for a walk.

name: Sterry
description: Sterry is the king of Goa Kingdom and the husband of the queen, Sarie Nantokanette.

Statistics.Occupations: King of the Goa Kingdom; Noble (former)

name: Stevie
description: Stevie wears a black conductor's hat, along with a black suit with epaulets on it, and a dark tie. He's got brown hair and a mustache of the same color, along with standard-shaped glasses.

name: Stomp
description: They are a specialized group of Spot-Billed Ducks who are considered the fastest in Arabasta, and as such have been given special treatment by the Royal Family, the Royal guards and the rest of Arabasta as a special independent transport group. Since their leader, Karoo, is the royal pet of the princess of Arabasta; Nefertari Vivi and has always lived and been by her side, it can be assumed that the other members are given similar, if not equal treatment, and live in the palace alongside Karoo. With the addition of Matsuge as a member, it can also be assumed that he has now been given this same treatment as well.

name: Strawberry
description: Vice Admiral Strawberry is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call assault on Enies Lobby.

name: Streusen
description: "Gourmet Knight" Streusen is the executive chef of the Big Mom Pirates, and is also the co-founder of the crew alongside Big Mom herself, having accompanied her even during her time at the Rocks Pirates. Prior to his current position, he was the chef of a pirate crew that has since fallen apart.

Statistics.Epithet: "Gourmet Knight" (美食騎士, Bishoku Kishi?)

name: Stroganoff
description: Stroganoff is the king of Beef Kingdom (ビーフ王国, Bīfu Ōkoku?) and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Stronger
description: Stronger is the horse that Doc Q rides on. Because Doc Q is seemingly always sick, he rides on Stronger all the time, since the doctor tends to collapse if left unsupported for some time; however, Stronger is just as sick as he is. He is classified as a Type A creature, "Big Friendly".

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus

name: Stussy
description: Stussy is MADS' first-ever successful clone, having been modeled after Miss Buckingham Stussy. She is a masked agent of CP0, although she is actually a spy employed by Dr. Vegapunk and spent years working deeply undercover in the World Government until she was forced to discard her cover. Additionally, while acting as an agent, she operated as an emperor of the Underworld under the epithet "Queen of the Pleasure District".

Statistics.Occupations: Cipher Pol Agent (undercover); Empress of the Underworld
Statistics.Epithet: Queen of the Pleasure District (歓楽街の女王, Kanraku-gai no Joō?)

name: Su
description: Su is a Cloud Fox and pet of Conis.

name: Sugamichi
description: Sugamichi and Warazane are pink catfish with round bodies larger than an average human.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スガミチ; ワラザネ

name: Sugar
description: Sugar is a special officer of the Donquixote Pirates' Trebol Army. She was one of the most integral components of Doflamingo's plan in keeping Dressrosa in line, as any dissenters were turned into toys by her Hobi Hobi no Mi powers. She is also the younger sister of Monet. Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist during the Dressrosa Arc.

name: Suke
description: Suke is a very large and hairy man. He has bushy light hair, long sideburns, and stubble on his lip and chin. He wears a dark kimono with flower patterns on it, and the kimono is open down to the waist, exposing his bare chest. He also wears sunglasses.

name: Sukoshiba Kanishitoru
description: Kanishitoru is a man of average height and brown hair. He wears sunglasses and a cold-resistant version of the standard guard uniform.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スコシバ・カニシトール

name: Suleiman
description: Suleiman the Beheader is a war criminal who joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi. He eventually joined the Beautiful Pirates, serving under Cavendish. He is an ally of Luffy during the Dressrosa Arc.

Statistics.Epithet: "Suleiman the Beheader" (首はねスレイマン, Kubi-hane Sureiman?)

name: Sunbell
description: Sunbell is a former member of the Roger Pirates.

name: Surume
description: Surume is a kraken and famous giant creature which dwells in the deepest parts of the ocean. He was enslaved by the New Fish-Man Pirates, but later became the pet of Monkey D. Luffy, who was the one who gave Surume his name.

Statistics.Affiliations: Straw Hat Pirates; New Fish-Man Pirates (defected)

name: Sweet Pea
description: Sweet Pea is a very large, corpulent Kuja warrior with a masculine-like build. She wears the traditional skimpy wear of the Kuja warriors, and also carries a snake weapon with her. She wears a coat around her shoulders, like Marine Officers, and has a very square, thick chin. She also wears her hair in pigtails.

name: T Bone
description: "Ship Cutter" T Bone was a Marine Vice Admiral. As a Marine Captain two years ago, he was a minor antagonist during the Water 7 Arc and confronted the Straw Hat Pirates on the Sea Train route to Enies Lobby. Prior to joining the Marines, he was a royal knight.

Statistics.Occupations: Marine Vice Admiral; Marine Rear Admiral (promoted); Marine Captain (promoted); Knight (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Ship Cutter" (船斬り, Funekiri?, Funimation: "Ship Slasher")

name: Tabuhachiro
description: Tabuhachiro is an samurai and an ally of the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Tacos
description: Tacos is the king of the Shishano Kingdom.

name: Takao
description: Takao, also known as O-Taka (お高?), is a kamuro living in the Flower Capital of Wano Country who attended to the oiran Komurasaki alongside Toko.

name: Take
description: Take is a carp Fish-Man and is a member of the Arlong Pirates. He is the commander of parties.

name: Tama
description: Tama is a friendly pet sphinx from Whitebeard's home island Sphinx. It is owned by Oide.

name: Tamachibi
description: Tamachibi is a child Dr. Kureha healed while she was in Cocoa Weed. He lives with his father, who is the owner of Stool, a restaurant in town.

name: Tamago
description: Baron Tamago (also known as Viscount Hiyoko and Count Niwatori in his second and third form respectively) is a knight-ranked combatant of the Big Mom Pirates, who originates from the Longleg Tribe. He and his partner Pekoms were responsible for collecting the monthly payment of sweets from Fish-Man Island in exchange for Big Mom's protection.

Statistics.Epithet: "Baron Tamago" (タマゴ男爵, Tamago Danshaku?)

name: Tamagon
description: Tamagon is a member of the Franky Family.

name: Tamanegi
description: Tamanegi is a former member of the Usopp Pirates, along with Ninjin and Piiman, before Usopp joined the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Tank Lepanto
description: Tank Lepanto is the commander of Dressrosa's Self-Defense Army. He joined as a gladiator at the Corrida Colosseum to compete for the Mera Mera no Mi.

name: Tansui
description: Tansui is a member of the Macro Pirates and a former member of the Sun Pirates. He is an arowana fish-man.

name: Tarara
description: Tarara is a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom.

name: Tararan
description: Tararan was a General Zombie and the Commander of the Spider Mice on Thriller Bark. He was the one that had caught the Thousand Sunny in his webs, forcing the Straw Hat Pirates to enter the island.
