Statistics.Occupations: General Zombie; Commander of the Spider Mice

name: Taro
description: Taro was a member of the Roger Pirates.

name: Taroimo
description: Taroimo is a cyborg dog from Karakuri Island.

name: Tashigi
description: Captain Tashigi is a Marine officer serving under Vice Admiral Smoker in the base of G-5.

Statistics.Affiliations: Marines; G-5 Unit 01; Loguetown Marine Base (former)
Statistics.Occupations: Captain; Ensign (former); Master Chief Petty Officer (former)

name: Tate
description: Tate is a nurse who worked for the Whitebeard Pirates as part of the crew's medical division.

name: Tea IV
description: Tea IV is the king of Eigis Kingdom on the Grand Line and one of fifty monarchs who took part in the Levely.

name: Tegata Ringana
description: Tegata Ringana is a doctor on Dressrosa.

name: Tenjo-Sagari
description: Tenjo-Sagari is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates who works under Black Maria.

name: Tensei
description: Kurouma is a middle-aged man with slicked-back red hair, a somewhat pointed nose, and solid dark eyebrows. He seems to be quite tall, appearing comparable in size to Sakazuki. He wears a black suit, a standard Marine cloak, and a pair of sunglasses.

Statistics.Occupations: Director of the Marine Bureau of Investigation

name: Terracotta
description: Terracotta is Igaram's wife and the royal head chef who appeared very late in the Arabasta Arc. She is also the royal seamstress. Her friend and helper is Maidy.

name: Terry
description: Terry is a bartender at a pub in Mock Town. He is not named in the manga, but his name was given in the databooks.

name: Terry Gilteo
description: Terry Gilteo is an intelligence controller (情報管制官 Jōhō kansei-kan) of the Revolutionary Army and was stationed ad their headquarters on Baltigo.

name: Tera
description: Tera was the daughter of a bandit from the East Blue. She is the mother of Roronoa Zoro, as well as the wife of Roronoa Arashi.

name: Teru
description: Mr. Teru is a carpenter who lives in Cocoyasi Village.

name: Thalassa Lucas
description: Thalassa Lucas is the former king of Ilisia Kingdom, a country in West Blue.

name: Thatch
description: Thatch was the 4th division commander as well as the culinary chef of the Whitebeard Pirates. He was murdered by Marshall D. Teach prior to the main storyline.

name: Tibany
description: Tibany is an okama from Momoiro Island. He and the other okama chased after Sanji and attempted to convert him into an okama. In the anime, he was called Elizabeth (エリザベス, Erizabesu?).

name: Tilestone
description: Tilestone is one of the five foremen of Dock One of the Galley-La Company in Water 7. Tilestone is the last of the foremen to be formally introduced in the story, although he is present from the first scene Galley-La is shown in. His specialties are cabinetry, caulking, and flag making.

name: Togare
description: Togare is a Fish-Man that lives in Coral Hill. In the manga, he was an unnamed background character, but he was given a name and his role was expanded slightly in the anime.

name: Tokijiro
description: Tokijiro is a resident of the Flower Capital in Wano Country. He once possessed the blueprints to Kaidou's fortress on Onigashima.

name: Tokikake
description: Tokikake, better known by his alias Chaton, is a Marine vice admiral.

Statistics.Alias: Chaton (茶豚, Chaton?, literally meaning "Brown Pig")

name: Toko
description: Toko is a girl who lives in the Flower Capital of Wano Country and is under the care of Kozuki Hiyori. She is the adopted daughter of the late former daimyo of Hakumai, Shimotsuki Yasuie, and thus a member of the Shimotsuki Family. She worked as a kamuro for Hiyori, who was living as the courtesan "Komurasaki", until Toko angered Shogun Kurozumi Orochi and was driven out of the Flower Capital. After the Beasts Pirates' fall from power and Orochi's death, she returned to live in the Flower Capital with Hiyori.

name: Tom
description: Tom was a long-horned cowfish fish-man who was known as the most skilled shipwright in the world and the head of his own company, Tom's Workers. He was also Iceburg's and Franky's teacher and Den's older brother. Furthermore, he was well known for being the builder of the Roger Pirates' ship, the Oro Jackson.

name: Tomato Gang
description: He has a large round head along with black bold eyes and black mustache. He wears a large black suit with a white scarf sticking out.

name: Tonjit
description: Tonjit is an elderly nomad belonging to a tribe that lives on Long Ring Long Land.

name: Tony Tony Chopper
description: Tony Tony Chopper, also known as "Cotton Candy Lover" Chopper, is the doctor of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the sixth member of the crew and the fifth to join, doing so at the end of the Drum Island Arc. He was temporarily forced to join the Foxy Pirates during the Long Ring Long Land Arc, but was quickly returned to Luffy's crew.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トニートニー・チョッパー
Statistics.Alias: "Chopa-emon" (チョッパえもん, Choppaemon?, English versions: Chopperemon)
Statistics.Epithet: "Cotton Candy Lover" (わたあめ大好き, Wataame Daisuki?)
Statistics.4Kids English VA: Lisa Ortiz (Brain Point Form); Brian Maillard (Heavy Point Form)

name: Topman Warcury
description: Saint Topman Warcury is one of the Five Elders who publicly head the World Government, holding the title of Warrior God of Justice.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トップマン・ウォーキュリー聖
Occupations: Warrior God of Justice (法務武神, Hōmu Bushin?, VIZ: "Godhead of Justice")

name: Torasaburo
description: The fruit is shaped like the lower part of a gourd, having a very narrow top before widening out significantly. It notably possesses two colors, with its top half being dark-colored and the bottom being light-colored (the exact colors are currently unknown as the anime scene where the fruit was shown was in black and white). While the bottom half possesses normal Devil Fruit spirals, the top half possesses a more unusual fishhook-shaped pattern set. The fruit has a horizontal-shaped stem which curves in an upward spiral on the left side and a downward spiral on the right.

name: Tori
description: Tori is a member of the Blackbeard Pirates.

name: Tosa
description: Tosa is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Toto
description: Toto is Koza's father and Goro's older brother, who lives in Yuba.

name: Totts
description: Totts is a member of the Bonney Pirates. He was once a resident of the Sorbet Kingdom, having been a friend of Bartholomew Kuma and Ginny since childhood.

name: Toyama Tsujigiro
description: Toyama Tsujigiro is a Wano Country government official who lives in the Flower Capital. He is also a serial killer who attacked strangers at night.

name: Trafalgar D. Water Law
description: Trafalgar D. Water Law, more commonly known as just Trafalgar Law (トラファルガー・ロー, Torafarugā Rō?) and by his epithet as the "Surgeon of Death", is a pirate from the North Blue and the captain and doctor of the Heart Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates who are referred to as the "Worst Generation". He became one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea during the timeskip, but his position was revoked for allying with the Straw Hat Pirates. Law, like many other pirates, dreams of finding the One Piece, while also desiring to know the purpose of the Will of D.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トラファルガー・D（ディー）・ワーテル・ロー
Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Captain; Doctor; Warlord of the Sea (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Surgeon of Death" (死の外科医, Shi no Gekai?)

name: Trafalgar Lami
description: Trafalgar Lami was Trafalgar D. Water Law's younger sister from the town of Flevance.

Statistics.Japanese Name: トラファルガー・ラミ

name: Trebol
description: Trebol is one of the top three officers of the Donquixote Pirates, acting as a Staff Officer. He occupies the Club seat of the Donquixote Family and is the leader of the crew's Trebol Army subdivision.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Executive Officer; Staff Officer; Sugar's Bodyguard

name: Tristan
description: Tristan is a squirrel mink and one of Inuarashi's subjects.

name: Tritobu
description: Tritobu is the prince of Nagagutsu Kingdom. He accompanied his father Furrari to the Levely.

name: Tritoma
description: Tritoma is a former empress of the Kuja Tribe, succeeding Shakuyaku and preceding Boa Hancock. She died years ago, as a victim of Love Sickness.

name: Tsugaru Umi
description: Tsugaru Umi is a woman who trained Nico Robin to perform as a geisha. She lives in the Flower Capital of the Wano Country.

name: Tsukimi
description: Dr. Tsukimi was an old man who appeared in Enel's cover story.

name: Tsunagoro
description: Broken Hat Tsunagoro is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Hakumai region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

Statistics.Epithet: "Broken Hat Tsunagoro" (破れ笠綱ゴロー, Yabure-gasa Tsunagorō?, VIZ: "Split-Hat Tsunagoro")

name: Tsunokkov
description: Tsunokkov is a lean man with a round nose, a missing front tooth, and a thin black mustache. He also has prominent cheekbones and wears pink lipstick. He wears a deer-themed leotard that has shaggy fur, a face, and horns. He also wears sunglasses, fishnet leggings, and high-heeled boots.

Statistics.Occupations: Dancer, Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)

name: Tsuru
description: "Great Staff Officer" Tsuru is an extremely famous and powerful Marine Vice Admiral, as well as the grandmother of Kujaku.

Statistics.Epithet: "Great Staff Officer" (大参謀, Dai-Sanbō?, Viz: "Great Advisor")

name: Tsurue Monnosuke
description: Tsurue Monnosuke is the machi-bugyō of the Flower Capital.

name: Tsurujo
description: Tsurujo, commonly known as O-Tsuru (お鶴?), is a tea house owner who lives in the Kuri region in Wano Country. She is also the wife of Kin'emon.

name: Turco
description: Turco is a member of the Fake Straw Hat Crew and masqueraded as Franky. When the crew switched to posing as the Kid Pirates, Turco impersonated Wire.

name: Tyrannosaurus
description: Tyrannosaurus is the name of a small mouse that Iceburg found and takes care of.

name: Ubau
description: Ubau was the God of Skypiea roughly 400 years ago. His desire to live on the Vearth the Shandia had called home initiated a war between the Skypieans and Shandia that would last over 400 years.

Statistics.Funi English VA: Brian Mathis (Episode 189); Randy E. Aguebor (Episode of Skypiea)

name: Ucy
description: "Brutal Bull" Ucy is a fighting bull (闘牛, Tōgyū?) that regularly competed as a gladiator in Dressrosa's Corrida Colosseum, where he was befriended (and named) by Monkey D. Luffy.

Statistics.Epithet: "Brutal Bull" (非情なる牛（ブルータルブル）, Burūtaru Buru?)

name: Uhho
description: Uhho-kun is a gorilla.

name: Uholisia
description: Uholisia is a very muscular and masculine woman with blonde hair who is about as tall as Sai. She has red patches on her cheeks and very pronounced lips. Her facial features are very similar to those of Okama. She wears a blue dress with pink and yellow flowers on it.

name: UK
description: UK is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Ukkari
description: Seaman Recruit Ukkari is a Marine who serves at the Shells Town Marine base.

name: Ukon
description: Ukon is a samurai who allied with the Kozuki Family. After waiting 20 years for the return of the Nine Red Scabbards, he affiliated with the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance to raid Onigashima.

name: Ulti
description: Due to her actions and role, she is a supporting antagonist in the Wano Country Arc.

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus

name: Ultraking
description: Ultraking was the assistant-manager of Rain Dinners in Rainbase during the Arabasta Arc.

name: Umit
description: "Deep Ocean Current" Umit is a shipping magnate and one of the emperors of the Underworld.

Statistics.Occupations: Shipping Magnate (海運王, Kaiun-ō?, Viz: "Shipping King"); Emperor of the Underworld
Statistics.Epithet: "Deep Ocean Current" (深層海流, Shinsō Kairyū?, Viz: "Deep-Sea Currents")

name: Unforgivable Mask
description: Unforgivable Mask is a hidden One Piece character, much like Pandaman. He is, in fact, Pandaman's rival.

name: Uni
description: Uni is a member of the Heart Pirates.

name: Unigaro
description: Unigaro was a Wild Zombie who lived on Thriller Bark.

name: Urashima
description: Urashima is a yokozuna-ranked sumo wrestler of Wano Country's Flower Capital. He is also of samurai class, thus giving him an elevated social status, and a minor antagonist of Wano Country Arc.

name: Urban
description: Urban is a Marine Vice Admiral and one of the nine that took part in the Egghead Incident.

name: Urouge
description: Urouge, nicknamed the Mad Monk, is a pirate hailing from a sky island and captain of the Fallen Monk Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the "Worst Generation", and prior to the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 108,000,000.

Statistics.Epithet: "Mad Monk" (怪僧, Kaisō?)

name: Usagihebi
description: Usagihebi is an animal who lives on the Island of Rare Animals. Like all the animals on the island, he is protected by Gaimon.

Statistics.Affiliations: Animals of the Island of Rare Animals

name: Usaguchi Hideo
description: The Belly, commonly represented as  (a Latin lowercase esh superimposed over a capital B), is the world's main monetary unit.

name: Usakkov
description: Usakkov is a former prisoner of Impel Down and resident of Newkama Land in Level 5.5. He is one of Emporio Ivankov's dancers.

Statistics.Occupations: Dancer, Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)

name: Ushiano
description: Ushiano is a cattle mink, the deputy commander of the Revolutionary Army's West Army, and the assistant of Morley.

name: Usopp
description: "God" Usopp is the sniper of the Straw Hat Pirates and one of the Senior Officers of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet. He is the fourth member of the crew and the third to join, doing so at the end of the Syrup Village Arc. Although he left the crew during the Water 7 Arc, he rejoined at the end of the Post-Enies Lobby Arc.

Statistics.Occupations: Sniper; Senior Officer; Toad Oil Salesman (temporary)
Epithet: "King of Snipers" (狙撃の王様, Sogeki no Ō-sama?, "Sniper King" (VIZ));
"God" (ゴッド, Goddo?);

name: Uta
description: Uta is a world-famous singer or "diva" (歌姫, Utahime?) and the adopted daughter of the Emperor Red-Haired Shanks  who was also a musician in his crew until he left her while she was still a child. She was left on the island of Elegia with Gordon, who became her foster parent and supported her dream of starting a "New Era" and later her desire to achieve this dream through a broadcasted, world-wide concert held on Elegia.

Statistics.Debut: Chapter 1055 (flashback); One Piece Film: Red; Episode 1029

name: Uwattsura
description: Uwattsura is a Waiter of the Beasts Pirates who serves as a chief guard in the Prisoner Mine of the Udon region.

name: Uzu
description: Uzu is a child who was held captive in Punk Hazard's Biscuits Room. He was freed with the rest of the children by the Straw Hat Pirates.

name: Uzuki Namida
description: Uzuki Namida is a samurai and a member of the Uzuki Family who was formerly imprisoned in the Udon Prisoner Mine.

name: Uzuki Tempura
description: Tempura was a tall man with a thin, curved head resembling his namesake tempura in shape. He had dark hair gathered into a topknot, long and pronunced eyebrows, and a thin, neatly trimmed mustache that ran down to his chin. He wore a long bead necklace which reached down to his chest, as well as a kimono and long cape.

name: Van Augur
description: Van Augur, nicknamed "The Supersonic", is the sniper of the Blackbeard Pirates, as well as one of the Ten Titanic Captains, as the captain of the Third Ship.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Sniper; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Third Ship)
Statistics.Epithet: "The Supersonic" (音越, Otogoe?)

name: Vander Decken
description: Vander Decken was the first captain of the Flying Dutchman.

name: Vander Decken IX
description: Vander Decken IX is the captain of the Flying Pirates on their ship, the Flying Dutchman, and the eighth descendant of the original Vander Decken of legend. He is a Japanese bullhead shark fish-man and the secondary antagonist of the Fish-Man Island Arc.

Statistics.Japanese Name: バンダー・デッケン九世
Statistics.Affiliations: Flying Pirates; Ally of the New Fish-Man Pirates (former)

name: Vasco Shot
description: Vasco Shot, monikered "Heavy Drinker", is one of the Ten Titanic Captains of the Blackbeard Pirates, as the captain of the Eighth Ship. He was originally one of several legendary criminals given a life sentence on Impel Down's Level 6, before being freed by Blackbeard and joining him.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate; Titanic Captain (Captain of the Eighth Ship); Prisoner of the Great Prison (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Heavy Drinker" Vasco Shot (大酒のバスコ・ショット, Ōzake no Basuko Shotto?)

name: Vegapunk
description: Dr. Vegapunk was the leading scientist of the SSG in the employment of the Marines. His work included discovering the secrets and uses of seastone, the secrets of how Devil Fruit powers work, the co-discovery of the Lineage Factor and its applications, the creation of the Pacifista and Seraphim, and various other scientific achievements that are said to be at least 500 years ahead of current technology. He hailed from the technologically advanced Karakuri Island and resided on Egghead, where his laboratory is located.

Statistics.Alias: "Stella" (本体（ステラ）, Sutera?, kanji literally meaning "Main Body")
Statistics.Epithet: "The Man With the Best Brain in the World" (世界一の頭脳を持つ男, Sekaiichi no Zunō o Motsu Otoko?, VIZ: "The Smartest Man in the World")

name: Vergo
description: "Demon Bamboo" Vergo was one of the four elite officers and the first to occupy the Heart seat of the Donquixote Pirates under the codename Corazon.

Statistics.Occupations: Pirate Elite Officer; Vice Admiral (undercover); Head of G-5 (undercover); Marine Captain (undercover, former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Demon Bamboo" Vergo (鬼竹のヴェルゴ, Kichiku no Verugo?)

name: Very Good
description: Very Good is a Marine Captain and one of the Marines who helped to attack the Straw Hat Pirates during the Buster Call at Enies Lobby.

name: Victoria Cindry
description: Victoria Cindry was once a famous stage actress who died after falling off the stage twelve years ago. Having been infatuated with her, Dr. Hogback stole her corpse in order to make her his own personal zombie servant with the aid of Gecko Moria's powers.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ビクトリア･シンドリー

name: Victoria Shiruton Doruyanaika
description: Victoria Shiruton Doruyanaika was a girl from Eustass Kid's and Killer's childhood and their first crush.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィクトリア・シルトン・ドルヤナイカ

name: Vinsmoke Ichiji
description: Vinsmoke Ichiji, also known as "Sparking Red", is the eldest son and second child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・イチジ
Statistics.Epithet: "Sparking Red" (スパーキングレッド, Supākingu Reddo?)

name: Vinsmoke Judge
description: Vinsmoke Judge, also known as Garuda, is the king of the Germa Kingdom, the supreme commander of the Germa 66, and the patriarch of the Vinsmoke Family, being Sanji's biological father.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・ジャッジ
Statistics.Affiliations: Vinsmoke Family; Germa Kingdom; Germa 66; NEO MADS; MADS (former)
Statistics.Occupations: King of the Germa Kingdom; Supreme Commander of Germa 66; Scientist; Mercenary
Statistics.Epithet: "Garuda" (怪鳥（ガルーダ）, Garūda?)

name: Vinsmoke Niji
description: Vinsmoke Niji, also known as "Dengeki Blue", is the second son and third child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・ニジ
Statistics.Epithet: "Dengeki Blue" (デンゲキブルー, Dengeki Burū?, "Electric Shock Blue")

name: Vinsmoke Reiju
description: Vinsmoke Reiju, also known as "Poison Pink", is the eldest child and only daughter of the Vinsmoke Family. She is the princess of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military army, Germa 66.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・レイジュ
Statistics.Epithet: "Poison Pink" (ポイズンピンク, Poizun Pinku?)

name: Vinsmoke Sora
description: Vinsmoke Sora was the queen of the Germa Kingdom, the wife of Vinsmoke Judge and the mother of Vinsmoke Reiju, Vinsmoke Ichiji, Vinsmoke Niji, Sanji and Vinsmoke Yonji  who died sometime during Sanji's childhood.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・ソラ

name: Vinsmoke Yonji
description: Vinsmoke Yonji, also known as "Winch Green", is the fourth son and youngest child of the Vinsmoke Family. He is a prince of the Germa Kingdom and a commander in its military arm, Germa 66.

Statistics.Japanese Name: ヴィンスモーク・ヨンジ
Statistics.Epithet: "Winch Green" (ウインチグリーン, Uinchi Gurīn?)

name: Viola
description: Viola is the second daughter of the Riku Family and the current crown princess of Dressrosa after her niece Rebecca abdicated her position. She is the younger sister of the late Scarlett.

Statistics.Occupations: Princess of Dressrosa; Pirate Officer (former); Assassin (former); Dancer;

name: Vista
description: "Vista of the Flower Swords" is the former 5th division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates. He is one of the most prominent members of his crew.

Statistics.Epithet: "Vista of the Flower Swords" (花剣のビスタ, Kaken no Bisuta?)

name: Vitan
description: Vitan is a cyborg with a body that appears to be made of iron or some other type of metal from the waist up. As such, his head, body, and arms are composed of metal parts, with his hands being a set of metal claws. On the other hand, the digitally colored manga shows that his neck and face also appear to be made from metal, but are skin-colored, as opposed to the metal color of his body. Furthermore, Vitan also wears a metal hat and a pair of gray, possibly metal pants with a green sash around it.

name: Vito
description: "Monster Gun" Vito is a member of the Fire Tank Pirates, working as the crew's advisor.

Statistics.Epithet: "Monster Gun" (怪銃, Kaijū?, Viz: "Phantom Gun")

name: Wadatsumi
description: "Large Monk" Wadatsumi is a giant tiger blowfish fish-man and a member of the Sun Pirates. He was formerly a member of the Flying Pirates under captain Vander Decken IX before they were defeated.

Statistics.Epithet: "Large Monk" (大入道, Ōnyūdō?, "Giant Monk" in the FUNimation subs)

name: Wakasa
description: Wakasa is a resident of Bakura Town in Wano Country who runs a restaurant alongside Hiroshi; the two of them own a tanuki named Saikoro which the sumo wrestler Urashima forced to be cooked and served to him.

name: Wall Zombie
description: Zombies are corpses capable of self-movement and other sentient actions. Well-known in superstitions and literature throughout the world, they can be created in actuality through at least one method: infusing corpses with shadows via the Kage Kage no Mi.

name: Wallace
description: Wallace is a weedy stingfish fish-man and a member of the Spade Pirates.

name: Wallem
description: Wallem is a man with a hat and a red pirate captain coat. He has long dark hair and a mustache with a goatee. He is seen wielding a sword.

name: Wanda
description: Wanda is a canine mink of the Warrior Beast Tribe and the Inuarashi Musketeer Squad and was previously a Kingsbird to both Inuarashi and Nekomamushi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom; Inuarashi Musketeer Squad; Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance(disbanded)

name: Wany
description: Wany is Wanda's crocodile-boar steed.

name: Wanyudo
description: Wanyudo is a Gifter in the Beasts Pirates, serving as Black Maria's weapon.

name: Wanze
description: Wanze is an agent of CP7 and a cook, specializing in making ramen noodles.

Statistics.Epithet: "Mad Wanze" (マッドなワンゼ, Maddona Wanze?)

name: Wapol
description: "Tin-Plate" Wapol is the former monarch of the Drum Kingdom. He became a pirate after fleeing from his country when Blackbeard and his crew attacked Drum Island. After his defeat by the Straw Hat Pirates, he became the head of his own toy enterprise and married Kinderella. Two years later, he was given his own kingdom by the World Nobles and now reigns as the king of the Black Drum Kingdom. After witnessing Nefertari Cobra being assassinated by Imu and the Five Elders at the latest Levely, Wapol became a fugitive when he fled and took refuge with Morgans in his news balloon along with Vivi.

Statistics.Affiliations: Evil Black Drum Kingdom; Drum Kingdom (former); Bliking Pirates (disbanded)
Statistics.Occupations: King of Evil Black Drum Kingdom; President of Wapol Konzern; King of Drum Kingdom (former); Pirate; Captain (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Tin-Plate" Wapol (ブリキのワポル, Buriki no Waporu?, VIZ: Wapol of Tin)

name: Warashi
description: Warashi is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.

name: Warazane
description: Sugamichi and Warazane are pink catfish with round bodies larger than an average human.

Statistics.Japanese Name: スガミチ; ワラザネ

name: Waruno Furishiro
description: Waruno Furishiro is a man who manages weapon production orders on behalf of Kurozumi Orochi in the Flower Capital of Wano Country.

name: Wellington
description: Wellington is a North Blue pirate from around fourteen to sixteen years ago.

name: Wheel
description: Wheel is the prince of South Fire Kingdom. He accompanied his father Jeep to the Levely.

name: Whitey Bay
description: Whitey Bay has long, flowing blue hair, full lips and always has a confident expression on her face. She sports a short striped dress closed by laces that have flower-shaped buttons, with loose sleeves, and a scarf. She also wears a polka-dotted bandanna, and over it a light blue and purple pirate hat with her Jolly Roger in the center, a skull with a snowflake design. She also sports a cape, hanging from her back.

Statistics.Epithet: "Ice Witch" (氷の魔女, Kōri no Majo?)

name: Who's-Who
description: Who's-Who, also known as Who of the Droplets, is one of the Tobiroppo, the strongest six Shinuchi of the Beasts Pirates.

Statistics.Occupations: Shinuchi; Pirate; Captain  (former); Prisoner (former); Cipher Pol Agent (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Who of the Droplets" (飛沫のフー, Shibuki no Fū?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger

name: Wicca
description: Wicca is a female dwarf from Tontatta Kingdom beneath Green Bit. She, along with other members of her kind often pose as Dressrosa's fairies and take their "offerings". She is a member of the Tontatta Pirates, the 5th Division of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

Statistics.Affiliations: Tontatta Tribe Scouting UnitStraw Hat Grand Fleet

name: Willie Gallon
description: A scientist is an individual who uses their knowledge and expertise to help engineer new creations, either to serve the world or themselves.

name: Wire
description: Wire is a member of the Kid Pirates.

name: Woop Slap
description: Woop Slap is the mayor of Monkey D. Luffy's hometown, Foosha Village.

Japanese VA: Keiichi Sonobe (Episode 324, Episode of Luffy, Episode of East Blue, Episode 878+)

name: Wyper
description: "Berserker" Wyper is the former leader of the Shandia warriors that fought to take Upper Yard back from Enel. He is the direct descendant of Kalgara.

Statistics.Epithet: "Berserker" (戦鬼, Senki?)

name: X Drake
description: "Red Flag" X Drake (pronounced as "Diez Drake") is the captain of the Marine Secret Special Unit SWORD. In order to go undercover as a pirate, he publicly defected from his position as rear admiral and founded the Drake Pirates. He is one of twelve pirates referred to as the "Worst Generation", and before the two-year timeskip had a bounty of 222,000,000.

Statistics.Occupations: Captain of SWORD; Pirate (undercover); Captain (undercover); Shinuchi (undercover, former); Marine Rear Admiral (former)
Statistics.Alias: Dory (ドリィ, Dorii?, English version: Drie)
Statistics.Epithet: "Red Flag" (赤旗, Akahata?)

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus

name: Yama
description: Yama is a Birkan and the commander of the Divine Soldiers under Enel. He is a supporting antagonist during the Skypiea Arc.

name: Yamakaji
description: Vice Admiral Yamakaji is a Marine officer, and one of the five vice admirals who led the Buster Call on Enies Lobby.

name: Yamato
description: Yamato is the son  of Kaidou. Born as Kaidou's daughter and groomed from a young age to be his heir, Yamato instead developed a profound admiration for the legendary samurai Kozuki Oden. After Oden's death, Yamato decided to become like him, impersonating him and adopting his mannerisms. As a result of this desire to emulate Oden, Yamato decided to become a man and identify as Kaidou's son, with his father and the Beasts Pirates referring to him as such as well.

Statistics.Epithet: "Oni Princess" (鬼姫, Onihime?, VIZ: "Ogre Princess")

Devil Fruit.Japanese Name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami

name: Yame
description: O-Yame is a woman who lives in Okobore Town of Kuri with her two sons, Kinbo and an unnamed infant.

name: Yamenahare
description: Yamenahare is a citizen of Pucci and the manservant to Marumieta, the daughter of Pucci's mayor, Bimine.

name: Yamon
description: Yamon has long, light-colored hair and thin limbs, and wears a light-colored, furry top and light-colored shorts.

name: Yarisugi
description: Yarisugi is a tall and muscular man who wears a round hat with a short dark brim and a "5" at the front. He also has brown colored hair sticking out from the sides of his head to form a circle and a small black beard with a mustache of the same color, and a scar on his left cheek.

name: Yasopp
description: Yasopp, known as "Chaser", is one of the Senior Officers and the sniper of the Red Hair Pirates. He is also the father of Usopp and the widower of Banchina.

Statistics.Epithet: "Chaser" (追擊者（チェイサー）, Cheisā?)

name: Yatappe
description: Snake-Eyes Yatappe is a yakuza boss who was in charge of the Kibi region in Wano Country. He was imprisoned in Udon by the Beasts Pirates, but was freed when Luffy took over the prison.

Statistics.Epithet: "Snake-Eyes Yatappe" (蛇の目の弥太っぺ, Janome no Yatappe?)

name: Yazaemon
description: Yazaemon is a ninja and a member of the Beasts Pirates. He previously was a member of the Orochi Oniwabanshu which served the shogun of Wano Country, Kurozumi Orochi.

name: Yokan
description: Yokan is a doctor assigned to treat the injured at sumo matches in Bakura Town.

name: Yokozuna
description: Yokozuna is a Sumo Frog that Tom's Workers kept as a pet, friend and mascot up until Tom's execution.

name: Yomo
description: Pastor Yomo is a sheep mink and one of Inuarashi's Musketeers.

Statistics.Affiliations: Mokomo Dukedom (Inuarashi Musketeer Squad); Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance
Statistics.Epithet: "Pastor Yomo" (ヨモ牧師, Yomo Bokushi?)

name: Yonka
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Tsū
Statistics.Official English Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two

name: Yonka Two
description: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets (メダカの人魚の五つ子, Medaka no Ningyo no Itsutsugo?, VIZ Media: Guppy Mermaid Quintuplets) are five young Japanese rice fish mermaids who are friends with Camie. Their names are Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, and Yonka Two.

Statistics.Japanese Name: イチカ, ニカ, サンカ, ヨンカ, ヨンカツー
Statistics.Romanized Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Tsū
Statistics.Official English Name: Ichika, Nika, Sanka, Yonka, Yonka Two

name: York
description: York, also designated as Punk-06 (PUNK-06（パンク シックス）, Panku-Shikkusu?), is one of the six satellites of Dr. Vegapunk, embodying his aspect of "greed".

name: Yorki
description: "Calico" Yorki was the captain of the Rumbar Pirates who brought Laboon to Reverse Mountain fifty years ago from West Blue.

Statistics.Epithet: "Calico" Yorki (キャラコのヨーキ, Kyarako no Yōki?)

name: Yosaku
description: Yosaku along with Johnny are old friends and former bounty hunting partners of Roronoa Zoro.

name: Yoshimoto
description: Mr. Yoshimoto is the owner of the restaurant Spice Bean.

name: Yotsubane
description: Yotsubane is one of the Shandia warriors who fought against Enel.

name: Yu
description: Yu is a little girl who accidentally bumped into Smoker and got ice cream on his uniform.

name: Yui
description: Yui was a member of the Roger Pirates until the crew's dissolution. His current whereabouts and status are unknown.

name: Yuki
description: Yuki was a young girl over 100 years ago. She was responsible for starting the century-long duel between Dorry and Brogy.

name: Yurikah
description: Yurikah is the captain of the Tulip Pirates that attacked Mirrorball Island in Jango's cover story.

name: Zabo
description: Zabo was an average man with gold circular earrings and an orange headband wrapped around his shaggy red dreadlocks. He wears a white shirt and dark purple shorts, that have been dirtied and ripped during his escape from the priests, and was barefoot. He also carried a dagger by his hip that is held up by a sash going across his left side.

name: Zadie
description: Zadie was one of the archaeologists of Ohara.

name: Zala
description: "Poison Spider" Zala, better known by her alias Miss Doublefinger, was the second highest ranking female officer agent in the secret organization known as Baroque Works. As an officer agent, she was partnered with Mr. 1. She also used the alias of Paula while she acted as the owner of Spiders Cafe in Arabasta.

Statistics.Occupations: Spiders Cafe Owner; Assassin (Former); Officer Agent (Former)
Alias: Miss Doublefinger (ミス・ダブルフィンガー, Misu Daburufingā?, 4Kids: "Ms. New Year's Eve")
Statistics.Epithet: "Poison Spider Zala" (毒グモのザラ, Doku Gumo no Zara?)

name: Zambai
description: Zambai was a member of the Franky Family and was Franky's right hand man. After the timeskip, he, Kiev, and Tamagon have joined the Galley-La Company as Zambai's Company Union.

name: Zangirimaru
description: Zangirimaru is a former prisoner of Udon's prisoner mines. In the anime credits and closed captions, he was named Jo (ジョー, Jō?).

name: Zanki
description: Due to the experiments conducted on him Zanki is far taller than even normal giants, and has a pair of slender, straight, outward-pointing horns, along with a mouth full of sharp teeth. He has a round body with slender arms. He has an oval-shaped face with a small downward-pointed nose, red cheeks and a bushy dark-colored goatee. He has a prominent brow-ridge, which is often seen sloped downward in a sad-looking expression. On his right side is tattooed the daiji 参 ("three"). He wears a plain-looking dark-colored kabuto helmet, a braided Shimenawa rope as a necklace, and a dark garment on his lower body. On his left wrist Zanki seemingly wears some sort of dark, metallic bracelet or gauntlet. He wears a dark sash around his waist that he keeps a katana tucked into. He wears simple geta for footwear.

name: Zeff
description: Zeff is the head chef and owner of Baratie. Before that, he was the captain of the Cook Pirates and known as Red-Leg Zeff, until his crew was annihilated in a storm.

Statistics.Occupations: Head Chef of Baratie, Pirate Captain (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Red-Leg Zeff" (赫足のゼフ, Akaashi no Zefu?, "Red Foot Zeff" (English))

name: Zeo
description: Zeo is a Japanese wobbegong fish-man and the self-proclaimed "Noble of the Fish-Man District". He was an officer of the New Fish-Man Pirates before their downfall and disbandment.

Statistics.Epithet: "Noble of the Fish-Man District" (魚人街の貴族, Gyojin-gai no Kizoku?)

name: Zepo
description: Zepo was a polar bear mink who was Bepo's older brother and a member of the Nox Pirates. He was killed by Big Mom in Totto Land five years ago after he spun her Soul Pocus roulette wheel.

name: Zeus
description: Zeus the Thundercloud is a homie that is fused with Nami's Sorcery Clima-Tact. Before merging with the Clima-Tact, he was owned by Big Mom, who would summon him from her left hand. Due to being made from a soul fragment from Big Mom herself, he is more powerful than most homies.

Statistics.Occupations: Partner (相棒, Aibō?, Viz: "Sidekick"); Living Weapon; Servant (former)
Statistics.Epithet: "Zeus the Thundercloud" (雷雲のゼウス, Raiun no Zeusu?)

name: Zodia
description: Zodia is an infamous New World pirate captain who was subordinate to Whitebeard.

name: Zotto
description: Zotto is an averaged-sized man that wears black glasses and a Marine cap with ear flaps. Under those flaps, he appears to be wearing some sort of headphones. He also wears a red tie alongside a dark green suit and a light green shirt under the standard Marine officer coat. Additionally, he also has facial hair going across the bottom of his face. He carries a rifle on his back.

name: Zucca
description: Zucca is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with the Whitebeard Pirates.

name: Zunesha
description: Zunesha is a Naitamie-Norida elephant that was affiliated with Joy Boy 800 years ago. It now wanders through the New World and carries the island of Zou on its back as punishment for an unspecified crime it committed in the past.
